GSP28mimslovu:8: (?) = unclear mīmāṃsāślokavārttikaṃ sucaritamiśrapraṇītayā kāśikākhyayā ṭīkayā sametam
GSP28mimslovu:12: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa vijñānavādānte”ato na vyabhicarati pratyakṣam”iti
GSP28mimslovu:19: tatra pratyakṣāvyabhicāritve pratipādite vyabhicārikaraṇaprabhavatvena tāvad vyabhicāraśaṅkā prayuktā /
GSP28mimslovu:28: anena ca ślokena samarthitārambhāvasara' prapañco viśeṣato vyākhyāsyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:31: nātra naiyāyikādivadalokikaṃ pramāṇānāṃ svarūpamupadarśayituṃ lakṣaṇāni praṇītāni /
GSP28mimslovu:37: tatra na vidma' ko jñātasambandhasamāsārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:38: na tāvata puruṣa' sambandhī samudāyo vā /
GSP28mimslovu:41: nanu buddhisambandhopasthāpita' puruṣa' samudāyidvayākṣipta' samudāyo vā viśeṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:47: gamyamānasya cārthasya naiva dṛṣṭaṃ viśeṣaṇam / iti /
GSP28mimslovu:55: ata' kasyaigadeśasyetyākāṅkṣāyāṃ sa evaikadeśo jñātasambandhasyeti viśeṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:58: na hi bhavati puruṣaṃ pratyupasarjanībhutasya rājña' ṛddhasya rājapuraṣa iti viśeṣaṇam
GSP28mimslovu:61: ka ākāṅkṣitaṃ hi pūraṇasamarthamupasarjanenāpi sambadhyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:66: ata eva hi kasya gurukulamiti vyavahāropapatti' /
GSP28mimslovu:67: tatra hi kulopasarjanasyaiva guro' kasyeti viśeṣaṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:68: api ca darśanakriyākarmaṇo dṛśyasyaikadeśasya prādhānyamaprādhanasya sāpekṣasyāpi padāntareṇa sambandho dṛṣṭa', yathā rājapuruṣa'śobhana iti /
GSP28mimslovu:71: uktaṃ hi guruṇaiva-”nopasarjanaṃ padaṃ padāntareṇa samabadhyate ṛddhasya rājapuruṣa itivat”iti
GSP28mimslovu:76: yattūktam- ākāṅkṣā sambandhe hetu'' iti tadayuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:78: athocyeta ekavākyatāyāmayaṃ doṣa' ekadeśadarśanāda ekadeśāntare buddhiranumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:79: ata' paryavasite vākye kasyaikadeśasyetyākāṅkṣāyāṃ vākyagatamekadeśasyeti padaṃ jñātasambandhasyeti viśeṣyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:87: na ca vāstavaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvamāśritya padāntarasambandho dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:99: naca vāstavaṃ prādhānyamupasarjanasya padāntarasambandhe sāpekṣasamāse vā
GSP28mimslovu:101: kasya gurukulamiti nityasāpekṣatvād guruśabdasya nāsāmarthyaṃ doṣa' na hyanantarbhāvya pratisambandhinaṃ gurvartho 'vagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:109: kintu pramātaiva buddhisambandhopasthāpito jñātasambandha iti nirdiśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:111: na hi nama' pinākapāṇaya ityanayapadārthānupādānaṃ doṣāya /
GSP28mimslovu:112: api ca aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātīti bahuvrīhisamāsārtho devatātaddhita'
GSP28mimslovu:114: atha somaṃ krīṇāti abhiṣuṇoti pāvayatidhārayā gṛhṇātīti prakaraṇavagata'
GSP28mimslovu:117: pūrvapakṣasthitena vārtikakṛtā gamyamānaṃ na viśeṣyata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva durlabhalabdhamivamanvānai' kaiścidvalgitamityupekṣaṇīyameva /
GSP28mimslovu:118: siddhānte hi gamyamānāyā eva vyaktergāvau gāva' śuklo gauriti ca vibhaktyā śabdāntareṇa ca viśeṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:127: yastu vaiyātyād dhūmaśabdenāgniṃ lakṣayitvā tathā prayuyuṅkṣati na taṃ nivārayāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:128: nanvevaṃ pramātari jñātasambandhe sati naikadeśo viśeṣita iti vyāpakakaikadeśadṛśo vyāpyasmṛtiranumānamāpadyeta
GSP28mimslovu:132: tatra hi jñātasambandhasyaikadeśasyeti ṣaṣṭhyā vyāpya eva sambandhī pratipādyate /
GSP28mimslovu:133: sarvatra hi vyāpya eva hi ṣaṣṭhī dṛṣṭā /
GSP28mimslovu:136: lokaprasiddhameva tvaparīkṣāpratipādanārthaṃ svarūpamanūdyate loke hi niyāmyaikadeśadarśana eva niyāmakaikadeśajñānamanumānamiti prasiddhamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:149: bhavati hi 'vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna tu sandehādalakṣaṇam' iti sūktaṃ pramātā jñātasambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:153: ekadeśau hi naikadeśinamantareṇa syātāmiti ākṣiptasyaikadeśino yuktamanyapadārthatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:154: nanvevaṃ jñātasambandhasyaikadeśino ya ekadeśastasyaikaddeśasya darśanādityucyamāne sa eva
GSP28mimslovu:157: yadyekatadapi paramparayā vājapeyasya yūpa itivadekadeśino bhavatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:158: ka' punaratraikakadeśī jñātasambandha' pakṣa' sapakṣo vā /
GSP28mimslovu:163: ata' pakṣaikadeśino 'pi sāmānyato dhūmavattaupādhikasambandho jñāta iti sa eva jñātasaṃbandha'
GSP28mimslovu:168: atra ca pakṣe saṃbandhini gamye gamake caikadeśatā /
GSP28mimslovu:180: kiṃ puna' karmadhārayapakṣe dvayānyapadārthve vā prameyam /
GSP28mimslovu:191: atrābhidhīyate- ayamatrārtho jñātasya sambandhasya jñātasambandhasya vā dvayasya kvacidekadeśadarśanāt tatraivaikadeśāntare buddhiranumānamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:207: kintu agnyādau sati dhūmāderbhāvādasati cābhāvāt tadāyattasvabhāvo dhūmādiriti vidite tadavinābhāva' siddhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:223: kāraṇarasā hi kārye rasamārambhantekāraṇarūpāṇi ca kārye rūpam /
GSP28mimslovu:228: tathāvidhasyaiva kāraṇatvāt pravṛttiśaktinā ca kāraṇena rūpaṃ janyata iti rūpasiddhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:229: tadidamanupapannam yat tāvat kāryaṃ kāraṇena vinā na bhavatīti tatastajjñānamuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:231: kathaṃ hi kāraṇena vinā kāryameva na bhavati ityetadevāvaseyam /
GSP28mimslovu:232: tadvinā bhavato nityaṃ sattvasattvaṃ vā syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:240: yadyevamanyo 'yaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāt svabhāvaniyama' yadanapekṣaṃ tannityaṃ sadasadvā bhavatīti
GSP28mimslovu:246: nanu nādo rūpasya kāryaṃ nātmeti kathaṃ tadagame hetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:256: api tarhi rūpavadrūpakāraṇasahakāriṇā rasakāraṇena raso janyate /
GSP28mimslovu:257: sahakārikāraṇamapi saviśeṣaṇaṃ kāraṇameveti rasāditaretarānugṛhītaṃ kāraṇacakramanumāsyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:263: prāgeva tu tannirṇaye vṛthā rūpataddhetvo' sahakāritvakalpanā /
GSP28mimslovu:267: api tarhi rūparasayo' sāhityaniyamāt sahasaiva rasād rūpamanumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:268: api ca kāryakāraṇabhūtayoreva bahulamanumānavyavahāro dṛśyate ityanādṛtyaṃ kāryatvamavyabhacāre
GSP28mimslovu:270: kiṃ hi vṛkṣātmani śiṃśapātve vidite meyamavaśiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:283: īkṣate khalvayaṃ visphāritākṣa' sahasā mahānase dhūmamagninā sahitam /
GSP28mimslovu:298: api ca nirūpitarūpā api bhāvā deśādibhedeṣvanyathābhavanto 'nūbhūyanta iti na svabhāvaniyamaṃ pratyāśrayitumucitaṃ prāmāṇikānām /
GSP28mimslovu:302: vyāpyasya gamakatvaṃ ca vyāpakaṃ gamyamiṣyate // Msv_5,4.4 //
GSP28mimslovu:303: yo yasya deśakālābhyāṃ samonyūno 'pi vā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:306: na hyanyathā bhavatyeṣā vyāpyavyāpakatā tayo' // Msv_5,4.6 //
GSP28mimslovu:313: yadi jñātasambandhasyānumānaṃ sa tarhi sambandho sambanadhe dvyāśraya ityubhayānu māne liṅgaṃ syādata āha-vyāpyeti ||4||
GSP28mimslovu:318: uttarastu yathā dhūmādi', sa hi prāyeṇāgnideśakālavartī bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:323: sa hi tasya deśakālau tāvad vyāpnotyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:325: yataścānayorīdṛśaṃ svarūpaṃ nānyathā vyāpyavyāpakatātmakatā,tena kāraṇena vyāpya eva gṛhīte vyāpakasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati yadasau taṃ vināpi na bhavatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:327: yena taṃ vināpi bhavastaṃ na gamayet /
GSP28mimslovu:328: agnistvavaṃvidha iti nāsau dhūmasya gamako bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:333: vyāpyatvād gamikā gāvo vyāpikā na viṣāṇitā // Msv_5,4.8 //
GSP28mimslovu:334: sa hi sambandhajñānamātramaṅgatayā darśayati, na vyāpyatāmiti kuto
GSP28mimslovu:337: loke ca vyāpyaikadeśadarśina eva vyāpakajñānamanumānamiti siddham /
GSP28mimslovu:338: nahyanyatheti cāpakṛṣya pūrveṇa yojayitvā teneti tadupajīvanena vyākhyeyamiti ||6||
GSP28mimslovu:343: ato vyāpakaṃ gamyaṃ vyāpyaṃ gamakamityavyāpakamata āha-vyāpakatveti /
GSP28mimslovu:347: tena hi rūpeṇa gṛhīto 'sau vyāpād deśakālādhikye 'pi na virūdhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:349: astu nāmavastutatastattu rūpaṃ na gṛhītamiti kathaṃ gamakatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:350: avagate tu tādrūpye tenaivagamakatvaṃ na vyāpakatayā /
GSP28mimslovu:358: tatrāpi vyāpyataiva syādaṅgaṃ na vyāpitā mite' // Msv_5,4.9 //
GSP28mimslovu:360: deśe yāvati kāle vā vyāpatā prāṅanirūpitā // Msv_5,4.10 //
GSP28mimslovu:361: evamasaṅkare gamyakagamakavivekād yatrāpi vyāptisaṅkaro bhavati tatrāpi vyāpyatvameva gamakatve kāraṇamiti niṣkṛṣyata ityāha- teneti ||9||
GSP28mimslovu:363: kasya punariyaṃ saṃyogina' samavāyina' sambandhisambandhino vā /
GSP28mimslovu:368: atha samavāyī dhūmādagnyanumānam, sambandhisambandhinaśca pitrorbrāhmaṇatvāt putrasya brāhmaṇatvānumānamityādi darśayitavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:371: na cāsau bhūmau pratiṣṭhitenāgnināgaganagatasya dhūmāgrasya sambhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:372: naca bhūmiṣṭhāṃ śaṅkucchāyāṃ divi vartamāna' ṛkṣodayo 'veti /
GSP28mimslovu:373: vyāptiśca kasyacit kenacid bhavantī deśato vā syāt kālato vā /
GSP28mimslovu:374: pūrvasmin kalpe bhāvi' saviturudayasyādyatanārkasyaivodayāt aṣṭau yāmānatikramyānumānaṃ na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:378: yādṛśī-upaśliṣṭenetareṇa vā vyāpyatā prāgavagatā, saivānumāne kāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:382: yo hi yasmin sati bhavati, asati ca na bhavati, tena niyamyata ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:385: yāvati hi deśe kāle vā vartamānasya yasya vāpyatā nirūpitapūrvā,
GSP28mimslovu:386_0: yāvaddeśakālabhāvinā vyāpakena tasya vyāpakāṃśasya tāvatyeva deśādau vartamānasya sa vyāpyāṃśastādṛgeva, gaganādivartidharmyantare
GSP28mimslovu:386_1: dṛṣṭāntadhadharmyapekṣayā sādhyadharmiṇi dṛṣṭa' san pratipādako bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:387: tasya tāvati tādṛk sa dṛṣṭo dharmyantare puna' /
GSP28mimslovu:396: yāvati kāla iti ca bhāvina' saviturudayānumānādāvapi vyāptiṃ darśayatīti ||11||
GSP28mimslovu:397: nanvasyāṃ vyāptau na kiñcit pramāṇamastītyuktamata āha-bhūyodarśaneti /
GSP28mimslovu:399: kiṃ hi tatra pratyekameva bhūyāṃsi darśanāni pramāṇamāhosvid darśanaprabhavam /
GSP28mimslovu:401: no khalvasya sahasāgnadhūmāvagniśaraṇe vilokayamānasyāgninā vyāpto dhūma iti matirāvirasti
GSP28mimslovu:403: na cānekarśanārabdho darśanasamudāya' kaścidasti, tasya darśanātirekeṇābhāvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:409: na tāvat pūrvaṃ vyāpteravadhāraṇe samartham apratisandhānāt /
GSP28mimslovu:412: yañcedaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ sācinyam, idamapi na caturaśram /
GSP28mimslovu:413: saṃskārā' khalu yadvasturūpopalambhasambhāvitātmāno bhavanti, tatraiva smṛtimātramādadhati
GSP28mimslovu:415: pratyakṣe ca vyāptipramāṇe kathamataphalebhya' puṃviśeṣeṣu vaidikakarmānumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:416: na ca tattatkarmaniyamastasya tasya paśvāde' phalasyāparokṣamīkṣyate atīndriyatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:417: yañcedamadhvarevitate vaidikādaṅgāt pradhānāñcāpūrvānumānam, tadapi na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:427: na ca sahitāvadhāritayorasatyāṃ vyāptau kiñcidanupapannaṃ nāma||
GSP28mimslovu:434: bhūyāṃsi darśanānyevāsatyāṃ vyāptau nopapadyanta iti cet, kiṃ hi teṣāṃ
GSP28mimslovu:435: vyāptimantareṇa na sambhavati svarūpaṃ, tāvacca kāraṇasāmagrīkaṃ hi va'
GSP28mimslovu:437: svagocaraprakāśanamapi svata eva viṣasyāpi svapramāṇaparicchannasya na kiñcidanapapannaṃ paśyāma'
GSP28mimslovu:440: na ca bhāvasvarūpā vyāptirabhāvena pramīyata iti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:447: itarayā vyāvartate khalvayaṃ śaśaviṣāṇābhāvādapīti śaśaviṣāṇenāpi niyamyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:450: vyāvṛttirhi niyama', sācāstīti kiṃ śaśaviṣāṣasya sattvāsattvābhyām /
GSP28mimslovu:452: vyāpyate ca śaśaviṣāṇena tadabhāvānnivṛtto dhūmaityanagniriva tadabhāvo
GSP28mimslovu:461: grahītumasamarthāni, manastu sakalātītādiviṣayaparicchedasādhāraṇaṃ pratibaddhasāmarthyaṃ kvaciditi tadabalabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa vyāptirgrahīṣyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:463: no khalvapi bahirviṣayabodhe mana' svatantramiti varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:465: svatantre hi bahiriṣyamāṇe manasi sarva' sarvadarśī syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:469: tatraitat syāt-yadyapi kavalamasvatantraṃ mano bahirviṣayāvadhāraṇe,tathāpi pūrvapūrvāṃnubhavajanitasaṃskārasanāthaṃ bahirapi vartiṣyate cakṣurādyanugṛhītamiva rūpādau /
GSP28mimslovu:473: smṛtimātrahetavo hi pūrvānubhavaprabhāvitā' saṃskārānatsahante manaso bahiravagrahe 'nugrahamādhātum
GSP28mimslovu:476: sa ced grahaṇe kvacinmanasa' sahāyī bhavatīti kiṃ na smṛtiviṣayāntarāṇyapi grāhyatīti yat kiñcidetat /
GSP28mimslovu:480: na hīdānīmatra vā tayo' sambandha iti bhavati mati' /
GSP28mimslovu:481: api tarhi sannihitavartamānayorevedantayā pratibhāsamānayordeśakālau sambandhaśca tayorviśeṣaṇamimau sambaddhāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:483: tadevamanavacchinnarūpa' svābhāvika eva saṃbandha' siddho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:488: vahnirhi dhūmena saṃyukta' saṃvedito 'pi kadācidvidhūmo dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:490: na tu svābhāviko 'gnerdhūmena saṃbandha iti niścīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:496: prayatnenāpi cānviṣṭo na dṛṣṭa upādhirnāstīti niścīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:499: sa vaktavya' kimidānīṃ sāhityamātramanumānāṅgaṃ tanniyamo vā /
GSP28mimslovu:500: yadi sāhityamātraṃ tattarhi prathamadarśana eva samadhigatamiti punardhūmadarśino 'viditavyāpterapyanumānaṃ syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:501: atha tanniyama' tasyaivedaṃ pramāṇamanusriyate kuta' sidhyatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:502: na hi prathamadarśino 'yamanena niyata iti matirāvirbhavantī dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:503: anavacchinnadeśakālatayāvagata' saṃbandha' svābhāviko bhavati, tato niyama iti cet /
GSP28mimslovu:504: sa tarhi tathāvidha' prathamamevāvagata iti bhūyodarśanaṃ nāpekṣeta /
GSP28mimslovu:508: kālato vā kadācit kasyacit kasyacid viyogo dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:513: na cātra pratiniyama' iyadabhirdarśanairavyabhicāra' sidhyati iti /
GSP28mimslovu:514: nanu dhūmasyāpyagnisabandhe na kaścidupādhirupalabhyate agneriva dhūmasaṃbandhe /
GSP28mimslovu:515: ata' kathamasau satyapi dhūme na bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:519: dṛṣṭaṃ hi kvacid deśe kharjūrāṇāṃ piṇḍakharjūraphalatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:522: tadvat dhūmo 'pi jātu jāyetāntareṇāpi hutāśanaṃ kvaciditi śaṅkamānā na
GSP28mimslovu:534: kiṃ khalu vyāptigocaraṃ jñānaṃ na jāyata eva, sandigdhaṃ vā jāyate,
GSP28mimslovu:547: tad yathāyogyaṃ kasyacit kasyāñcit vyāptasaṃvittau vyavasthāpayāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:556: prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāye carame darśane cetasi cakāsti dhūmasya vahniniyatasvabhāvatvaṃ, ratnavattvamiva parīkṣamāṇasya,
GSP28mimslovu:560: na hyetat sarvamāpātānna pratibhātamiti parastādapi bhāsamānamanyathā bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:562: nanūktaṃ na smṛteranyatra saṃskārā vyāpriyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:563: kena vā saṃskārāṇāṃ smṛteranyatra vyāpāra upeyate /
GSP28mimslovu:564: smārayanta eva tu te pūrvapūrvāvagatamagnisambandhaṃ dhūmasya vyāptisaṃvidaṃ janayitumabhipravṛttacasyendriyasya sahāyībhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:567: na ca yat sahasā na pratibhāti tatpaścādapi pratibhāsamānaṃ pratyakṣatāṃ jahāti /
GSP28mimslovu:569: nanu na tāvadāpātajaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyāptau pramāṇamiti bhaṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:570: tatapūrvakaṃ ca savikalpakamiti kathaṃ tasyāpi prāmāṇyam /
GSP28mimslovu:571: asti vā brāhmaṇādipratyakṣe nirvikalpakāvasthāyāṃ vṛddhādāviv narāntaraviviktākārapratibhāsa'
GSP28mimslovu:573: yathā tu tatra piṇḍamātradarśina' smṛtayonisambandhasya brāhmaṇo 'yamiti
GSP28mimslovu:574: pratyakṣaṃ jāyate, evamihāpi bahuśo 'gnidhūmadarśino 'ntime darśane nirvikalpavṛttadhūmasvalakṣaṇasyāgninā niyato 'yamiti dhūsvabhāvagocaraṃ
GSP28mimslovu:578: tacceha vyaktidarśana eva pūrvasaṃskārodabodhāt siddhamiti nāvaśyamanayo'
GSP28mimslovu:580: ata eva tailaviviktavilīnājyabodhe tailamidamiti viparyasyato gandhasahakṛtendriyasya (sa)vikalpapratyakṣatvasiddhi'
GSP28mimslovu:588: asya hi bahulaṃ dhūmamagnāvupalabhamānasyānagnau ca vyatirekamante bhavati
GSP28mimslovu:594: yattu deśāntarādau vyabhicāra iti, tanna tāvad dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ nāpi śrutamiti nāśaṅkāmadhirohati
GSP28mimslovu:595: evamapi tu śaṅkamānasya sarvapramāṇeṣvanāśvāsa' kvacid vyabhicāradarśanāt /
GSP28mimslovu:599: na hi yad yena niyatamavagatamabādhitaṃ ca tadanyathā bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:600: avāntarajātibhedāttu śaktisadasadbhāvakṛtā kāryavyavastheti na kvacid vyabhicāra' /
GSP28mimslovu:608: idamev cāgnau darśanamanagnau cādarśanamanupapadyamānamagninā niyamaṃ pratipādayati /
GSP28mimslovu:610: darśanaṃ tāvat tatra bhavatītyetāvataivopapannam, na hi yadekatra bhavati tenānyatra na bhavitavyam
GSP28mimslovu:616: tatra satāpyanyatrāpi na bhavitavyameveti kimatra pramāṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:617: ato darśanādarśanasahakṛtendriyasyaiva vastusvabhāvāvadhāraṇamaparokṣaṃ jāyata ityevaṃ samarthanīyam
GSP28mimslovu:621: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadā yatra dhūmastadā tatrāgniriti /
GSP28mimslovu:623: anāgatādisambandhastu katham, atiprasaṅgo hi tathā (sati) syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:626: rūpameva tu tādṛśaṃ dhūmādīnāṃ yadevamunnīyate, sthiramiva rūpaṃ kuḍyādīnām /
GSP28mimslovu:628: sannihitāvāntarasambandho na pratyakṣa iti tadrūpamapratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:629: apratyakṣe hi tasmin nedaṃ rajatamiti sūrvānubhūtarajatabādho na syād,
GSP28mimslovu:631: svakāle hi pūrvavijñānena rajataṃ viṣayīkṛtaṃ na bhaviṣyadvādhakajñānakṣaṇa iti kathaṃ tatrāprasaktaṃ bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:634: nanu yad vastuno rūpaṃ tatparānapekṣamavagamyate, agnerivoṣṇatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:635: na ca dhūmasyāgṛhītapratisambandhinā tadrūpamavagamyata iti kathaṃ vasturūpatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:641: ato yadetadagninā dhūmasya niyatvaṃ bhāvātmakamidaṃ tatpratyakṣeṇāvagamyata iti kimanupapannam
GSP28mimslovu:643: vipakṣavyāvṛttyā tu vidhirūpa eva niyama' parīkṣakairvyākhyāya parebhya'
GSP28mimslovu:646: nanu niyamyatvamapi karmakārakatvaṃ tacca śaktirūpaṃ kathaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP28mimslovu:649: kārakāntaraśaktayo 'pi hi na pratyakṣā', ato 'satyeva śaktipratyakṣatve kārakaṃ pratyakṣameṣitavyam
GSP28mimslovu:652: āgamikeṣu cārtheṣu tasya tasya phalasya tena tena vedavedyen karmaṇā
GSP28mimslovu:653: samanvayāt, karmāntarānvayasya cānavagamād anenaiva karmaṇedaṃ phalaṃ vyāptamiti śāstrādadagamyate
GSP28mimslovu:657: vṛṣṭyabhāva iti ca pṛthivyā eva nibiḍakaṭhorapāṇḍurādibhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:658: tacca rūpamubhayasyāpi pratyakṣasamadhigamyameveti tadeva tatra vyāptipramāṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:660: bhavatu tāvadanyad vyākhyāsyāma iti samadhigataṃ tāvad vyāpte' svarūpaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca /
GSP28mimslovu:666: satyaṃ na viśeṣayorvyāpti', sāmānyātmanoreva dhūmākṛtiragnayākṛtyā niyateti /
GSP28mimslovu:668: idaṃ tu prāyikam, sthāyinostu viśeṣayorapi kvacid
GSP28mimslovu:671: yatra hi kṛttikodayaṃ dṛṣṭvā rohiṇyāsatti' kathyate- anantaramudeṣyati
GSP28mimslovu:675: pratyabhijñāyate hi saiveyaṃ kṛttikā, saiveyaṃ rohiṇīti /
GSP28mimslovu:678: yadi tarhi vyāptiranumānām, asti khalvasau hiṃsātvasyādharmatvena
GSP28mimslovu:681: vyāpteśca dṛśyamānāyā' kaścid dharma' prayojaka' // Msv_5,4.13 //
GSP28mimslovu:685: ye tu tānapi visrabdhaṃ sādhyasiddhai prayuñjate // Msv_5,4.15 //
GSP28mimslovu:687: ayamabhiprāya'--- satyāmāpātād bhavati bhrama', yathā kila hiṃsātvamātrānubandhyadharmatvamiti
GSP28mimslovu:697: evaṃ ca yadyapi bāhyahiṃsāsu hiṃsātvādharmatvayo' sāhityamavagataṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:701: ato ya evāsmin satyevāsya bhavituṃ śaktirasti ityanena rūpeṇa nirūpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:704: paraprayuktavyāptyujīvinastu hiṃsātvādaya', na tairadharmatvādivyāpakakāṃśo 'vadhārayituṃ kvacidvihitānāṃ daikṣapaśvādihiṃsānāmadharmatvamiti ||14||
GSP28mimslovu:705: ye tvevañjātīyakānapyaprayojakān hetūn prayuñjate, te sulabhai'
GSP28mimslovu:709: prayojake hi hetāvevañjātīyakā doṣā nāspadaṃ labhante /
GSP28mimslovu:713: yathā viśvāso bhavati tathā prayuñjata ityartha' ||15||
GSP28mimslovu:731: bādhakāraṇadoṣādhīnaṃ hi sarvatra mithyābuddhīnāṃ mithyātvam, na ca jñānatvenotpattittvena vā prayujyate, satyamithyātvasādhāraṇatvādanayo' /
GSP28mimslovu:735: darśayitavya', na hi sarvavijñānāni mithyetyevaṃvidhaṃ vivādaṃ lokikā'
GSP28mimslovu:743: santi khalu svargakāmo yajetetyevaṃ vihitāni somādīni karmāṇi /
GSP28mimslovu:748: caturṇāṃ varṇānāmadhikāra', utāpaśūdrāṇāṃ trayāṇāmiti saṃśaye caturṇāmiti
GSP28mimslovu:749: prāptam, catvāro 'pi hi varṇā' svargaṃ kāmayantara iti
GSP28mimslovu:751: svargakāmaścātrādhikāritayā jñāyata iti prāpte uktam-- apaśūdrāṇāmadhikāra iti /
GSP28mimslovu:760: na cāniyamenaiva te śūdrasyāpi bhaviṣyata' iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP28mimslovu:761: ko hi pratilabdhavidyāgnisambandhastraivarṇikādhikārasampāditāsu kāmaśrutiṣu niyatakālayovasthamupanayanamādhānaṃ vā jaghanyavarṇasyopakalpayitumutsahate /
GSP28mimslovu:764: tad yadi kaścadanumānakuśala' prayuṅkte śūdrakṛto yāga' svargahetu'
GSP28mimslovu:773: iha tu śūdrakṛtasya yāgāde' svargahetutā na sākṣādāgamena pratikṣipyate /
GSP28mimslovu:779: na ca kṛtakatvameva prayatnānantaradarśanena sādhayituṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:783: śabdānityatvasiddhyarthaṃ ko vaded yo na tārkika' /
GSP28mimslovu:784: tasmād ya eva yasyārtho dṛṣṭa' sādhanaśaktita' // Msv_5,4.22 //
GSP28mimslovu:785: sa eva gamakastasya na prasaṅgānvito 'pi ya' /
GSP28mimslovu:799: paramārthasanta eva ghaṭākāśātmādaya indriyaviṣayā jātimantaśca, na bhrāntisaṃviditā' śaśaviṣāṇādaya iveti ||21||
GSP28mimslovu:803: asmin satyamunā bhavitavyamitīdṛśyā śaktyāvadhāryata iti yāvat /
GSP28mimslovu:804: niyamyaśaktireva hi sādhanaśaktirityākhyāyate, niyatāvagato hi niyāmakaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:805: śankoti (gamayituṃ) nānya iti, (sa) niyamya eva gamako na prasaṅgānvito hiṃsātvādi' /
GSP28mimslovu:806: niṣiddhatvenānvetumabhipravṛttenādharmatvena prasaṅgāddhi hiṃsātvamapyanvitamiti prasaṅgānvitaṃ hiṃsātvaṃ nādharmatvasya gamakaṃ bhavatīti ||22||
GSP28mimslovu:815: sa eva cobhayātmāyaṃ gamyo gamaka eva vā // Msv_5,4.24 //
GSP28mimslovu:821: yadyapi svaśabdena naikadeśyupāttastathāpyekadeśaśabdābhyāmevārthādākṣipyata iti na nyūnatvadoṣa iti ||23||
GSP28mimslovu:825: na hyagnyaikadeśo dhūma iti kasyacit pratipattirasti /
GSP28mimslovu:828: ata ekadeśatvānupapattyaiva tadāśraya' kaścidekadeśyavagamyata iti siddhamiti ||23||
GSP28mimslovu:831: ata' kvacidev dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā kvacidekadeśyantare 'numānaṃ na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:832: aikādhikaraṇyaṃ tvekadeśayorna sidhyati, anupādānādityata āha--sa eveti /
GSP28mimslovu:835: tasya hi tau nāma vakṣyamāṇātmānau sta', yaddvirūpatvamarhati /
GSP28mimslovu:840: pramātṛpakṣe 'pi pabrathamoccaritenaikadeśaśabdena svāśraya ekadeśinyākṣipte dvitīyāpekṣākṣaṇe 'pi sa eva buddhau
GSP28mimslovu:843: yathā devadattasyaikakatra kare kaṅkaṇamaṅgulīyakaṃ karāntara iti na
GSP28mimslovu:848: ātta' pṛthagabhinno vā prayoktṝṇāṃ vivakṣayā // Msv_5,4.25 //
GSP28mimslovu:853: yadi hyasāvekadeśyasiddha eva syāta siddho vā, tadā na dvirūpatāṃ labhate /
GSP28mimslovu:854: sa tu dhūmavadādinā rūpeṇa pratyakṣasiddho 'gnimadādinā cāsiddha iti dvyātmakatvādubhayopapattiriti
GSP28mimslovu:859: ata' punarapi nyūnatvamityata āha--- ātta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:866: ekadeśī gamyo gamako bhedābhedābhyāmupātto iti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:867: kiyati punaranumānasya vyāpāra iti bhavati saṃśaya' /
GSP28mimslovu:870: sa khalvākṛtiviśiṣṭāyāṃ vyaktau dhiyamādadhāti, atha cānvayavyatirekābhyāmākṛtimātraparyavasāyīti niścīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:871: tadihāpi yadi tadvadeva viśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyi pramāṇamiṣyate, tata'
GSP28mimslovu:881: na dharmamātraṃ siddhatvāt tathā dharmī tathobhayam /
GSP28mimslovu:882: vyastaṃ vāpi samastaṃ vā svātantryeṇānumīyate // Msv_5,4.28 //
GSP28mimslovu:884: dvayaṃ ca na syādiṣṭaṃ sat pakṣeṣveṣu yathākramam // Msv_5,4.29 //
GSP28mimslovu:894: asatyapi sāmānye kenacidekenopādhinānantānāmapi bhāvānāṃ sambandho gṛhyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:896: kasmāt punarviśeṣaṇamātraparyavasāyyeva pramāṇaṃ neṣyate, ata āha---
GSP28mimslovu:900: evameva dharmimātrānumāne svatantrobhayānumāne vā siddhasādhyatā darśayitavyetyāha--- tatheti
GSP28mimslovu:908: na cānityatvākhyasya dharmasya svatantrapakṣīkṛtasya kṛtakatvaṃ dharma iti kathamapakṣadharmo liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:909: evaṃ dhvanimātre 'pi svatantre kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatra dhvaniriti niyama'
GSP28mimslovu:911: tathobhayasya dhvanyanitayatvātmakasyobhayena pakṣadharmatvānugamātmakena na sambandha ityanāgataṃ sambandhaśabdaṃ pūrvāparābhyāṃ sambandhya tantreṇa vyākhyā kartavyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:912: samadhigataṃ tāvad dharmadharmyubhayeṣāṃ vyastasamastānāṃ na sādhyatvamiti
GSP28mimslovu:913: atha kasmād dharmadharmisambandha eva sādhyo na bhavatītyata
GSP28mimslovu:916: na khalu parīkṣaka' sādhanavākye samnabdhavācinā kenacinnāmnā ṣaṣṭhyā vā sambandha upādīyate
GSP28mimslovu:917: na hyevaṃ prayujyate, agniparvatayorasti sambandha' dhūmavattvāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:922: na paraṃ pratijñāyāṃ nopādīyate, udāharaṇe 'pi na tenānugamo liṅgasya
GSP28mimslovu:924: nahi bhavati darśanaṃ, yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgnisambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:925: bhavati tu yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimāniti deśa eva nidarśanaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:928: etaduktaṃ bhavati-- na sādhanavākye sambandha' sādhyatayopādīyate nāpi dṛṣṭāntatayā dirdiśyate na cāyathāpratibhāsaṃ parīkṣakāṇāṃ vaktumucitamiti
GSP28mimslovu:933: api cāyaṃ sambandha' sādhyamāna' sanmātratayā vā sādhyate, kenacid vā dharmeṇa viśiṣṭa'
GSP28mimslovu:938: kananvasati sambandhe viśiṣṭa eva sādhayituṃ na śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:939: nāsti nāma sa prakāra', yadasambandhyamāna evāgninā parvatastadviśiṣṭo
GSP28mimslovu:941_0: na(nu) satyamasati sambandhe viśiṣṭo na bhavati, na tvetāvatā sambandhasādhyatā sidhyati, viśiṣṭasādhyatvānyathānupapattyaiva
GSP28mimslovu:941_1: tvarthagṛhītā matubarthasya sambandhasya sādhyatā na puna' svatantrasyeti
GSP28mimslovu:947: yathā daṇḍyādiśabdato viśiṣṭārthapratītau satyāṃ sambandho nāntarīyako
GSP28mimslovu:952: sa cāsyāsminnastīti sambandhe smaryate, ata' sambandha evātra pratyayārtha' /
GSP28mimslovu:954: 'prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūta' prādhānyena' iti smṛte' /
GSP28mimslovu:957: ata' sambandhavacanā eva daṇḍyādiśabdā iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:958_0: api ca 'nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhirutpadyata' iti viśiṣṭābhidhitsāyāmavaśyambhāvi prathamataraṃ viśeṣaṇābhidhānamāpatati
GSP28mimslovu:963: abhidheyaniṣkarṣe hi tayo' smaraṇaṃ, 'yasya guṇasya hi bhāvād dravye
GSP28mimslovu:965: tad yadi daṇḍapuruṣasambandho daṇḍiśabdasyābhidheya', tathā sati tanniṣkarṣe daṇḍitvaṃ daṇḍiteti tvataloranuśāsanamupapadyate /
GSP28mimslovu:966: yathā gośabdābhidheyaṃ sāmānyaṃ gotvamiti tvapratyayena niṣkṛṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:967: ata' sambandha eva daṇḍyādiśabdānāmabhidheya iti sāmprataṃ kathamucyate
GSP28mimslovu:969: atrābhidhīyate--- na tāvat smṛtyanusāreṇa sambandhavācyatvamadhyavasātuṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:972: yathā citraguriti citrābhirgobhirviśiṣṭo devadattādireva vṛttau pradhānatayāvagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:973: vigrahe tu citrā gāvo yasyeti gavāmeva devadattādirviśeṣaṇatayā guṇabhūta' /
GSP28mimslovu:976: tad yadyapi smṛtikāreṇa ta(dda)syeti vigrahe sambandha' pradhānatayā ṣaṣṭhyā nirdiṣṭa', tathāpi gomadāditaddhitavṛttau tadvāneva pradhānaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:978: gomacchabdo hi puruṣapradhāno bhāsate na sambandhapradhāna' /
GSP28mimslovu:981: tāvatā ca tadartha' pradhānatayā vācyatvena nirdiṣṭa iti bhrāntirupajāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:982: ato na tāvat smṛtyanusāreṇa sambandhasya vācyatā /
GSP28mimslovu:986: daṇḍo hi daṇḍino viśeṣaṇaṃ na sambandha' /
GSP28mimslovu:989: nirbhāgaśabdeṣu hi gavādiṣu viśiṣṭapratītāvapi viśeṣaṇamātramabhidhīyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:999: nanvasati sambandhe daṇḍoviśeṣṭumeva naraṃ na śaknoti /
GSP28mimslovu:1002: na hi pṛthivyāmanavasthitā gāvo na tadvantaṃ viśiṣantīti pṛthivyapyabhidhīyata iti yuktamabhidhātum
GSP28mimslovu:1003: yata eva tvasati sambandhe viśiṣṭāvagatiranapapannā, ata eva sambandho
GSP28mimslovu:1008: na hyabhidheyaniṣkarṣe gomadādiṣu bhāvapratyayānuśāsanam, api tarhi abhidheyaniṣkarṣe hi 'yasya guṇasya hi bhāvādi'ti
GSP28mimslovu:1022: sarvathā hi dharmamātre dharmaṇi vā svatantre pramīyamāṇe siddhasādhyatādidoṣo bhavati kana viśiṣṭapramāyām /
GSP28mimslovu:1023: viśiṣṭatā tu kadācit kasyacid yathābhiprāyaṃ bhavatu nāma, na kiñcid duṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1024: sarvathā tāvat dharmiṇa eva parvatāderagnyādidharmastaddharmeṇaiva dhūmādināvagantavya'
GSP28mimslovu:1029: tatrāsambhavata' paścāt kalpyo 'sau dharmiṇā saha // Msv_5,4.37 //
GSP28mimslovu:1033: ayamabhiprāya'--- laukikāni hi pramāṇāni lakṣaṇakārairapi yathālokamevānugantavyāni /
GSP28mimslovu:1037: tathā svayamanumānena pratipannimarthaṃ tenaiva paraṃ pratipādayanto laukikā dharmaṇā viśiṣṭameva hetuṃ prayuñjānā dṛśyante, yathāgnayanumāni eva dhūmavattvādagnimāniti /
GSP28mimslovu:1039: viśeṣaṇatayā hi parvataviśiṣṭo 'gniriti dharmiṇyupātte dhūmavattvāditi hetudharmeṇa tasya sambandho na sphuṭaṃ prakāśate /
GSP28mimslovu:1044: yat svayamapi dharmaviśiṣṭameva dharmiṇaṃ budhyate na viparītamiti ||36 ||
GSP28mimslovu:1045: yadi tarhi dharmiṇo hetudharmeṇa sambandho na sphuṭa' kena tarhi prasajyata ityata āha--pradhānatvaditi
GSP28mimslovu:1046: dhvaniviśiṣṭamanityatvaṃ kṛtakatvādityucyamāne 'nityatvākhyena dharmeṇaiva sādhyatayā pradhānabhūtena kṛtakatvādihetu' sambadhyeta na dhvaninā
GSP28mimslovu:1052: bhedopāttasya dharmasya guṇabhāvo na duṣyati // Msv_5,4.38 //
GSP28mimslovu:1056: yadi tūcyate, satyaṃ pradhānatayā dharmeṇa heto' sambandho
GSP28mimslovu:1057: vākyādavagamyate, liṅgabalīyastvena tu vākyaṃ bādhitvā dharmiṇaiva sambandha' kalpayiṣyate
GSP28mimslovu:1058: hetudharmasya hi dharmiṇaiva sambandhayogyatā na dharmeṇa, ato dharmasambandhābhāvād dharmiṇaiva sambandho bhaviṣyatītyata āha--- tatreti
GSP28mimslovu:1063: dhvane' kṛtakatvāditi vā punardharmyupādānena heturviśeṣaṇīya', na caivaṃ prayoktāra' prayuñjānā dṛśyanta ityabhiprāyeṇāha---dhvaneriti /
GSP28mimslovu:1064_0: yastu vadati dharmiṇyapi viśeṣṭe sādhye 'nvayopadarśanavelāyāṃ yatra yatra kṛtakatvamityukte dhvanireva pradhānatayā sambadhyeta
GSP28mimslovu:1064_1: nānityatvaṃ guṇabhūtatvādititaṃ pratyāha---anvayasyeti anvayopadarśanakāle hi bhedenaiva dharmamupādadate /
GSP28mimslovu:1065: yatra yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatrānityatvamiti na tatra pradhānasambandhāśaṅkā /
GSP28mimslovu:1066: ata' pratijñāvasthāyāṃ dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi sādhyamāne yoguṇabhāva āsīt
GSP28mimslovu:1070: yastu vadati ṣaṣṭhyantena dhvaninānityatvaṃ viśeṣyate dhvaneranityatvamiti
GSP28mimslovu:1078: ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśe hi sambandha eva sādhyo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1083: yo 'gni' so 'sti kvaciddeśe yo dṛṣṭo yatra tatra vā /
GSP28mimslovu:1084: agni' pūrvānubhūto vā deśamātreṇa saṅgata' // Msv_5,4.40 //
GSP28mimslovu:1085: yo 'gni' so 'nena yukto vā yo dṛṣṭo 'nena so 'thavā /
GSP28mimslovu:1086: yo 'yaṃ sa deśamātreṇa yukta' pūrveṇa vāpyayam // Msv_5,4.41 //
GSP28mimslovu:1088: pūrvayo' siddhasādhyatvaṃ pareṣu syād viruddhatā // Msv_5,4.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:1090: nāpi pūrvasya nāpyeṣa vahni' sarvairviśeṣyate // Msv_5,4.43 //
GSP28mimslovu:1102: siddho hi kvacidagni', dṛṣṭapūrvo 'pi pūrvadeśādhikaraṇa' siddha eva kiṃ
GSP28mimslovu:1104: pareṣu tu pañcasu pakṣeṣu pramāṇāntaravirodha ityāha--- iha tviti /
GSP28mimslovu:1107: yattāvat yo 'gni' so 'nena yukta ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:1108: nahyanena deśena sarvāgnayo vyāpyante deśasyāvaibhavāt sarvāgnīnāṃ
GSP28mimslovu:1110: deśai' pūrveṇa vāpyasya na deśena viśeṣyatā /
GSP28mimslovu:1113: agne' pūrvataraṃ cātra deśa evāvadhāryate // Msv_5,4.45 //
GSP28mimslovu:1116: yo dṛṣṭo 'nena so 'thaveti yaduktaṃ dūṣayati---nāpi pūrvasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1119: na hyeṣa pura'sthito vahni' sarvairdeśairviśeṣyate sarvatra tasyābhāvāditi
GSP28mimslovu:1121: pūrveṇa deśenāsyāgnerviśeṣyatā nāstyeva, pūrvadeśasyātrābhāvāt, asya ca tatra /
GSP28mimslovu:1123: sarvadeśasambandhanirākaraṇenaiva tulyanyāyatayā nirākṛta iti na pṛthagupanyasya dūṣita iti
GSP28mimslovu:1124: evaṃ saptasu pakṣeṣu nirākṛteṣvaṣṭama' pakṣo 'vaśiṣyate etaddeśaviśiṣṭo vā yo 'yamagniriti tannirākaroti--- etaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:1125: ayaṃ pura'sthito 'gniranena deśena viśiṣṭa' sādhyata iti sa vaktavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:1126: svadeśakālavartyeva smaraṇena viṣayīkṛta' kathamasāvanena deśena viśeṣṭuṃ
GSP28mimslovu:1129: anavacchinnasmṛtāvapi ca dharmo dharmiṇo viśeṣaṇamiti nedaṃ yuktisādhyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1131: deśa eva tu pūrvāvagato viśeṣyatāmarhatītyabhiprāyeṇāha--- agneriti
GSP28mimslovu:1132: yadi cāgnirviśeṣyo bhavet tatastasyaivāyamādyo jñānakālo bhavet,
GSP28mimslovu:1137: agnerjñānakāle hi sa eva deśo buddha',nāgni', ata' kasya
GSP28mimslovu:1139: tasmāt dharmaviśiṣṭasya dharmiṇa' syāt prameyatā // Msv_5,4.47 //
GSP28mimslovu:1141: nanu śabdavadeva syāt liṅgagamyaṃ viśeṣaṇam // Msv_5,4.48 //
GSP28mimslovu:1145: pramitaṃ hi vastvapramitena dharmeṇa pramitsitaṃ bhavati kakīdṛgdharmo
GSP28mimslovu:1147: tathā cadeśa iti sa eva pramitsyate, pramīyate ca, na punaragniriti /
GSP28mimslovu:1150: svarūpamātrameva hi deśasya pratyakṣeṇāvagatam, anumānena tu pāvakādiviśiṣṭatā tasyānumīyata iti na gṛhītagrāhitvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1151: ato dharmyeva dharmaviśiṣṭa' prameya' na dharmo dharmiviśiṣṭa
GSP28mimslovu:1163: śabdo hi viśeṣaṇamātra eva vartata ityākṛtyadhikaraṇe vakṣyata iti ||48||
GSP28mimslovu:1168: tad yāvataiva pratibaddhamavagataṃ dhūmavattvaṃ pratibaddhamavagatamityagnimattvamevānumāpayatīti na kaścit doṣa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1175: prameyadhī' pramāṇaṃ hi bhāṣyakārastu manyate // Msv_5,4.52 //
GSP28mimslovu:1176: na ceti viśeṣyo 'pi parvātadisvarūpeṇāvadhārita' so 'pi nānumeya ityāhaviśeṣya iti ||49||
GSP28mimslovu:1182: sāmānyaviśeṣyatātmā hi dhūma', tatra viśiṣātmanā pakṣīkṛtasya sāmānyatmanā hetutvamiti na pakṣaikadeśateti /
GSP28mimslovu:1183: samadhigataṃ tāvadanumānasya viśiṣṭo viṣaya iti, svarūpameva kimasyeti na
GSP28mimslovu:1187: ata eva bhikṣuṇā ekameva jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalarūpamiti pratyakṣamuktvā tadevānumāne 'pyatidiṣṭaṃ pūrvavat phalamasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1195: yathā hīndriyādipramāṇapakṣe yatra phalaṃ niṣpadyate tadviṣayavyāpārāt samānaviṣayatvamupapāditam
GSP28mimslovu:1197: ato dhūmastajjñānaṃ vā sambandhastatsmaraṇaṃ vā pramāṇamastu,
GSP28mimslovu:1205: bhāṣyakāro hi buddhireva pramāṇamiti darśayati yat kāraṇamasannikṛṣṭer'the
GSP28mimslovu:1210: astu vā sajātīyameva phalaṃ hānādibuddhi' phalaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1212: yadi bhāṣyakāra' pramayadhiya' prāmāṇyaṃ manyate, kathaṃ tarhi dhūmādipramāṇatvābhyupagama' ata āha---pratyakṣeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1214: tad yadā dhūmādīnāmeva prakṛṣṭasādhanatvamavagamyate, tadā tadeva pramāṇam
GSP28mimslovu:1215: bhāṣyakāreṇāpi buddhirvā janma vetyādinā pratyakṣaniyamaṃ darśayatā sarvatraivāniyamastulyayā darśita eva /
GSP28mimslovu:1217: tañcedamanumānaṃ dvedhā bauddhā vibhajante svārthaṃ parārthañceti /
GSP28mimslovu:1225: pūrvamasmābhi' pratipādita' pakṣo viśiṣṭo dharmī pramīyata iti sa
GSP28mimslovu:1228: svayamanumānena gṛhītamarthaṃ paraṃ pratipādayituṃ sādhanavākyameva prayujyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1229: parastu tato vākyāt trirūpaṃ liṅgamanusandhāya svayameva sādhyaṃ vastu budhyate, tadasya svārtamevānumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:1230: vakturapi svayamarthaṃ pratipannavata' svārthānumānameva, kataradatra parārthānumānamiti na vidma' /
GSP28mimslovu:1235: yadvadati darśanasya parārthatvāditi, na tu tadanumānam,
GSP28mimslovu:1237: trirūpālliṅgator'thādṛganumānamiti va' siddhānta', ata' kathaṃ vacanamanumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:1241: yadi tu svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt pratyakṣasya tasya cāśabdagocaratvānna pratyakṣaṃ parārthāmityucyate
GSP28mimslovu:1243: evaṃ hi pratyakṣagṛhītārthaviparītābhidhāyināṃ tadvirodhodbhāvanavacanaṃ na yujyate || yo hi pratyakṣavirūddhamarthaṃ pratijānīte nāgnirūpaṣṇa iti,
GSP28mimslovu:1244: sa vacanena taṃ pratyakṣaviṣayamarthaṃ pratipādya nirākriyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1245: pratyakṣaviṣaye tu śabdāgocare tannopapadyeta,ata' pratyakṣaviṣayamapi śabdo vadatītyabhyupagantavyam
GSP28mimslovu:1246: evaṃ ca pratyakṣaviṣayavacanaparārthatayā ka' pratyakṣaparārthatāṃ vārayatīti dvaividhyānupapatti'
GSP28mimslovu:1247: ato yathodita' pakṣa eva vācya ityuktavān /
GSP28mimslovu:1248: idaṃ tu vaktavyam---- ko 'yaṃ pakṣo nāma, taducyate, pratijñārtha' pakṣa'
GSP28mimslovu:1253: ata' sādhya' pakṣa ityācakṣmaha iti vācya' pakṣa ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:1258: vadanti ca kimanenānarthakena, antareṇāpi pakṣavacanamapekṣitaṃ sidhyatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:1264: hetvadhīne tu nirṇaye tacchktireva nirūpayitumucitā, kiṃ pratijñāvacanen /
GSP28mimslovu:1266: ato yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ śabdaśca kṛtaka ityudāharaṇopanayamātrādeva sādhyasiddheranarthikā pratijñā /
GSP28mimslovu:1268: tacca dṛṣṭāntadvayenopanayena ca kathyata iti kṛtamativistareṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:1272: yo hi manyate--- yadā khalvayaṃ śabdo nitya iti pratijānīte tadetaro
GSP28mimslovu:1273: 'nityavādī vyutthito bhavati tato jalpa' pravartata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1275: yo hi manyate---yadā khalvayaṃ śabdo nitya iti pratijānite tadetaro
GSP28mimslovu:1276: 'nityavādī vyutthito bhavati tato jalpa' pravartata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1281: sa ca tattvameva bodhayitavya' , ato hetuśaktimeva pratipādya tattvaṃ bodhyata iti yuktam, kiṃ vivāda ādriyate, na hi tena saha vivaditavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1284: tatraitat syāt--- jalpe khalu vivādamājihīrṣu' pratijñāṃ praṇayatīti,
GSP28mimslovu:1286: anyathāsiddhe', asatyapi hi pakṣavacane lakṣyata eva yathā
GSP28mimslovu:1287: dhvanimanityamanuminotīti, yat kāraṇaṃ yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭa
GSP28mimslovu:1288: ityuktvā kṛtakatvaṃ dhvanerupanayati śabdaśca kṛtaka iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1290: vitaṇḍā tu yathā tathā vāde darśite pravartata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:1291: na hi vaitaṇḍikasya kiñcit paranigrahādanyad sādhyamasti /
GSP28mimslovu:1292: yadasau pratijñāvacanena kvacidarthe sādhyamāne svaviparītasiddhiṃ manvāno jātodvego vivadet
GSP28mimslovu:1295: svayaṃ ca kutaściddhetuviśeṣāt kiñcit kenacid dharmeṇa viśiṣṭamavagatamiti parasmā api tathaiva kathyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:1296: asatyāṃ tu pratijñāyāmanāśrayahetvādaya ākāśapatitā iva bhaveyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:1297: nanu nāyaṃ pakṣavacanapura'saramajñāsītsādhyamiti kathaṃ parasmai tathā
GSP28mimslovu:1300_0: yadyapi śabdo 'nitya iti svapratipattau noccāritaṃ tathāpi savikalpakatvādasyā buddherastyevātra pramāturviśiṣṭo vikalpa',
GSP28mimslovu:1300_1: uccāraṇaṃ tu parārthamiti tanmātraṃ svapratipattau nāsīt /
GSP28mimslovu:1301: parastu nānuccāritena śabdena pratipādayituṃ śakyata ityuccārya pratipādyata iti śabdoccāraṇamātramadhikam
GSP28mimslovu:1304: jalpavitaṇḍe hi vijigīṣamāṇayordvayo' pravartata iti paraṃ bhrāmayituṃ pratijñāvacanaṃ na prayujyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1305: avivāde tu śiṣyo na vyāmohanīya iti viśadatarameva pratijñā
GSP28mimslovu:1309: na hi na śabdadāridrayaṃ, yadenaṃ tattvaṃ bubhutsamānamupasannamaviśadavacanena parikleśayāma
GSP28mimslovu:1311: uktamidamasati hi pratijñāvacane 'nāśrayā hetvādayo na pravarteranniti /
GSP28mimslovu:1314: nirdiṣṭe hi sādhye kuta ityapekṣāyāṃ hetu' sambadhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1317: tathāhi-- yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityamityukte kṛtakatvamanityatayā sambaddhamityanūditam /
GSP28mimslovu:1318: punaśca śabda' kṛtaka iti śabdasya kṛtakatayā sambandho 'nūdita' /
GSP28mimslovu:1321: kṛtaka iti svarūpanuvādamātramubhayoriti śaṅkā jāyeta, arthāntaraṃ vāpadyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1322: yathā cānityatvadharmā kṛtakastathā śabdātmako 'pīti, tadatra sarve kṛtakā' śabdātmāna iti sādhusampāditamāpadyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1329: iti sūkto vādivacanaprakāro dharmiṇamuddiśya sādhyadharmo vidhīyata iti
GSP28mimslovu:1330: nanvevaṃ sādhyaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi vidhīyamāne kevalasādhyānvayāvagamād dharmāntaravyudāso bhavet
GSP28mimslovu:1333: evaṃ ca hetorapi pratikṣepāt sādhyasiddhirapi durlabhaiva /
GSP28mimslovu:1336: satyam, ata eva tannivṛttyarthamavadhāraṇe kriyamāṇe itaranivṛttirapi bhavedata āha--- niyama iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1339: ato 'gnimāniti sādhyamāne 'gnyabhāvamātrameva nirākṛtaṃ bhavati, na puna'
GSP28mimslovu:1351: smaraṇaṃ hi sannikṛṣṭāvamarśollikhitameva prāyaśo bhavati,sa iti hi tat
GSP28mimslovu:1360: smṛtihetustu prācīnāmubhavaprabhāvitā bhāvanā samastīti smṛtireva pramuṣitatadavamarśā setyāśritam
GSP28mimslovu:1361: idaṃ tu pratyutpannaliṅgādikāraṇabalādutpadyamānaṃ laiṅgikajñānamanubhavākārapravṛtaṃ na tadbhāvādutārayituṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1387: pramitasya pramāṇe hi nāpekṣā jāyate puna' // Msv_5,4.56 //
GSP28mimslovu:1392: asyārtha'--- dvedhā hi sannikṛṣṭaṃ bhavati tadrūpapramitaṃ viparītanirūpitaṃ vā /
GSP28mimslovu:1396: sa ca sakṛtpramāṇavyāpārādeva siddha iti na pramāṇāntarāpekṣeti ||55,56||
GSP28mimslovu:1397: kiṃ puna' pramitasya pramāṇāntarāpekṣā na jāyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1399: varṇitamidaṃ ---dvedhā hi pramitaṃ bhavati tādrūpyeṇa vaiparītyeneti /
GSP28mimslovu:1400: tatra tāvat tādrūpyaparicchede na paraṃ pramāṇaṃ phalavat /
GSP28mimslovu:1407: dharmī ca giriranubhavasiddha', tathāpi viśiṣṭamanumānena viṣayīkrayata
GSP28mimslovu:1416: pūrvaṃ hi dhūmavattvopalakṣitena rūpeṇāgnimattayā deśo nirjñāta' /
GSP28mimslovu:1422: mūle tasya hyanutpanne pūrveṇa viṣayo hṛta' /
GSP28mimslovu:1425: agrāhyatā tu śabdāde' pratyakṣeṇa viridhyate // Msv_5,4.59 //
GSP28mimslovu:1426: tat kasya heto', na yadi pūrvānubhavādadya viśeṣa', avāgamat khalvayaṃ dhūmavānagnimāniti, na cāgnaye dhāvatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:1435: ye tu smṛtyāśaṅkānirākaraṇama' saya prayojanamāhu', teṣāṃ bādhitaviṣayamapyanumānamāpadyeta
GSP28mimslovu:1441_0: vyāptismaraṇādi hyanumānasya mūlam, tadyāvaduttaraṃ tattadvyāpāravyagratayā vilambate tāvacchīghrabhāvinā pūrveṇa viṣayāpahārād
GSP28mimslovu:1441_1: viprakṛṣṭasādhanasyotpattireva nirudhyata ityanantarameva vakṣyata iti kathaṃ punaranumānaṃ bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1442: tadapi hi pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa bādhituṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1445: yadi bādhādevetarāśrayaṃ tarhyastu vā jyeṣṭhapramāṇena pratyakṣeṇānumānabādha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1446: natu tato 'pi jaghanyairaparairbādhyate, tat kasya heto' ata
GSP28mimslovu:1450: tad yatra kasyacidarthasya kenacidātmanāvadhāraṇaṃ bhavati tatra tenotpannasyotpatsyamānasya vā jñānasya bādho 'bhidhīyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:1453: tatra hi pūrvopamardanenaivottaramātmānaṃ labhata iti tat tasya bādhakam /
GSP28mimslovu:1454: uttaraṃ ca deśādibhede 'pyabādhitaṃ svabhāvataśca pramāṇaṃ pūrvamābhāsīkaroti /
GSP28mimslovu:1459: tadevamātmanā jñānena pūrvamābhāsīkṛtamiti tatrābhāsa eva bādhyata iti
GSP28mimslovu:1461_0: aprāptabādhe tu yāvat kliṣṭasādhanamanumānaṃ svagocare sāmānyaśāstraṃ vā kvacid viśeṣaviṣaye pravartitumārabhate tāvat pratyakṣeṇānumānena
GSP28mimslovu:1461_1: vā siddhasarvāṅgakenāgamena vā viśeṣaviṣayeṇa śīghrajanmanā yenaivārtho
GSP28mimslovu:1464: na hi balavatā śīghrabhāvinā pramāṇena niruddhamukhamutpattumarhati /
GSP28mimslovu:1465: tadevamaprāptabādhe paramanutpannameva prāptisambhāvanayā tu bādhyata ityucyate śrutyeva liṅgamiti na kvacit pramāṇabādha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1466: yattu jaghanyena mukhyabādho na yukta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1469: yadeva tu śīghrabhāvi pūrvopamardena vātmānaṃ labhate tadeva bādhakamabhidadhmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:1470: itarañca bādhyamata eva tenaiva tasya bādhaṃ brūma' /
GSP28mimslovu:1471: prāptabādha iva pratyakṣasya tenaivānumānena ca siddhāṅgakena sādhyāṅgakasya viśeṣaśāstreṇa sāmānyaśāstrasya /
GSP28mimslovu:1477: nanu ca balavatāpi nāvaśyaṃ durbalaṃ bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1479: ato viṣayavyavasthāyā vikalpena samuccayena vobhayamupapādayiṣyate vinātyantikabodhāśrayaṇena (?), ata āha---vikalpāderiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1500: ata eva hyaśrāvaṇatāpakṣo 'pi na pratyakṣeṇa virudhyata iti vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1510: tadanena prakāreṇa śabdābhāvapakṣasyaiva pratyakṣavirodha upadiṣṭa iti na kiñcidanupapannamiti
GSP28mimslovu:1512: teṣāmeva śabdādīnāmaśrāvaṇatvādyanumānaviruddhaṃ yo hyaśrāṇamanityaṃ vā śabdaṃ pakṣamicchati tasyāsau śīghrabhāvinā viparyayānumānena bādhyata iti
GSP28mimslovu:1515: śabdo hi pratyakṣa' na tacchrāvaṇatā grāhyagrāhakasambandho hi śabdasya śrāvaṇasya ca tvatalbhyāmucyate
GSP28mimslovu:1518: api ca atīndriyaṃ śrotraṃ,kathaṃ tatsambandha' śabdasya pratyakṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1519: na hyaindriyānaindriyādhāra' sambandha' pratyakṣo bhavati vāyuvanaspatyoriva /
GSP28mimslovu:1524: tathāhi śrotropaghātamātreṇa cakṣurādimato badhirasya śabdabuddhirna dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1525: śrotre ca dṛḍhe cakṣurādiṣvasambhave 'pi śabdagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam, ata ābhyāmanvayavyatirekābhyāmidaṃ śrāvaṇatvaṃ gamyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1527: tatprabhavasamatu mānasa' śrāvaṇatvavikalpa', ato mānasapratyakṣa evāyamiti kaścit bhrāmyati sa vaktavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:1530: samadhigatam, anuvidhatte ca śabdajñānaṃ śravaṇamiti tattatkāraṇakamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1537: idaṃ hi kumbhasya tatkāryatvaṃ yā tadanantarasambhūti' /
GSP28mimslovu:1538: sa ca kumbhastatsambhavaścobhayaṃ cākṣuṣameveti kimatra manasā /
GSP28mimslovu:1539: ato yad yasmin sati bhavati, asati ca na bhavati, tattatkāraṇakamiti pratyakṣato viditavyāpteranumāmupapannameva
GSP28mimslovu:1540: evaṃ ca prayoga'--- śravaṇapramāṇaprakāśya' śabda' tasmin satyevopalabhyamānatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1541: yadevaṃ tattataprakāśyaṃ santamasa iva ghaṭa' pradīpaprakāśya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1545: tāvacchīghrajanamanā śrāvaṇatvānumānena vyāptisaṃvidaṃ pratibandhatā tasyotpattireva nirudhyate
GSP28mimslovu:1547: yat kṛtakatvādihetukaṃ tadapyasiddhivyabhicārādidoṣānna śīgharmupajāyata iti siddhāvayavai' śīghrajanmabhirnityatvānumānairbādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1549: gaurityatpadyamānatvāt sampratyutpannagośabdabuddhivad hyastanoccārito vā gośabdo 'dyāpyasti gośabdatvād, adyoccaritagośabdavadityādibhiriti ||60||
GSP28mimslovu:1551: pratijñāvirodhādayo hi śabdavirodhatayā prasiddhā iti te tathābhidhīyante
GSP28mimslovu:1553: yatra hi kvacidarthe pratiṣṭhitena śabdena pratijñāntaraṃ bādhyate, tatra śabdavirodho bhavati
GSP28mimslovu:1554: na ca svavāgvirodhe śabdasya kvacidarthe pratiṣṭhāsti vyāhatābhidhānāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1559: dharmyuktyāhaṃ yato jāta' sā vandhyā jananī mama // Msv_5,4.63 //
GSP28mimslovu:1562: lokaṃ prasiddhistu na śabdo na pramāṇāntaram /
GSP28mimslovu:1563: api tu pratyakṣādyantargataiveti tadviruddhapakṣapradarśanenaiva pradarśiteti na śabdavirodhe 'ntarabhāvayitumucitā /
GSP28mimslovu:1565: na hi candraśabdaśaśāṅkayo' sambandhaṃ śabdo vadati yenātadvācyapakṣasya śabdavirodho bhavati sambandhavācyatve hītaretarāśrayaṃ bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1572: tatra pratijñāvirodha evaikastridhā bhidyata ityāha--- yāvaditi sārdhena /
GSP28mimslovu:1581: sarvamṛṣātve hi pratijñāvacanamapi mṛṣeti netaranmṛṣā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1582: tadamṛṣātve hi pratijñāvacanamapi mṛṣeti dharmasaṃsargāsambhavaparāmarśāt pakṣabādha iti dharmoktivirodhābhidhānam
GSP28mimslovu:1586: dharma evāyamukta ātmānaṃ bādhata iti yāvat /
GSP28mimslovu:1587: vandhyā me jananīti pakṣo dharmyuktyā bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1596: na ca gauṇo jananīśabda ityapi vaktavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1598: evaṃ viśeṣite pakṣe dharmyuktivirodha ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1600: na tu śrutismṛtyatirekīṇi jalpākavacanāni gauṇatvādibhi' samīkartuṃ śakyante /
GSP28mimslovu:1603: teṣu kathañcitsamādhīyamāneṣu na kiñcid dūṣaṇaṃ nāma bhavediti ||62,63||
GSP28mimslovu:1605: anitya' śabda iti bauddhenokte kathaṃ kṣaṇikādagṛhītasambandhādarthapratyaya ityanuyuktena tenaiva yadā punarucyate nityastarhīti tadā tasya pūrvābhyupagamavirodha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1606: yadyapi cātra nyāyabalābalānusārī bādhyabādhakabhāva', tathāpyevaṃvidhā pūrvāparaviruddhā pratijñaivātmānaṃ na labhata iti na nyāyāvatāramapekṣate /
GSP28mimslovu:1611: tādṛśa' pūrvāparaviruddha' pakṣaṃ vināśayatīti teṣāmabhiprāya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1613: atrāpi mahājanaviparītārtha' śabdasaṃsarga' svarasādeva bhajyate na
GSP28mimslovu:1614: pramāṇaṃ yāvadapekṣata iti śabdabādha udāhṛta iti ||64||
GSP28mimslovu:1616: yena hi nagare gavākāro dṛṣṭa' samprati cāraṇye gavayākāra', taṃ prati gaurgavayasadṛśo na bhavatīti pakṣa upamānena virudhyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1635: yadyapi pratyakṣapūrvikodāhṛtaiva tathāpi pakṣadoṣodbhāvanacchalenendriyāpalāpapakṣasyāpyayaṃ doṣa iti vivakṣatā punastadvirodho 'bhihita' /
GSP28mimslovu:1636: atraivādiśabdenopamānapūrvikayā virodho darśayitavya'--- yathā gavayopamitāyā gostajajñānagrāhyaśaktyapahnava iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1638: arthābhidhānānyathānupapattyā hi vācakaśaktimarthāpattyā pramāya punastadanupapattyārthapattyantareṇa śabdanityatvamavagamyata iti ||67||
GSP28mimslovu:1640: kiṃ punararthāpatti' prapañcenodāhriyate, tadvirodhapratipādana hi yayākayācidekayāpi sidhyatyeva
GSP28mimslovu:1641: tathā ca pramāṇāntaravirodheṣu prapañco na darśita' /
GSP28mimslovu:1645: ṣoḍhā bhinnereva ṣaḍabhiratra virodho vārtikakārasya vivakṣita',
GSP28mimslovu:1648: yathā tāvat pratyakṣabādha evānubhūtismṛtyanumānādibhi' ṣaṣṭhavarjaṃ ṣoḍhā bhidyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1651_0: anāsannagnistu saiva pratijñā smṛtisthena pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate, yadā khalvayaṃ vādakāle 'nuṣṇo vahniriti pratijānāti tadainamitara'
GSP28mimslovu:1651_1: smārayati kiṃ na smarasi pūrvānubhūtamagneruṣṇatvaṃ yadevamāttheti, sa tat smṛtvā
GSP28mimslovu:1653: anumitapratyakṣabādhastu kayatrāptamukhe ceṣṭāviśeṣādarśanena tadavagatatikkatādirasanivāraṇaṃ pratijñāyate, mukhavairūpyeṇa hi tasya
GSP28mimslovu:1655: śrutapratyakṣabādhastu yatra kenacidarthe kasmiścidapahanute sākṣibhirdṛṣṭo 'yamartha iti sākṣipratyakṣeṇa bādho 'bhidhīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1660: darśanaṃ tu tai' svaśabdena pratyāyyata iti śabdāvagatapratyakṣavirodha evāyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1663: yathā dātrādipratyabhijñāyāṃ yādṛśī svātmaniceṣṭā dṛṣṭā tāṃ paratrāpi dṛṣṭavopaminoti mamevāsyāpi dātrādipratyabhijñā pratyakṣamutpannā,
GSP28mimslovu:1665: iha ca ceṣṭayā tadanurūpaṃ paragocaramanumāya svajñānasādṛśyaṃ tatropamīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1666: yadyapi cātrānumānāvagataprataykṣabādha eva śakyo darśayitum, tathāpi svajñānasādṛśyaparicchede śakyaṃ darśayitumiti tadavagatapratyakṣabādho 'bhidhīte /
GSP28mimslovu:1669: yadā hi bahuṣu gacchatsu toyārthiṣu taṭākamekastadāharaṇāya prasthito vilambate tadā tadvilambanānyathānupapattyā tadīyaṃ toyapratyakṣamarthāpattyā pramīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1671: abhāvena tu bhāvarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāvagamyata iti tadanavagataprataykṣavirodho nehodāhriyate
GSP28mimslovu:1677: yatra tu 'devasya tveti nirvapati' iti pratītaviniyogānmantraśeṣe 'numite
GSP28mimslovu:1679: nitye tu karmaṇi pravṛtte vrīhīṇāmapacāre tatsadṛśeṣu nīvāreṣūpamiteṣu
GSP28mimslovu:1682: na hi tasyā' svarūpeṇa vrīhayo viṣayabhūtā', tadavayavāstu cūrṇībhūtā vrīhiśāstrārtha'
GSP28mimslovu:1683: te ca nīvāreṣvapi santīti vrīhyavayavasāmānyopamitanīvāragāminī vrīhicodanānumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1694_0: āgamikaśabdabādhastu yatra śākhāntaragataśrutiviṣayavivāde smṛtinibnadhanakārāṇāṃ vacanena śrutisadbhāvo niścīyate, tatra
GSP28mimslovu:1694_1: hyāptāgamāvagatanityāgamavirodho viparītapakṣasya sambhavati upamitaśabdavirodhastu manvādismṛtibhyor'yāpattyā vaidikaṃ kimapi
GSP28mimslovu:1694_2: mūlamastīti kalpite smārtavākyasadṛśa eva mūla upamiter'thavādamūlatvapakṣa upamitaśabdena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1699: anumānapūrva kopamānabādhastu yadā hyādityasya deśāntaraprāptyā gatimanumāyatanmadhye vānte vā sūryagati' tādṛśī vatsarānteṣviti tatra
GSP28mimslovu:1701: pūtīkā na somasadṛśā iti tu pakṣa' śabdapūrvakopamānaviruddha' /
GSP28mimslovu:1708: śabdenaiva tu somāṃśujātatvaṃ pūtīkānāṃ pratipādayatā kāryakāraṇayoraucityena sārūpyaṃpratipāditamiti śabdāvagatakāryakāramaprabhavatvāt pūtīkānāṃ somasādṛśyopamānasya
GSP28mimslovu:1710: jyotiṣṭomikā hi dharmā' satrāhīneṣu na bhavantīti pakṣa upamānopamānena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1711: jyotiṣṭāmopamānena hi te dvādaśāhaṃ gacchanti dvādaśāhopamānena ca satrāhīnāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:1714: vedakāranāstitā śaśaśṛṅgādyabhāvasadṛśī na bhavatīti pakṣo 'bhāvapūrvākopamānena bādhyate
GSP28mimslovu:1720: yadā tvamuṃ rāśiṃ sūryo gaco na veti cintyamāne gaṇitakuśalena gaṇitānumānābhāvānna gata ityavagate bhrānto gata iti vadati /
GSP28mimslovu:1724: tathā śabde śrotradeśamanāgacchati śrotre ca śabdeśaṃ dhvanāyāgamanamātreṇaiva śabdaśvaṇopapatteryor'thāpatyā
GSP28mimslovu:1725: śabdāntaramāramate tata' krameṇāntya' śrotreṇa gṛhyate ityanyathānupapattyā pratijānāti tatpratijñā arthāpattyabhāvena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1726: abhāvābhāvastyevaṃ darśayitavya'--- yadā hi kartrabhāvena vedānāṃ doṣābhāvo 'vagato bhavati tadā doṣavatpakṣasyābhāvābhāvena bādha iti ||69||
GSP28mimslovu:1732: adharmo vihito du'khaṃ koratyalpamitīha tu // Msv_5,4.72 //
GSP28mimslovu:1739: dharmadharmiṇorhi svarūpaṃ yena viśeṣeṇa vyāptaṃ tamākṣipati /
GSP28mimslovu:1742: tatra dharmasvarūpabādho varṇita eveti tamakṛtvaiva tadviviśeṣaṇabādhamudāharati---tṛṇādīti
GSP28mimslovu:1743: yo hi tṛṇādivikāradarśanādagnimaddhimaṃ sādhayati tasyābhāvena tāvaddharmasvarūpabādho bhavatyeva
GSP28mimslovu:1745: na ca vācyamanuṣṇo 'pi vahni' prabhāsu dṛṣṭa iti kathamarthākṣipto viśeṣa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1746: prabhāsvapyevaṃ vahaniruṣṇa eva, abhibhūtatvāttu sparśo na gṛhyate, na punaruṣṇatāṃ jātu jahāti, svābhāvikī hi sā tasya /
GSP28mimslovu:1751: dharmiṇastu dvaprakāro 'pi bādho 'nukta eveti ubhayathā tadbādhodāharaṇamāha---adharmaiti sārdhena /
GSP28mimslovu:1755: tadviśeṣo 'pi du'khanimittatvaṃ yadarthākṣiptaṃ tadapi tenaiva bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1756: na hi vihitaṃ nāma kimapi du'khasya nidānaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1767: na cātra śrutyupātta eva svaviśeṣa iti codanīyam /
GSP28mimslovu:1770: yadā hi sarvajñānāni mithyeti sādhyate tadā dharmadharmigrāhiṇorapi jñānayormithyātvāt tadviśeṣaṇagrāhiṇośca mithyātvād bhavatyubhayasyaivobhayabādha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1771: ayaṃ ca dharmoktyobhayabādha iti śabdabādha eva niveśanīya iti samadhigataṃ tāvadubhayo' svarūpabādha iti ||74||
GSP28mimslovu:1774: bādhyete iti vipariṇamya sambandho darśayitavya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1778: taddhi liṅgaṃ na punardarśanamato vyākhyeyamekadeśadarśanādityata āha----
GSP28mimslovu:1785: parārthaprayoge tu ṇijantadarśanapadamekadeśaṃ darśayitvā yā buddhirjāyate sānumānamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1787: anena ca yatraikadeśe vādiprativādinorekasyobhayorvā saṃśayo 'dhīrviparyayo vā bhavati so 'siddhābhidhāno hetvābhāso vyudasyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1788: na hyasau tādṛśa' parasmai daraśayituṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1800: yadā vaiśiṣiko yājñikaṃ prati śabdo 'nitya' kṛtakatvāt guṇatvādveti hetuṃ
GSP28mimslovu:1802: yadā tu svayamevaṃprakāraṃ hetuṃ paraṃ prati vadati tadā tasyāsiddhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:1804: na hi vaiśiṣikā' śabdaṃ dravyamabhyupagacchanti guṇatvābhyupagamāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1807: yadā hi dhūmo bāṣpādibhāvena sandihyate dvābhyāmekena vā kiṃsvidayaṃ rajasāmudgamo bāṣpo vā dhūmo veti tadā dvayorapyantatarasya vā sandigdhāsiddho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1812: evaṃ tāvat svarūpato heturasiddho bhavatītyuktamityāha--- evamiti ||78||
GSP28mimslovu:1814: nanu svarūpāsiddhyāheturduṣyet āśrayāsiddhyā tu kastasya doṣa' ata
GSP28mimslovu:1821: itarat sādhanaṃ tu syāt vādinā yadi sādhyate // Msv_5,4.82 //
GSP28mimslovu:1825: siddhaṃ hi svarūpeṇa jale śaityaṃ rūparūpirūpapaikārthasamavāyiṣu ca cākṣuṣatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:1826: śabdā(dau) hi pakṣadharmatayā tu tayorasiddhatvamiti taddharmarūpāsiddhavacanam /
GSP28mimslovu:1829: yadā hi boddhaṃ prati sarvatra kāryopalambhādātmana' sarvagatatvaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:1832: yastu pramāṇagatimajānāno laukika' kaścidātmani saṃśete tasminneva
GSP28mimslovu:1835: ādiśabdena satīrthikānāmapi yeṣāmātmani saṃśaya' ta upādriyante /
GSP28mimslovu:1838: yasya hi pakṣavacana' śabdo na prasiddhastaṃ pratyevañjātīyake hetāvucyamāne 'jñānenāśrayāsiddhiriti
GSP28mimslovu:1839: nanu yadyanyatarāsiddhyā heturduṣyati, evaṃ tarhyamūrtatvādātmā niṣkriya
GSP28mimslovu:1842: akartṛkatvānnityo veda iti ca bauddhānāṃ tadasiddherahetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:1853_0: dūṣaṇaṃ bhavati nāsiddha iti vākpravṛttimātrāditi ||81 ||nanu kimidaṃ dvayorasiddho 'siddha iti, na hi vivadamānayorekatrārthe
GSP28mimslovu:1853_1: sampratipattirbhavati,na hi janmasahasreṇāpi bauddho vedānāmakartṛkatvamanyate, mīmāṃsako vāpi kaṇṭhagataprāṇo 'pi
GSP28mimslovu:1856: ata āha---itaraditi, ayamabhiprāya'--- na dvayorasaṃpratipattirityetāvataiva sādhanadūṣaṇayoranavakḷpti'
GSP28mimslovu:1857: yadi vādinā prayuṅkte sādhane prativādinā cāsiddhatva udbhāvite vādinā tatsādhanaṃ sādhyate, tato bhavati sādhanam /
GSP28mimslovu:1858: yadi tuparamārthopapattyābhidhānena prativādinā nirākriyate tatastasya dūṣaṇaṃ sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:1862: yaddhi pramāṇena sādhyate bādhyate vā tatra prāyeṇobhayasampratipattirdṛṣṭeti /
GSP28mimslovu:1864: yadvādinā sattvena jñātaṃ bhavati prativādinā ca vaiparityena, tadvādinā sādhyamānaṃ sādhanaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1867: na caivamanyatarāsiddhiradūṣaṇam, yāvattu vādī na sādhanaṃ sādhayati,
GSP28mimslovu:1868: tāvadanyatarāsiddhyā nigṛhyate, sādhite tu tasmin dūṣaṇaṃ parihṛtaṃ bhavatīti ||82 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:1871: sandehaviparītahetvorhi na sambandho jñāto bhavati, na hi sādhāraṇa'
GSP28mimslovu:1872: saṃśayahetu' prameyatvaṃ nityatvena jñātasambandhamiti śakyate vaktum,
GSP28mimslovu:1876: atra cāsannikṛṣṭapadāt, prabhṛti prātilobhyena vārtikakṛtā lakṣaṇagranthe
GSP28mimslovu:1878: sat sādhye tadabhāve ca dvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtta eva ca // Msv_5,4.84 //
GSP28mimslovu:1883: pramātā hi prathamaṃ pakṣa pratyeti, tato hetumapekṣate,tato
GSP28mimslovu:1887: tadvaikalye 'pi svayaṃ sambandho jñātuṃ parasmai pratipādayituṃ śakyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:1889: kiyanta' puna' saṃśayahetava', āta āha---traya iti ||83 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:1896: yau viruddhāvyabhicārīti parairabhihitau, tau cānantaramevodāhāryāviti neha vyākhyāyete iti ||84 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:1898: ete ca dharmā' sādhyatadabhāvayo' sādhāraṇā ityartha' ||85||
GSP28mimslovu:1899: keṣu puna' sādhyeṣu teṣāṃ sādhāraṇyamata āha---nityeti nityeṣvantena /
GSP28mimslovu:1911: kiṃsvidayaṃ sthāṇurāhosvit puruṣa ityanavadhāraṇajñānātmaka' saṃśayo jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1916: tathā yatnottha' śabda' anityatvādityayamapi sādhāraṇa eva /
GSP28mimslovu:1917: ayatnottheṣu keṣucidvidyudādiṣu gatatvādyatnottheṣu ca sarveṣu ghaṭādiṣu
GSP28mimslovu:1920: tathā yatnottha' śabda' anityatvāditi, yatnottheṣu sarveṣvevānityatā dṛṣṭā
GSP28mimslovu:1921: tadabhāve 'pi kvacinmeghādau dṛṣṭā, na vyomādau iti,
GSP28mimslovu:1924: amūrtatā hi na sarvanityavyāpinī vyomādiṣu bhāvādaṇuṣu cābhāvādanityamapi na svaṃ vyāpnoti ghaṭakuḍyādiṣvabhāvāt karmādiṣu bhāvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1925: sarvatra cātra dvayavṛttitvameva heto' saṃśaye kāraṇavṛttyaṃśastu sannapi
GSP28mimslovu:1927: ata eva sādhāraṇasya caturdhāvibhāgaṃ vadanti ye teṣāmasāvanupayogyeva
GSP28mimslovu:1929: aṇvāpi hi mātrayā vipakṣe vartamāno hetustyājya eva /
GSP28mimslovu:1932: vārtikakāreṇāpi sarvasādhāraṇeṣu dvayavṛttitvameva saṃśayakāraṇamiti darśayitumudāharaṇaprapañco darśita', na punaścāturvidhyamabhametya /
GSP28mimslovu:1938: gandho hi pṛthivyā' svāsādhāraṇo guṇa', na tāṃ vihāya nityamanityaṃ vā bhāvāntaramāśrayayatītyasādhāraṇa iti gīyata /
GSP28mimslovu:1943: āha--- astvasādhāraṇaṃ gandhavattvaṃ, kathaṃ tu saṃśayahetu', yuktaṃ hi pakṣadvayāvalambī sādhāraṇo dvayoranavasthādhiyamādadhāno
GSP28mimslovu:1944: yatsaṃśayaheturiti, asādhāraṇastu dvābhyāṃ vyāvṛtto naikatrāpi dhiyamupajanayitumalāmiti kathamasya saṃśayahetubhāva', ata
GSP28mimslovu:1946: hetorhi niścayajanane 'nvayavyatirekāvaṅgamanyatarāpāye 'pi na niścayāya hetu' paryāpto bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1947: tad yathā sādharaṇo 'nvayasanātho 'pi vinākṛto vyatirekeṇa na niścayāya
GSP28mimslovu:1948: prabhavati, evamevāsādharaṇo 'pi niścayasyaikenānvayanāmnāṅgena vilastamakurvan saṃśayahetutāṃ pratipadyata iti ||86 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:1949: nanūktaṃ sādhāraṇo dvayagāmī dvaye buddhiṃ janayan saṃśaye heturiti /
GSP28mimslovu:1950: asādhāraṇastu na kiñcid jñāpayatīti nāsāvekāṅgavikalatāmātreṇa saṃśayaheturiti yuktamata āha---sādhāraṇaiti dvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:1954: tañcāsādhāraṇe 'pyaviśiṣṭam, asādhāraṇo 'pi dyubhayasmād vyāvṛttestadabhāvaṃ gamayan dvayābhāvāsambhavādeva saṃśayaṃ janayati /
GSP28mimslovu:1955: na hi sambhavati nityamanityaṃ ca vastu na bhavatīti, dharmadvandvaireva hi nityānityatvādibhi' sarvaṃ janagadavasthitam /
GSP28mimslovu:1960: ayaṃ cātrāvayavārtha'---yathā prameyatvādi' sādhāraṇo dṛṣṭa' san
GSP28mimslovu:1962: buddhidvayaṃ saṃśayenimittamasthātīti bahuvrīhi', nimittaśabdena ca buddhidvayasya nimittamātratāṃ kathayati /
GSP28mimslovu:1963: sādhyatadabhāvaviṣayaṃ hi buddhidvayaṃ nimittīkṛtya viruddhaikānavāptereva sādhāraṇena saṃśayo janyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1964: na hi parasparaviruddhābhyāṃ nityānityatvābhāveka' śabdo vyāpyate,
GSP28mimslovu:1969: so 'pi hi yatra nitye 'nitye vā nāsti tadabhāvaṃ pratipādya tanmukhena dvayasattvavirodhamāpādayan saṃśayakāraṇaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:1971: avyavasthayā hyubhayasmin manasi viparivartamāne saṃśayo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:1972: na cāsādhāraṇena kiñcid buddhāvādhīyate, tasya kenacidanvayābhāvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:1973: api ca parimiteṣveva bhāveṣu saṃśayo dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:1974: nivṛttimukhena tu saṃśayajanane sarvato nivṛttenāsādhāraṇena sarvatomukha'
GSP28mimslovu:1978: naca kvacinnivṛttimātreṇa sarvatrābhāva' śakyate 'vagantum, yanmukhena saṃśayo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:1982: yastu na kenacidanvitastasya kathamanupalabdhiyogyāt sarvato vyatireka'
GSP28mimslovu:1985: yadi tvasādhāraṇadharmāṇobhāvā nityānityabhāvabhājo dṛṣṭā iti kṣitimapi taddharimikāmupalabhya nityā vā syādanityā veti saṃśayo bhavatītyucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:1987: anyo hyasādhāraṇadharma' anyā ca bahusādhāraṇī tadvattā /
GSP28mimslovu:1988: tad yadyasau saṃśayakāraṇaṃ jātā kiṃ jātamasādhāraṇasya /
GSP28mimslovu:1989: hantaivaṃ sādhāraṇa eva saṃśayaheturabhyupagato bhavatīti siddham /
GSP28mimslovu:1999: na hyanavyavasāyo nāma kaścid jñānasya prakāra', yamayaṃ janayet /
GSP28mimslovu:2008: athādharmādivad vipaparītavacano nañ, evaṃ sati viparyavācyo
GSP28mimslovu:2009: 'nadhyavasāyaśabdo bhavet, na ca viparītāvagraho 'sādhāraṇena janyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2014: bhavati hi taddarśina' kīdṛgdharmo 'yamito dharmād bhāvo bhavediti
GSP28mimslovu:2016: yadyapi cāsau śuddhadharmidarśanādapi kadācid bhavatyeva tathāpi dharmadvāreṇāpi tāvad bhavatyeveti na taddhetutvamanupapannam /
GSP28mimslovu:2021: jñātasambandhapadasya hi vyāvartanīyamatra darśayitumabhipretam, tat saṃśayahetutve 'pyasādhāraṇasya ghaṭata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2024: śākyāstu saṃśayahetumasādhāraṇaṃ manyante, udāharanti ca śabdānityatve
GSP28mimslovu:2030: idaṃ ca vārttikakṛtaiva pradeśāntare svayamupanyasya yathoktadūṣaṇairdūṣi tameveti ||88||
GSP28mimslovu:2034: amūrtatā hi nityatve sādhye nityānityavyomakarmasādhāraṇī saṃśayaheturāsīdat, saiva tu niṣkriyatve sādhye labdhvānvayavyatirekau hetutāṃ
GSP28mimslovu:2043: gandhaviśeṣadarśino hi viditavyāpte' kṣityekadeśasiddhatve bhavatyānumāniko nirṇaya iti ||90
GSP28mimslovu:2046: yatra hi na sākṣātkārijñānaviṣayo vāyu' arūpatvādityeka' sādhayati /
GSP28mimslovu:2059: siddhe ca vastuni vikalpāsambhavāt bādhyabādhakabhāvasyāpi tulyakakṣyatvāt
GSP28mimslovu:2064: kṣaṇabhaṅgādivākyavadityekenokte 'para' prabravīti buddho 'sarvajña iti madvacanaṃ samyak maduktatvāt yathā jyotiruṣṇamāpo dravā iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2066: buddhoktatā tu na na' prasiddhā, ato 'prasiddhāṅgakatvāt pūrva sādhanaṃ balavatā prasiddhāṅgakena bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2067: yattu viruddhāvyabhicārī saṃśaye heturiti śākyā vadanti /
GSP28mimslovu:2081: viruddhārthasambandhau saṃśayahetū iti dvivacanāntenaiva nāmnā saṃśayahetubhāvo darśita' /
GSP28mimslovu:2086: imāṃ ca viruddhāvyabhicāritāṃ saṃśayahetuṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇābhyāṃ jātyantarameke varṇayanti
GSP28mimslovu:2089: atra ca pradeśāntare vārtikakṛtā sādhāraṇya evāsthā darśitā /
GSP28mimslovu:2092: aṃśābhyāṃ samudāyo hi sādhāraṇapade sthita' ||” iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2095: yadi hyekena dvayaṃ prayujyeta tato bhavedapyevaṃ, pratyekamanvitau dṛṣṭau dvābhyāṃ prayuktau nānanvitāviti śakyate vaktum /
GSP28mimslovu:2100: yathā hi na dvayamekena prayuktamiti nāsādhāraṇatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:2103: ekaikasyaikaikena vyāptasyaikaikena prayogāt, aṃśata' sādhāraṇasya ca samudāyasyāprayogāt
GSP28mimslovu:2104: ata eva cātra sādhāraṇād bhedena pratihetu viruddhayo'
GSP28mimslovu:2108: sādhāraṇo hyubhayadṛṣṭastu pratītimādadhāna' saṃśayaheturimau tvekaikaśyenobhayamupasthāpayantau saṃśayahetū iti vārtikakāreṇāpi sādhāraṇapade sthita ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:2110: pratijñā yatra bādhyeta pūrvoktairyasya sādhanai' // Msv_5,4.93 //
GSP28mimslovu:2112: kvacit saṃśayahetū yau pratyekatvena lakṣitau // Msv_5,4.94 //
GSP28mimslovu:2113: kathaṃ punarevañjātīyake viṣaye nirṇaya', ata āha---pratijñetinirṇayāntena
GSP28mimslovu:2114: pakṣabādhoktai' pratyakṣādibhi' pramāṇairyasya sādhanavākyāvayavapratijñā bādhyate tatparājayenetarasya nirṇaya' kārya' /
GSP28mimslovu:2115: yathehaiva tāvat udāharaṇe tvagindriyavyāpāreṇa vāyāvaparokṣamanubhūyamāne tenaivānubhavena parokṣatāpakṣo bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2119: na hi prabalena marutābhihanyamānasya jalaṃ vā śliṣyata' saṃvida viśiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2122: yathā śuci naraśira'kapālaṃ, prāṇyaṅgatvāt, śaṅkhaśuktiśakalavāditi pāśupatenokte 'nyo 'śucīti sādhayati, prāṇyudbhūtatvāduñcārādivaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2130: atra ca pratyakṣādīnyeva yathāsvamarthaṃ sādhayantīti sādhanapadenocyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2132: teṣvapi sāmānyato darśanena bādhasya śaṅkyamānatvādata āha---
GSP28mimslovu:2134: na tāvat teṣu bādho dṛśyate, kadācid bādhasambhāvanā tu na teṣāṃ prāmāṇyamutsārayīti ||93
GSP28mimslovu:2135: atra bhikṣuṇā 'pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpto heturityekavacanena vivakṣitaikasaṅkhya eka eva heturiti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:2144: viruddhau hi dvābhyāṃ dvāvarthāvekatropaplāvitāviti tatra saṃśerate /
GSP28mimslovu:2151: tadatraikasyaiva saṃśayahetutvaṃ dvābhyāmeva tu nirṇaya ityaprayojakaṃ saṃśayahetutve dvitvaṃ, viruddhānekasādhyatvameva saṃśayahetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:2154: evaṃ viruddhārthasyāpi hetudvayasyāṃśābhyāmubhayavṛttireva saṃśaye kāraṇamiti na taddvitvena hetutvanirākaraṇaṃ yuktamityāha---kvaciditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2155: nanu yuktaṃ tāvadūrdhvatayā sthāṇupuruṣasandeho bhavatīti, kākavattāmātreṇa na saṃśayo
GSP28mimslovu:2158: yastu kākavattāmātreṇa sthāṇuṃ siṣādhayiṣati tasyāsau kevalā saṃśayahetu',
GSP28mimslovu:2160: api ca avirodhino' pratyekaṃ saṃhatayorapi kvacidarthe sādhye hetubhāvo dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2162: 'nvayavyatirekajatvapratyakṣānyapramāṇatvayo', śakyate hi tābhyāmaikaikaśyena samastābhyāṃ cānumānatvaṃ sādhayitum /
GSP28mimslovu:2163: dvitve ca hetvābhāsatvakāraṇe naikasmin sādhye 'nekahetava' prayujyeran /
GSP28mimslovu:2164: prayoktārastvekameva sādhyaṃ kiñcānyaditaśceti nānāsādhanai' sādhayanto dṛśyante /
GSP28mimslovu:2165: tasmād virodhanibandhana evapa saṃśaya', na tu nānātvanibandhana
GSP28mimslovu:2168: ga atra tu pratyekaṃ gamakāvapi saṃhatau ca gamakāviti pratipāditamiti
GSP28mimslovu:2180: vayaṃ tu iṣṭavighātamātreṇaikameva prakāraṃ saṅgirāmaha ityāha--- ekadhāpi veti /
GSP28mimslovu:2182: api vā śeṣabhājāṃ syāditi pakṣabādha eva viruddhatve kāraṇaṃ kimavāntarabhedopanyāseneti /
GSP28mimslovu:2183: triṣvapi ca prakāreṣu śrutyarthopāttasya pratijñātārthasya bādhāyāṃ
GSP28mimslovu:2189: tadasmin pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne hetorviruddhatā bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2191: kathaṃ hi pratijñārthe hetunā bādhyamāne heturviruddho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2192: sa hi pratijñārthaṃ pratijñārthena bādhyate yadviruddho bhavet prasiddhatvādasya /
GSP28mimslovu:2193: prasiddhaṃ hi ghaṭasya kṛtakatvaṃ, na tadaprasiddhayā nityatayā bādhituṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:2195: vārtikakṛtā tu paraprasiddhimātreṇa viruddha ityuktāmiti veditavyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2201: na ca viśeṣaṇamanabhidhāya viśiṣṭo 'bhidhātuṃ śakyata iti svarūpameva
GSP28mimslovu:2210: svarūpaṃ tu na kadācid vyabhicarati sambandhāvadhāraṇātprāgapi
GSP28mimslovu:2211: tadavagamāt, avyabhicārī ca śabdārtha iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:2212: ata' svarūpaṃ tāvadavaśyābhidheyaṃ śabdānāṃ, tadabhidhottarakālaṃ tu viśiṣṭābhidhānamapi bhavatu nāmeti /
GSP28mimslovu:2213: evaṃ prasādhyānte prayogamāhu'--- śabdasvarūpaṃ sambandhāvadhāraṇāt prāgarthavad vibhaktisambandhāt, agṛhītasambandho 'pi hi svādivibhaktiyuktān śabdānavagacchati /
GSP28mimslovu:2214: yadā ca vibhaktiyoga' tadārthavattvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā sambandhagrahaṇāt paścāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2215: kathaṃ punarevaṃ prayujyamāne dharmaviśeṣabādho bhavatyata āha---
GSP28mimslovu:2219: evaṃ ca bhavatyarthākṣiptasya dharmaviśeṣasya bādha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2220: kathaṃ puna' svarūpeṇeti cāśrite dharmaviśeṣo bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2226: ator'thavattāyā viśeṣaṃ svasvarūpārthavattvaṃ heturayaṃ viruṇaddhīti bhavati dharmaviśeṣabādha iti ||99 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2228: yadā hisamavāyadharmiṇaṃ kṛtvā tasya dravyādivyatireka' sādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2229: ihapratyahetutvaṃ ca heturucyate ihāyaṃ ghaṭa iti, saṃyogo dṛṣṭānta', tadā dharmisvarūpabādha ityabhiprāya' ||100||
GSP28mimslovu:2234: nityamātmāstitā kaiścid yadā sautrāntikaṃ prati // Msv_5,4.103 //
GSP28mimslovu:2239: kathaṃ punaratrodāharaṇe dharmisvarūpabādha', ata āha--- atrāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2241: ihapratyayahetutvaṃ hyasamavāyātmana eva dṛṣṭamiti tādrūpyaṃ virundhyāditi dharmisvarūpabādha iti ||101 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2243: samavāyo hi sattāsāmānyavadekarūpa iti kāṇādā manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:2247: yadā kaścit sautrāntikaṃ pratyevaṃ sādhayati--- ātmā nitya' niravayatvāt
GSP28mimslovu:2250: ityātmano 'pi tadvadabhāvaṃ gamayeta, āvaraṇābhāvamātraṃ hi nabha', na punastattvāntaramiti bauddhā manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:2251: ato 'navayavatvādātmana' svarūpasya taddharmasya ca nityatvasya bādhādubhayabādha iti ||103
GSP28mimslovu:2253: yadā hi parārthāścakṣurādaya' saṅghātatvāt śayanādivaditi sādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:2255: kathaṃ punaratrobhayaviśeṣabādha', ata āha--- śayana iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2261: hikhaṭvādau mahābhūtasaṃhataśarīrapārārthyena saṅghātatvāditi heturvyāpto dṛṣṭa iti saṃhatapārārthyameva sādhayet /
GSP28mimslovu:2262: ātmānaṃ ca prati pārārthyaṃ sādhayitumabhimatam, tanna sidhyet /
GSP28mimslovu:2263: so 'yaṃ tāvat pārārthyasya dharmasya yo viśeṣo 'bhimata ātmapārārthyaṃ sa tāvad bādhyate
GSP28mimslovu:2264: cakṣurāderapi dharmiṇo yo viśeṣa āhaṅkārikatvaṃ nāma so 'pyanenaiva hetunā bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2265: saṃhatātmakatvaṃ hi śayanādāvanāhaṅkārikatvena vyāptaṃ dṛṣṭam, bhautikā hi te, atastannidarśanena cakṣurādayo 'pi bhautikā bhaveyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:2266: āhaṅkārikāṇīndriyāṇīti kāpilā' saṅgirante, teṣāṃ cāyaṃ prayoga' /
GSP28mimslovu:2269_0: dharmiviśeṣabādho 'pi bhautikavayāptyā sūtrito 'nantarameva vivariṣyata iti na kevalamātmapārārthyaṃ na sidhyati, asaṃhatarūpātmapārārthye
GSP28mimslovu:2291: sādhya' pakṣa' tatsādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ yo dṛṣṭānta' sa pratipādyata ityartha' ||107
GSP28mimslovu:2299: yo yo dhūmavān sa so 'gnimāniti yāvaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:2302: evaṃ copādīyamāna uddeśyo dhūmādirvyāptatayā kathito bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:2307: yadyad yadvṛttena saṃyuktaṃ prathamaṃ prayujyate pradhānaṃ ca taduddeśyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2308: tattadvṛttuyaktaṃ ca paścāt prayujyamānaṃ sa so 'gnimāneveti caivakāreṇa yuktaṃ tadupādeyam
GSP28mimslovu:2309: sarveṣveva ca grahavrīhyādisaṃmārgāvaghātādiṣūddeśyopādeyeṣvayameva viveka iti veditavyamiti vadatyarthaṃ svaśaktyā ca śabdo vaktranapekṣayā // Msv_5,4.110 //
GSP28mimslovu:2312: viparyayeṇa vā hetau na pyāptatvaṃ vivakṣati /
GSP28mimslovu:2313: vivakṣannapi vā śabdaṃ tadyogaṃ na vaded yadi // Msv_5,4.112 //
GSP28mimslovu:2314: ghaṭe kṛtakanāśitve nāśi vyāptaṃ kṛtena vā /
GSP28mimslovu:2315: na tadeṣṭasya hetutvaṃ syādaniṣṭasya caiva tat // Msv_5,4.113 //
GSP28mimslovu:2316: kiṃ punarevaṃ prayoganiyame prayojanam, vivakṣāparatantrā hi śabdā', te yathā tathā vā prayuktā yathābhiprāyaṃ vartiṣyanta eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2318_0: na vaktrabhiprāyaparatantrā' śabdā', svābhāvikyaiva tu śaktyā kecideva kvacidevārthe vartante, ato na vivakṣānusāreṇeṣṭasiddhirbhavatīti
GSP28mimslovu:2321: ayamabhiprāya'---- nārthaśakti' śabdaśaktimanurudhya pravartate, na ca śabdaśaktirarthaśaktim, ato na yatā vaktrabhipretārthānusāriṇī
GSP28mimslovu:2322: śabdaśakti', evaṃ na śabdānusāriṇyarthavyavastheti, arthādīnāṃ kṛtakatvānityatvādīnāṃ vyāptiśaktyanurodhādeva sādhyahetubhāvo bhavati na
GSP28mimslovu:2324: vaktranapekṣayā svaśaktyaiva śabder'thamācakṣāṇe yattāvadāpadyate tad darśayati---tatrājñānāditi sārdhadvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:2325: yadā hi dṛṣṭānta vaktumanabhijño vaktā sādhyahetvo' sahabhāvamātraṃ vivakṣati /
GSP28mimslovu:2326: yathā--- śabdo 'nitya' kṛtakatvāditi prayoge,yathā ghaṭe kṛtakatvanāśitve sta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2328: satyāmapi vivakṣāyāṃ kutaścid bhramanimittāt na vyāptiyogyaṃ śabdaṃ vadati /
GSP28mimslovu:2329: sahabāvamātrameva tu pūrvavad vadet, viparītaṃ vā bhrānta' yatā nāsitā kṛtakatvena vyāpteti, tadā tāvanna kevalamiṣṭaṃ na sidhyati aniṣṭameva tu vyāptiviparyayādāpadyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2332: yadā samyak prayukte 'pi vākyer'tho na tathā bhavet // Msv_5,4.114 //
GSP28mimslovu:2340: aniṣṭasyaiva tu nāśitvasya bhavedityevañjātīyakāniṣṭaprayoganivāraṇāya yukto dṛṣṭāntaprayoganiyama iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2343: arthānāṃ śabdatantratve yad bhavati tad darśayati---yadetipādarahitadvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:2344: asyārtha'--- yadā hi vyāptiśaktyanusāreṇaivārthānāṃ sādhyahetutvaṃ tadā yadyapi vaktrā na sahabāvamātraṃ darśitaṃ,kintu samyageva dṛṣṭāntavacanam,
GSP28mimslovu:2345: arthāstu na tadanurūpavyāpyavyāpakabhāvanāvasthitā iti dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavediti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2346: yathā nityo dhvaniramūrtatvāditi prayoge karmavat paramāṇuvad ghaṭavad vyomavaditi dṛṣṭānteṣu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ paramārthata'
GSP28mimslovu:2348: karma khalvanityamiti tat sādhyabhūtayā nityatayā śūnyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:2350: paramāṇavastu bhūrtā iti teṣu hetuśūnyatā, sādhyaṃ tu nityatvaṃ teṣu vidyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2351: ghaṭe tu na sādhyaṃ nityatvaṃ nāpyamūrtatvaṃ heturityubhayaśūnyatā /
GSP28mimslovu:2352: vyomni tu dṛṣṭānte vyāptiśūnyatāmuttaratra svayameva vivariṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:2353: atraiva ca vyomavaditi dṛṣṭānte tadasadvādinaṃ sautrāntikaṃ prati prayujyamāne dharmyasiddhyā dṛṣṭāntābhāsatā bhavatītyāha--- tadasadvādinamiti ||116||
GSP28mimslovu:2356: vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyamapekṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2357: sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyā tu yadā vyāptiṃ na lakṣayet // Msv_5,4.118 //
GSP28mimslovu:2358: para' sādharmyadṛṣṭāntāt taṃ vā nāpekṣate yadā /
GSP28mimslovu:2359: vaktā vā sahabāvitvaṃ śuddhaṃ tena vaded yadā // Msv_5,4.119 //
GSP28mimslovu:2361: vyomna' sadbhāvo bhavet, tacca hetusādhyadvayayuktaṃ nityatvādamūrtatvācca
GSP28mimslovu:2362: tathāpi karmādiṣvamūrteṣu anityeṣvālocyamāneṣu hetorvyāptirnāstīti īdṛśasyāpi dṛṣṭāntasya varjanameva /
GSP28mimslovu:2363: ayamapi na sādhyasiddhye samartho yata iti ||117||
GSP28mimslovu:2367: kiṃ sarvadaiva sādharmyavad vaidharmyavacanaṃ kāryaṃ na veti /
GSP28mimslovu:2368: tatra tāvad vyatirekapradhānavādina' sarvadā vācyamiti ye vadanti tān pratyāha---vyāptyā sādharmya ukta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2369: evaṃ hi manyate--- vyāptiprajñāpanāya hi dṛṣṭāntavacanam, sā cet sādharmyavacanena jñāpitā kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena /
GSP28mimslovu:2374: ato yadi vyāptyā sahitaṃ sādharmyamuktam, alaṃ vaidharmyavacaneneti /
GSP28mimslovu:2375: kadā tarhi vaidharmyaṃ vācyamata āha--- sahabhāvitvadṛṣṭyeti pādatrayeṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:2376: yadā hi vaktrā samyageva dṛṣṭānta ukte para' śrotā jānāti--- yathā
GSP28mimslovu:2377: hetusādhyayo' sāhityamātranenoktaṃ na vyāptiriti, tadā sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvaṃ jñāpayituṃ 'vaidharmyeṇeṣṭasādhana'miti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2378: yadā khalvabhyastavaidharmyastamevāpekṣate na sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaṃ tadā ca
GSP28mimslovu:2380: yadā vā vaktā suśikṣitavaidharmya' sādharmyaṃ vaktumajānānastena sādharmyadṛṣṭāntena sahabhāvamātrameva śuddhaṃ vyāptihīnaṃ kathayati,
GSP28mimslovu:2383: yadā vā bhrānto viparītamanvayaṃ darśayati, tadāpi tatsamādhānecchagayā pūrvaviparītajñānopamardanena
GSP28mimslovu:2393: nanvanvayavaipītye sa eva yathāvat pratipādyatāṃ kiṃ vaidharmyavacanena /
GSP28mimslovu:2394: satyamevamapīṣṭaṃ sidhyatyeva, kintu bhrāntairidamasmābhiruktaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvo vivakṣita iti vaidharmyeṇāpi tāvadiṣṭasādhanaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:2396: yattu tatpūrvaṃ sāhityamātramuktaṃ tadvaidharmya evopayujyate tasyaiveṣṭaṃ sādhayato 'nugrahe vartate ityāha--- sāhityamātramiti ||120 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:2400: yadā hi dhūmabhāvo 'gnibhāvena vyāpto bhavati tadānagniragnyabhāvastato
GSP28mimslovu:2401: dhūmāt pracyuta' sannadhūme dhamābhāva eva bhavatītyevaṃ tāvad vyāpto
GSP28mimslovu:2403: yo hi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati sa tanniyatastadvyāpta ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2404: yathā dhūmo 'gnāveva bhavannagninā vyāpta iti siddho
GSP28mimslovu:2406: yata eva cābhāvayorīdṛśo vyāpavyāpakabhāva' ata eva bhāvayorabhimatavyāptisiddhirityāha---tathānagnāviti
GSP28mimslovu:2407: anagnāvagnyabhāve dhūmābhāvena vyāpte dhūmastatra virodhivyāpteralabdhāvakāśo 'gnāveva bhavatītyevaṃ tadvyāpyatā tasya
GSP28mimslovu:2413: vyāpakau tu yadocyete bhāvābhāvau tadā tata' // Msv_5,4.124 //
GSP28mimslovu:2415: tasmād dhūmena sādhyatvamagne' prārthayate yadā // Msv_5,4.125 //
GSP28mimslovu:2419: yatrāpyarthasya śūnytavaṃ dvābhyāmekena vā bhavet // Msv_5,4.127 //
GSP28mimslovu:2421: yadā hi ya eva bhāvo vyāpakastadabhāva eva vyāpakatayā vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate tadā tato vyāpyād dhūmādernaiva vipakṣasyānagnyāde' pracyuti'
GSP28mimslovu:2423: tatakathanārthaṃ ca va vaidharmyavacanaṃ(sa) prayojanaṃ bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2424: na hi yatra dhūmastatrāgniritivat yatra dhūmābhāvastatrāgnyabhāva iti kathyamāne vyāpyād dhūmādanagnervipakṣasya nivṛttirdarśitā bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2427: yatrāgnirnāsti tatra dhūmo nāstītyevaṃ yadavṛttatadavṛttābhyāmuddeśyopādeyabhāvo darśayitavya ityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:2428: sa cānagniradhūmen vyāpta ucyamāno nānyathā vācya', kintu
GSP28mimslovu:2432: yathaiva sādharmyadṛṣṭānte svaśaktyā śabdor'thaṃ vadati nārthaśaktimanurudhyata iti sāhityamātravacane vyāptiviparyaye vā neṣṭaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:2434_0: evaṃ (tadva?tāva) dihāpyartho na śabdavaśavartīti yatrārtho dṛṣṭāntarūpo dvābhyāṃ hetusādhyābhāvābhyāmekena vā tayo' śūnyo
GSP28mimslovu:2434_1: bhavati tatrāpi na prastutopakāro bhavati anyadvāniṣṭaṃ prasajyata ityāha---yatrāpīti samyak prayukte 'pi vākyer'thasyātadāyattatvānneṣṭasiddhiriti
GSP28mimslovu:2437: sādhyena vyāptisiddhyai hi vyātireko 'tra kathyate // Msv_5,4.128 //
GSP28mimslovu:2439: tena dṛṣṭe 'pi sāhitye na sarvo gamya iṣyate // Msv_5,4.129 //
GSP28mimslovu:2443: nityo dhvaniramūrtatvādityatraiva prayoge yadaivaṃ vaidharmyamucyate yannityaṃ na bhavati tadamūrtamapi na bhavati yathā paramāṇuriti tadā sādhyābhāvaśūnyo dṛṣṭānta' /
GSP28mimslovu:2451: yasya tu vipakṣaikadeśādapi vyātireko nāsti, nāsau sādhyena vyāpto
GSP28mimslovu:2454: yataścaivañjātīyako na sādhyena vyāpyate tena kvacidabhāvayo' sāhitye dṛṣṭe 'pi na sarvatra gamyagamakabhāvo bhavatītyāha---teneti /
GSP28mimslovu:2455: yadyapi yannityaṃ na bhavati tadamūrtamapi na bhavati, yathā ghaṭa' kuḍyaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:2457: tathāpi na sarva(') śabdādi(') nityatayā viśiṣṭo 'nena hetunā gamya iṣyate
GSP28mimslovu:2470: tāvatā na hyanaṅgatvaṃ yukti' śābde 'bhidhāsyate // Msv_5,4.132 //
GSP28mimslovu:2471_0: 'vyāptyā sādharmya ukte ca na vaidharmyapekṣyate' ityucyate, na hi śatāṃśenāpi hetorvipakṣād vyatireke śaṅkyamāne gamakatvamastītyaśeṣavipakṣo
GSP28mimslovu:2473: darśanaṃ hi sarvavipakṣāṇāṃ duṣkaram, tadabhāvastu saukaryaprāpta eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2477: vipakṣadarśane tu heto' paripanthinyavinābhāvo grahītumaśakyo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2478: taccaikadeśasthasyāpi tāvannāstyeveti paripanthini vṛttimātre darśanaṃ vyāpriyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2479: ato yadaivāgnikāryo dhūma ityavagataṃ tadaiva tadāyattātmalābho nāsati tasmin bhavatīti jñāyate
GSP28mimslovu:2480: na cānvayajñānameva vyatirekabuddhau nibandhanam, asādhāraṇeṣu tadasambhavāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2482: tat kuto 'nvaya' kutastarāṃ ca tannibandhano vyatireka' /
GSP28mimslovu:2483: na ca viśeṣeṣu sāmānyaṃ nāma kiñcidanugataṃ svarūpamasti,
GSP28mimslovu:2485: ato viśeṣā eva kecit kayācid vyāvṛttyopalakṣitā' kañcid viśeṣaṃ vipakṣavyāvṛttimukhena gamayantīti tatpradarśanārthaṃ vaidharmyavacanameva nyāyyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2490: na ca kāryatvāvadhāraṇādasati kāraṇe 'bhāva', tasyaivāsati vyatireke duradhigamatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2491: yaddhi yasmin sati bhavati asati ca na bhavati tattatkāryam /
GSP28mimslovu:2494: asti sāmānyavastveṣu vyāpitā tatra gamyatām // Msv_5,4.133 //
GSP28mimslovu:2497: astu vā darśanamātrād vyatireka', tasya ca saukaryaṃ, naitāvatānumāṃ prati yuktiranaṅgam
GSP28mimslovu:2504: yathokta eva siddhānta' samyak sādharmyaprayoge na
GSP28mimslovu:2508: ata' sa tāvad vidhimukhena prathamaṃ darśayitavya', avasare tu vaidharmyamapi kadāciducyate
GSP28mimslovu:2509: anaṅgatvamiti tu paṭhatāmiyaṃ vyākhyā---idaṃ hi liṅgasyānumāyāmaṅgatvam yadanvayavyatirekau,tābhyāṃ hi tadaṅgaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2510: ato yathā vyatireko 'ṅgatvam, ka evamanvayāparanāmā yuktirapīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2513: śābde hyanumānād bhinne pratītyuttarakālabhāvinī yuktiranaṅgamiti vakṣyate
GSP28mimslovu:2518: ye tu tāvatā nānaṅgatvamanvayasyetyadhyāhṛtyātraivārthe śābde yuktirvakṣyate iti vyācakṣate, teṣāmaśrutānvayādhyāhāra eva tāvadupālambha' /
GSP28mimslovu:2523: yattu bhedānāmevānumāne gamyagamakatvaṃ teṣāṃ cānvayo na
GSP28mimslovu:2532: na cāsati tasminnānumānāṅgaṃ sambhavatīti teṣāmanvayābhāvo na doṣāyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:2533: yadi na bhedānāṃ bodhaprasaṅga', kasya tarhi darśitamidaṃ, na bhedānugatamekaṃ kimapi pāramārthikaṃ rūpamasti /
GSP28mimslovu:2536: tathāhi tasya nipuṇato nirūpyaṇāṇasyā-- sambhavād vibhrama evāyam /
GSP28mimslovu:2539: pratibandhabalena tu kiñcideva svalakṣaṇaṃ kenāpi vikalpākāreṇa sāmānyātmanā samadhigataṃ yadaparaṃ vikalpākārollikhitameva svalakṣaṇaṃ pratilambhayati tatpramāṇamityākhyāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2548: te ca na bhājanamanvayasyeti yuktamevoktamata āha--- astīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2550: bhavedevaṃ yadi na bhedātiriktaṃ kiñcit sāmānyaṃ vastu bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2554: evaṃ ca yadanumānuprāmāṇyasiddhyarthaṃ parai' kimapi kāśaṃ kuśamavalambyate, tadapi mandaproyajanameveti
GSP28mimslovu:2555: anyanmataṃ vyāptyāpi sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ukte vaidharmyamapi vācyamiti,
GSP28mimslovu:2561: vyāvṛtti' sarvata' prāptā sādhyābhāve niyamyate // Msv_5,4.135 //
