GSP28mimslovu:2572: ata' sādhyābhāva eva vyāvṛttiṃ niyantuṃ sarvadaiva vaidharmyavacanamarthavat /
GSP28mimslovu:2573: sati hi tasminnagnyabhāve dhūmo na bhavatītyāveditaṃ, bhavatīti ||135||
GSP28mimslovu:2578: agnimān parvata iti pakṣavacane nirūpitamidam,--- yathā
GSP28mimslovu:2589: atra bhāṣyam--- 'tattu dvividhaṃ pratyakṣato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ ca
GSP28mimslovu:2595: atra kecinnītijñaṃmanyā avadhṛtasvalaśraṇameva kvacidanumānena sāmānyato gṛhyata iti manyante
GSP28mimslovu:2598: kathaṃ punaradṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇena sambandhadarśanam, utpattimata' phalasya darśanāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2601: sarvaṃ hi kādācitkaṃ phalaṃ kutaścidāgantukādutpattimato jāyamānaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP28mimslovu:2606: agnyādiṣu tu pratyakṣata' svalakṣa āvadhāraṇāt prāk pratyakṣato
GSP28mimslovu:2608: na ca dravyameva saṃyogavibhāgayo' kāraṇamiti vaktavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:2610: na ca dravyāntarāgama eva śakyeta kalpayituṃ, tasya pūrvadravyapratyabhijñayā bādhitatvāt
GSP28mimslovu:2611: na ca sadṛśāparāparotpattivipralabdhā bhedaṃ na budhyanta iti sāmpratam,
GSP28mimslovu:2617: bhāṣyakāro darśayati--- yathā vakṣyati”na hi te pratyakṣe”iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2619: vyaktameva deśāntaraprāptiphalonnīyamānatvameva karmaṇo darśayatīti siddhaṃ kriyādīnāṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaikaviṣayatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:2624: yathā khalvagnidhūmākṛtyo' pratyakṣayo' pratyakṣadṛṣṭa' sambandho, bhavati evaṃ gitaprāptyākṛtyo', tayorapi pratyakṣatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2626: pratyakṣameva hi vayaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpnuvantaṃ devadattaṃ gacchatīti manyāmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:2629: nanu devadatte deśasaṃyogavibhāgātiriktamaparaṃ karmaṇa' kimapi rūpamaparokṣamīkṣamahe /
GSP28mimslovu:2631: jātervā vyaktito vya(tiriktā) yā' kiṃ rūpamanubhūyate, yadasau pratyakṣaviṣayatayāvasīyate
GSP28mimslovu:2632: rūpameva sā vyakte', kimasyā rūpāntareṇeti cet, karma vā kimarūpam /
GSP28mimslovu:2633: idamapi hi tato na bhidyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2635: ato jātikalpanāvat karmakalpanāmapi pratyakṣapakṣa eva nikṣipanta'
GSP28mimslovu:2639: paṭhana kāvyaṃ svasaṃjñoktaṃ parokṣamiva budhyate ||” iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2642: na caiṣa devadattamiva calantaṃ spandamānamādityamapi paśyatīti dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2644: saṃyogavibhāgau tu tasyāpi pratīyete eveti tulya(va?svā)t
GSP28mimslovu:2646: api ca vibhāgopakrame saṃyogāvasāne ca karmaṇi tata unnīyamāne gacchatīti
GSP28mimslovu:2647: vartamānanirbhāsa' pratyayo na bhavet, atītaṃ hi tat, tadā kathaṃ vartamānākārabuddhigocaro bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2650: sthāṇau ca śyenaviyukte śyena iva karmānumīyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:2652: yadi mataṃ na vibhāgamātrāt karmānumānam, api tarhi vibhāgapūrvākāt
GSP28mimslovu:2654: eva tarhi yadaika' śyenaviyukta' sthāṇuranyena saṃyujyate tatra prasaṅga'
GSP28mimslovu:2656: yadi tūcyate yo 'yamutpatata' śyenasya deśāntarasaṃyoga' tasya sthāṇusamavetena karmaṇā niṣpattyasambhavānna tatra karmānumānamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2657: kalpyatāṃ tarhi śyene 'pi karma, sthāṇau tu prasaṅgānativṛttireva /
GSP28mimslovu:2659: asti ca sthāṇau kāraṇapribaddhaphaladarśanamiti nānumodaya' śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2661: śyenasamavāyinaiva karmaṇā sthāṇāvapi saṃyogavibhāgopapattau na tadgatakarmānumānamiti cet tanna /
GSP28mimslovu:2663: vyāptaṃ hi liṅgaṃ yatra yatra dṛśyate tatra tatra vyāpakamupasthāpayati /
GSP28mimslovu:2665: yadi tvavicchannotpattaya' saṃyogavibhāgā' kriyānumāne kāraṇam, evaṃ tarhi na kācid gatiranumīyeta, bhaviṣyatsaṃyogavibhāgānāṃ pramāṇāgocaratvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2668: na ca sthāṇo' śyeno deśa ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2669: evamapi matsyeṣu prasaṅgānativṛttireva, teṣāṃ hi jalaṃ svadeśa eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2672: na ca viyadvitatālokāvayavasaṃyogavibāgāvagamanibandhano vihaṅgame calatīti pratyaya', santamase 'pi bhāvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2673: na ca tamo nāma kiñcidvastvasti bhavatsiddhānte, bhāso
GSP28mimslovu:2675: atastatsaṃyogavibhāgahetuko 'pi na kriyāvasāya' śakyate samādhātumiti na
GSP28mimslovu:2677: yā tu 'na hi te pratyakṣe' ityapratyakṣatoktā, tāṃ tatraivānyathā vyākhyāsyāma' “rūpaśabdāvibhāgam” iti ca vadatā sūtrakāreṇa pratyakṣameva krametyāsthitam /
GSP28mimslovu:2678_1: itarathā hyupalabdhimātrapratiṣedhe śaśaśṛṅgādivannityābhāva eva karmaṇo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2681: kiṃ tarhi? āśrayasya deśāntaraprāpakatvarūpeṇa na svarūpata'
GSP28mimslovu:2684: karmaṇo 'numeyatvāt kena viśeṣeṇāditye gatyanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayodāhriyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2686: ato naivaṃvidhaṃ granthato yuktito vā ghaṭata iti sūktamanupannamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2694: pratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhasya pratiyogitayopāttaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambandhaṃ tatrāpi gatiprāptyākṛtyo' pratyakṣadṛṣṭa eva sambandha iti na pratiyoginorasaṅkara iti ||138||
GSP28mimslovu:2695: yadi tu dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣatāyāmapi pakṣīkṛtādityagaterapratyakṣatvāt na
GSP28mimslovu:2704: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣato dṛṣṭatā sāmānyato dṛṣṭatayā saṅkīryate ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:2705: idānīṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭatāpi pratyakṣato dṛṣṭābhimatāgnyākṛtyanumāne saṅkīryata ityāha--- yadīti pādatrayeṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:2706: yadi hi devadattādidharmyantarāpekṣaivāditye gatyanumānasya sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṣyate, sā tarhi
GSP28mimslovu:2708: sāmānyato hyavivakṣitadeśādibhedamidamavagataṃ dhūmavānagnimāniti, yathā deśāntaraprāptyadhikaraṇaṃ gatyadhikaraṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2716: yadāgnirbudhyate tasya parvabodhākat puna' puna' // Msv_5,4.142 //
GSP28mimslovu:2721_0: bahuvrīhi', tajjanyo 'yaṃ dhūmaviśeṣ iti ca prāk pratyakṣeṇa matiṃ kṛtvā punaśca kiyatā vilambanenānyatra kvacid katvā gata'
GSP28mimslovu:2721_1: san taddeśasthena tenaiva dhūmaviśeṣeṇa tamevāgniviśeṣaṃ budhyate, tadā tatpratyakṣadṛṣṭasambandhamanumānaṃ bhavatītyartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:2722: anena ca viśeṣadṛṣṭameva pratyakṣadṛṣṭaśabdenocyata iti vyākhyātam /
GSP28mimslovu:2727: tadadvāreṇa tvanumānasyāpi tādṛśo viśeṣo viṣayo bhavatīti yuktaiva pratyakṣaśabdena viśeṣalakṣaṇā
GSP28mimslovu:2728: viśeṣadṛṣṭaṃ ca sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya bhavati pratiyogīti dvaividhyopapattiriti bhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:2731: taddeśasthitenaiva hi dhūmena tasminneva deśe sa eva gomayendhanajanyāgniranumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:2737: yadi viśeṣadṛṣṭodāharaṇamidaṃ kathaṃ tarhi bhāṣye ākṛtigrahaṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:2738: evaṃ hi viśeṣa eva darśayitavyo bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2747: sa evāyamadya yāvadanuvartamāno gomayendhanavikārasya dhūmasyākāro dṛśyate
GSP28mimslovu:2754: ata' prāptyākṛtimātrād gatyākṛtimātrānumānamāditya ekāntata' sāmānyato dṛṣṭasambanthamiti yuktamevādityodāharaṇamiti ||145||
GSP28mimslovu:2762: tasya tu savikalpakasiddhau pratyakṣaviṣayatvamupapādyānta upasaṃhṛtaṃ 'pratyakṣatvamata' siddhaṃ sāmānyasye'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:2763: nanu yastveva na sāmānyaṃ kiñcidasti nāma /
GSP28mimslovu:2779: ata eva bhrāntirevānumānaṃ, sambandhabalena svalakṣaṇarūpamupasthāpayatīti pramāṇityāhu'
GSP28mimslovu:2781: yā hi svaviṣaye śrotrādibhirindriyairbuddhirjanyate, sā vastvālambanaivapa /
GSP28mimslovu:2782: yena ca yadindriyaṃ sannikṛṣyate sa tasya svārtha'
GSP28mimslovu:2792: evaṃ vastvālambantve 'numānasya sādhite arthāt sāmānyaṃ vastvityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2795: yadvaditi(?) svapratibhāse 'narther'thādhyavasāyena pravartamānā bhrāntirapyarthasambandhena pravṛttestadavyabhicārāt pramāṇamanumānamiti,
GSP28mimslovu:2796: teṣāmidamuttaram artha' sāmānyamanumānasya viṣayo bāhya eva /
GSP28mimslovu:2798: evamarthād vastutvaṃ prasādhyāhratya prasādhayati---sāmānyasya ca vastutvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:2799: sāmānyaṃ vastu abhāvānyaprameyatvādasādhāraṇavastuvaditi vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2806: na cānavagataṃ liṅgaṃ kiñcidasti prakāśakam // Msv_5,4.150 //
GSP28mimslovu:2815: bauddhānāmeva tu sāmānyamanumānaikaviṣayaṃ manvānānāmanavasthā prasajyata ityāha--- sāmānyamiti pañcabhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:2823: ayamabhiprāya'--- na tāvat pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ ca jñānaṃ sambhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2835: pramāṇāntaraṃ ca sadyathā talliṅgaṃvedane pramāṇamiṣyate, evaṃ liṅginyapi prāpnoti /
GSP28mimslovu:2838: astu tarhi liṅgino 'pi tathaivāvagama', ko doṣa', ata āha---evamapīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2841: tadeva hi pramāṇaṃ tadā sarvasya liṅgaliṅgisāmānyasyāvabodhakaṃ bhavediti
GSP28mimslovu:2848: yathā hyapramāṇameva sambandhasmaraṇaṃ pramāṇakāraṇamiṣyate tathā liṅgajñānamapi bhaviṣyatītyartha'
GSP28mimslovu:2851: tacca pramāṇameveti tadanusārī nirṇayo yukta iti ||158||
GSP28mimslovu:2853: tadabhāvāt smṛtiścātra na kathañcit pravartate // Msv_5,4.159 //
GSP28mimslovu:2858: na caiṣa prakāro liṅgagatau sambhavatītyāha---na tviti /
GSP28mimslovu:2859: na hyatra prāgapi liṅgāvagame pramāṇaṃ kiñcidupapadyate, yat pramāṇajñānenopasthāpyata iti
GSP28mimslovu:2865_0: yathā samprati sambandhajñānaṃ gṛhītaprāpakatayā samaraṇam, evametadapi liṅgajñānaṃ nirvakalpakagṛhītaprāpakatayā tadabhedena
GSP28mimslovu:2865_1: smārtamiti yo vadati tasya vandhyāsutre 'pi smaraṇaśaktiranivāritā /
GSP28mimslovu:2867: na ca liṅgasāmānyajñānaṃ nirvakalpakagṛhītasvalakṣaṇālambanamiti kathaṃ smṛti' /
GSP28mimslovu:2868: yadatra prakāśate tanna gṛhītaṃ, yacca gṛhītaṃ sanna prakāśata iti na
GSP28mimslovu:2870: agṛhītagocarāyāṃ tu smṛtau vandhyāsute 'pi smaraṇaprasaṅga iti ||160||
GSP28mimslovu:2871: nanvanumānena liṅgasāmānyajñāne 'navasthā bhavati, yadi sāmānyātmakameva liṅgaṃ tadagrahaṇārthamiṣyate, tasyānumānavedyatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2872: asādhāraṇa evārthātmā sāmānyajñāne liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyati, sa ca pratyakṣa
GSP28mimslovu:2877: na cāsya tena sāmānyenāvinābhāva' kathañciddeśata' kālato vā dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:2878: asādhāraṇasya bhāvāntareṣvanusyūtyasambhavādekatra dṛṣṭasya ca tatraiva niruddhatvāditi ||161||
GSP28mimslovu:2880: nahyasādhāraṇaṃ vastu pūrvatreha ca vidyate // Msv_5,4.162 //
GSP28mimslovu:2892: liṅgatvaṃ nopapadyata iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2895: ayamabhiprāya'---- mā nāma tiraścāṃ śabdollekho bhavet, arthavikalpastu teṣāmapi pūrvāparānusandhānātmako 'styeva /
GSP28mimslovu:2897: na hi so 'yamityānārūḍho buddhau dhūmo 'gnerliṅgaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:2899: asmanmate 'pi ye 'sādhāraṇātmāno dhūmādayo viśeṣā vikalpyante te
GSP28mimslovu:2903: yadi tvanvayasiddhyarthamasādhāraṇasya sāmānyarūpateṣyate, tato liṅgasāmānyagrahaṇa ivānavasthāprasaṅgāt
GSP28mimslovu:2904: kvacidvā dṛṣṭasambandhe sarva' pratyāyako bhavet // Msv_5,4.165 //
GSP28mimslovu:2906: anumānapravṛttestu prāṅmānaṃ tatra nāsti te // Msv_5,4.166 //
GSP28mimslovu:2908: liṅgijñānaṃ ca tadvat syāt trirūpālliṅgato na tat // Msv_5,4.167 //
GSP28mimslovu:2912: evaṃ tarhi sarva eva sarvasya pratyāyako bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:2918: na cānumānapravṛtte' prāk tasmin sāmānyātmani bhavata' kiñcit pramāṇamastyasmākamiva pratyakṣam, ato lliṅginyapyavagamyamāne 'navasthāprasaṅga ityabhiprāya' ||166||
GSP28mimslovu:2921: kācideva hi vāsanodbhūtā kiñcilliṅgākāraṃ vikpamāvirbhāvayantī kiñcidevānumāsaṃvyavahāraṃ pravartayati /
GSP28mimslovu:2922: yathāhu'---'sa evāyamanumānānumeyavyavahāro buddhyārūḍhena dharmadharminyāyena , na bahi' sadasattvamapekṣata' iti, ata āha---na
GSP28mimslovu:2926: nāsau lihgasāmānyasya śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantāsata' sambhavatīti kathaṃ vāsanāmātrālliṅgajñānasya sambhava iti /
GSP28mimslovu:2930: pramāṇāntaragamyatvāt tatra doṣo na jāyate // Msv_5,4.168 //
GSP28mimslovu:2932: tasya nāto 'dhikaṃ kiñcit prārthanīyaṃ prasajyate // Msv_5,4.169 //
GSP28mimslovu:2934: tatrāpi maulikaṃ liṅgaṃ pratyakṣādeva gamyate // Msv_5,4.170 //
GSP28mimslovu:2936: pratyakṣatvaṃ ca tasyeṣṭamiti dūraṃ na gamyate // Msv_5,4.171 //
GSP28mimslovu:2941: yatra hi vṛṣṭyabhāve meghābhāvo liṅgaṃ nāsāvanumeya',
GSP28mimslovu:2948: pratyakṣā hi deśāntaraprāptirmaulikaṃ mūle bhavaṃ liṅgaṃ, tena gatimanumāyāditye gatisādhane 'numīyamāne nāvasthetyabhiprāya' ||170||
GSP28mimslovu:2949: nanvanitya' śabda' kṛtakatvāt, kṛtakatvaṃ catatra darśanādityevaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:2954: tatra ca kārakāviśiṣṭā kriyā tadviśiṣṭaṃ vā kārakamantarabhāvitāṃ viśiṣalliṅgamāpatati /
GSP28mimslovu:2959: pratyakṣatvaṃ ca sāmānye nānyatā hi gatirbhavet // Msv_5,4.173 //
GSP28mimslovu:2961: yadā vastvamtarāpekṣa' sāmānyāṃśa' sa kīrtyate // Msv_5,4.174 //
GSP28mimslovu:2973: evaṃ tāvadanumāsyāsati sāmānyasya vastutve pratyakṣatve ca dausthityamuktam idānīṃ sarvameva pramāṇajātaṃ sāmānyasya dausthitye dusthitamāpadyeta teṣāmapi sāmānyaśrayatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:2977: evaṃ tāvat sāmānyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vastutā copapāditā idānīṃ viśeṣā eva pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyanta iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha---pratyakṣeti /
GSP28mimslovu:2978: viśeṣo hi yadi tāvadavayavī dravyamabhimata', cāvayavavastvantarāpekṣa'
GSP28mimslovu:2979: sāmānyāṃśo 'smābhi' kīrtyata iti kathaṃ pratyakṣa iti ||174||
GSP28mimslovu:2980: yadi tvavayavirūpādaya eva viśeṣā iṣyante, tadapyayuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:2982: te cāpi tāvat sāmānyaṃ yāvat syu' paramāṇava' /
GSP28mimslovu:2983: dvyaṇukasyāpi yadarūpaṃ taddhi sādhāraṇaṃ dvayo' // Msv_5,4.176 //
GSP28mimslovu:2985: na ca pratyakṣatātsaya saṅghāte kevalasya vā // Msv_5,4.177 //
GSP28mimslovu:2988: yadi tu nīlādaya eva viśeṣā iti matam /
GSP28mimslovu:2994: evaṃ ca aparamāṇubhya' prasaṅgo darśayitanya ityāha---te cāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:2995: nirbhāgā hi paramāṇava iti tadarūpamasādhāraṇameveti || tebhyastu prāk dvyaṇukarūpamapi dvayo' sādhāraṇamityāha--- dvyaṇukasyāpīti ||176||
GSP28mimslovu:2996: nanvastu paramāṇurūpameva viśeṣa', sa eva na' pratyakṣo bhaviṣyatyata āha---na cāntyeneti
GSP28mimslovu:2998: na cāntyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāra' kasyacidastīti kiṃ tatpratyakṣatayeti /
GSP28mimslovu:2999: nanūpekṣāphalamapi pramāṇaṃ bhavatyeva, ata āha---na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3000: na na' kaparamāṇūnāṃ rūpaṃ sthūle vartamānānāṃ tantūnāmiva paṭe pratyakṣaṃ vibhaktānāṃ veti na kathañcid viśeṣaviṣayatā pratyakṣasyeti ||177||
GSP28mimslovu:3001: nanu paramāṇava eva bhinnā' sañcitā gṛhyante na kāryadravyamekam /
GSP28mimslovu:3003: sañcitā eva cānanyavṛttitayā viśeṣāsādhāraṇādipadavācyā iti te pratyakṣā bhaviṣyanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3004: mā nāmaikaikata' paramāṇurakṣagocaro bhavedata āha--- bhedeneti /
GSP28mimslovu:3005: eko hi sarvadā sarveṣāṃ ca bāva' prakāśate na paramāṇubhedā' /
GSP28mimslovu:3006: na ca bhedenāgṛhyamāṇo 'bhedo gṛhyata iti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:3009: samudāyo na vāpyasti bhavatāṃ na ca sarvadā /
GSP28mimslovu:3015: vagraho yo 'yamabhinnaprakāśa',kiṃ bhedagrahaṇenāta āha---na ca bhinneti /
GSP28mimslovu:3019: ye hi sāmānyameva sarvajagatsaṃviditamapalapanti kutasteṣāṃ samudāyo
GSP28mimslovu:3021: api ca sarvadā sarve caikaṃ dravyamavabudhyatnate kathaṃ tadanyathā bhaviṣyatītyāha--- na ca sarvadeti ||179||
GSP28mimslovu:3023: na hi nānājātīyeṣu vṛkṣaghaṭaloṣṭeṣu kasyacit samudāyabuddhirasti /
GSP28mimslovu:3027: nanu nānekāvayavavṛttyanusandhānena vinā tatsāmānyarūpaṃ dravyamabhyupagantuṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:3028: na caindriyakaṃ jñānametā(vi?va) ti samarthamavikalpakatvāt tasya /
GSP28mimslovu:3031: tathāpi tadekarūpaṃ tāvannirvikalpakenāpi gṛhyata eveti nāpahnotuṃ śakyata iti vyāsajyavṛttyavayavisāmānyanyāyena prativyaktivartino 'pi
GSP28mimslovu:3033: tadapi sāmānyamityena rūpeṇāgrāhyaṃ vastuta' sāmānyameva gṛhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3036: ato naivaṃ vācyam--- astvavayavisāmānysaya svalakṣaṇāparanāmna indriyairgrahaṇam, na tu prativyaktiniveśina iti ||181||
GSP28mimslovu:3042: yo 'pahanute śaśasyāpi so 'bhāvaṃ śṛṅgato vadet // Msv_5,4.184 //
GSP28mimslovu:3046_0: sarvasya hi sunipuṇaṃ nirūpyamāṇasya rūpāde' sāmānyarūpatvād, dravyasya ca nānāvayavasādhāramasya tādrūpyāt, svattraṃ paramāṇusañcayamātrasya
GSP28mimslovu:3046_1: cānupalambhād dravyāpalāpe ca pratyakṣavirodhāt ato 'vayavisāmānyaṃ tatsamavetāni ca gotvādisāmānyāni sarvāṇyeva pratyakṣāṇi
GSP28mimslovu:3054: yaddhi pramāṇenopanīyate, tadasmābhiriṣyate, na ca sthūlaṃ hitvā paramāṇava evākṣajāyāṃ buddhau bhāsante, yattānupetya sthūlamavajānīmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:3055: tadānuguṇyena tu yadyaṇavo vyā(pa?pā) dyante, bhavantu, na tadvalena mūlabhūtaṃ sthūlamapalapitumutsahāmaha iti ||183||
GSP28mimslovu:3056: pratyakṣaṃ tu sthūlamadṛśyai' paramāṇubhi' nihanuvānasya śaśo 'pi
GSP28mimslovu:3060: tasmād yad gṛhyate vastu yena rūpeṇa sarvadā /
GSP28mimslovu:3063: tasmādasādhāraṇam akṣagamyaṃ vadan na sāmānyamapahanuvīta // Msv_5,4.187
GSP28mimslovu:3064: sāmānyarūpeṇa na gṛhyate cet kiṃ vāstyasādhāraṇabuddhiratra /
GSP28mimslovu:3067: na hyatra kalpanālāghavena pratyakṣasiddho dharmī paratyāgamarhati /
GSP28mimslovu:3068: siddhe ca tasmistadanuguṇā' paramāṇava iti kena neṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3069: siddhyupāyastu teṣāmanyo nāstīti paramāṇavo nāvaśyamiṣyanta ityuktaṃ bhavati ||185||
GSP28mimslovu:3070: ato yadeva vastu sāmānyaviśeṣayoraparokṣaṃ gṛhyate, tat tathaivāparokṣamapahnotuṃ śakyate
GSP28mimslovu:3072: ato yadyasādhāraṇaṃ pratyakṣamityāgraho bhavatāmevamapi na gotvādisāmānyamapratyakṣamiti pratyakṣasāmarthyasiddhatvānna śakyamapahnotumityāha--- sattāditi ||187||
GSP28mimslovu:3073: yadi tūcyate pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyamāṇamapi sāmānyaṃ na sāmānyollekhena gṛhyata iti(na) pratyakṣamiti, tadetadāśaṅkate---sāmānyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:3077: yadvastu loka' pratipadyate 'smin dvidhāpi tacchakyata eva vaktum //
GSP28mimslovu:3085: evaṃ tarhi dvyākārameva saṃmugdhaṃ vastu loka' pratipadyata iti parīkṣakairubhayathāpi tat śakyata eva vaktumiti siddhaṃ dvyākāremeva vastu pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3086: siddhaṃ ca sāmānyata' sambandhadarśanamityabhiprāyeṇāha--- yadvastu loka'
GSP28mimslovu:3087: pratipadyate 'smin dvidhāpi tat śakyata eva vaktumiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3093: nanu vṛttikāramate na parīkṣivyaṃ nimittamiti pratijñāyapratyakṣādīni hi prasiddhāni pramāṇāni tadantargataṃ ca śāstramityukte'
GSP28mimslovu:3095: śāstrasyāparīkṣā pratipādyata iti yuktam, taddhi prakṛtam, kimanumānena vyavadhīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3098: tathā hi nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti lokāyatikā manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:3102: tato mahāviṣayatayā prakṛtvena puruṣārthopayikatvena ca śāstram /
GSP28mimslovu:3103: tadanantaraṃ ca yatra kvacana vācye bahūnāṃ prasiddhamityupamānamuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:3107: abhāvapramāṇasya tu bhāvapramāṇābhāva evātmeti taduttara' prastāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:3108: ki punastantrāntareṣvevamimāni pramāṇāni prasiddhānīti prasiddhiprābalyaṃ kathitaṃ bhavati
GSP28mimslovu:3109: vyutthitāśca tena tena sākṣiṇā pratipāditā bhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3110: atra ca śabdavijñānādityucyate, tat kathaṃ vigṛhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3111: kiṃ śabdād vijñānaṃ śabdasya vā vijñānamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3114: uttaratra tu savikalpakapratyakṣe 'pi śāstratvaprasaṅga', śabdavijñānādeva hi gaurityevamādayo 'sannikṛṣṭārthavikalpā bhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3117: na ca savikalpake prasaṅga', na hi tacchabdapramāṇādutpadyate, api tu śabdasahāyādindriyāt
GSP28mimslovu:3118: yathaiva hi gandhasahakṛtamidandriyaṃ tailād vilīnaṃ ghṛtaṃ vivinakti /
GSP28mimslovu:3126: na śakyaṃ kevalaṃ vaktumito 'pyasya na vācyatā // Msv_5,5.2 //
GSP28mimslovu:3128: aviśiṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasya na tat śāstrasya lakṣaṇam // Msv_5,5.3 //
GSP28mimslovu:3133: kiṃ nāma tarhi śābdam, vākyārthajñānamiti vadāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:3142: idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kimidaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇavasare viśeṣalakṣamaṃ praṇīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3144: tad yadi vaktavyam, evamapi sāmānyalakṣaṇamuktvā( vakṣyate?lakṣyeta) /
GSP28mimslovu:3145: yat punaratitvaritenaiva sāmānyalakṣaṇavasare viśeṣo lakṣyate tadasāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:3146: na hīha pratyakṣādīnāṃ cākṣuṣatvādayo viśeṣā lakṣyante /
GSP28mimslovu:3147: tata' pratyakṣādiṣu sāmānyato vaktumārabdheṣu madhye śabdamātrasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam, na śāstrasyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:3150: nirjñātasāmānyalakṣaṇo hi tadviśeṣaṃ bodhayituṃ śakyo netara' /
GSP28mimslovu:3154: śabdavijñānādityādi lakṣaṇamapi lakṣyaviśeṣe na saṅgacchata ityāha---yaccoktamiti ||3||
GSP28mimslovu:3160: pravṛttirvā nivṛttirvā tacchāstraṃ na padādyata' // Msv_5,5.6 //
GSP28mimslovu:3161: ityupadeśakaṃ hi nityaṃ vedavākyamanityaṃ tharmaśāstrādikaṃ śāstramucyate na śabdamākṣamiti
GSP28mimslovu:3167: asti hi tatrāpi”vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāma”iti vidhyuddeśa' /
GSP28mimslovu:3170: nanvarthavādā na tāvat sākṣāt kriyāṃ pratipādayanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3172: trayo 'pi hi tadaṃśā' sādhyaṃ sādhanamitikartavyatā ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3176: ayamabhiprāya'--- yadyapi na kriyāṃ gamayati, na ca kriyāsambaddhaṃ kiñcit
GSP28mimslovu:3182: puruṣa' pravartate nivartate vā na vidhyuddeśamātrāditi sārthavādakameva
GSP28mimslovu:3186: yata eva sārthavādakāt pravṛttinivṛttijñānam, ata eva vidhinācina'
GSP28mimslovu:3187: pratyayamātrasyapadamātrasya vā yajetetyevamādikasya vidhiśrutāvapi kana śāstratvam /
GSP28mimslovu:3188: yatra hi tryaṃśabhāvanāvacanamapyavāntaravākyamanapekṣitārthavādakaṃ na pravṛttau samarthaṃ, kathamiva tatra padapratyayayo' śaktirbhaviṣyatīti
GSP28mimslovu:3197: ayamabhiprāya'--- vedavyākhyā hi prakṛtā, ato yadeva tadupayogi tadeva vācyamityatikramyāpi sāmānyaprakramaṃ viśeṣamevaṃ lakṣitavān /
GSP28mimslovu:3202: yadi svatantropayogitvanirapekṣāṇi na jalpati, tata' kimata āha---tatreti
GSP28mimslovu:3203: yadā hyayaṃ jalpāka iva nānupayuktaṃ bhāṣata iti sthitam, tatra yadi lokavākyasthitaṃ śabdalakṣaṇaṃ kathayet tadasya vedaṃ vyācikhyāsārenupayuktaṃ syāditi ||8||
GSP28mimslovu:3204: nanu yadyanupayuktaṃ na lakṣaṇīyaṃ, kimiti tarhi pratyakṣādi lakṣyate na hi teṣāṃ vedopayogo dṛśyate ata āha---pratyakṣādīti /
GSP28mimslovu:3206: pratyakṣasya, na hi tadantareṇa pura'--- parthamameva svādhyāyagrahaṇakāle varṇamātrādyavadhārayituṃ śakyate, tadā cānavadhṛtaṃ śāstrārthajñānavelāyāmasmṛtatvānnopayujyetaiva /
GSP28mimslovu:3207: ata' purastāt parastācca varṇamātrādita' kṛte pratyakṣādyupayogaṃ matvā
GSP28mimslovu:3213: abhāvo 'pi padavākye yattāvadhāraṇe dravyadevatādyabhāve ca karmaṇāmavyaktacodanātvāvadhāraṇa upayujyata iti dvayorādiśabdayorartha iti ||9||
GSP28mimslovu:3217: tasmāt tampayudāhratya sāmānyaṃ lakṣayet sukham // Msv_5,5.11 //
GSP28mimslovu:3221: na caivañjātīyaka' kaścidupayogo gāmānayetyādivākyasthasya śābdalakṣamasyāstīti tadupekṣyaiva śāstragatameva lakṣaṇaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:3223: yatpunaralakṣite sāmānye na viśeṣo lakṣayituṃ śakyata ityuktaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:3225: sāmānyalakṣaṇe hi viśeṣo na sidhyati, vyabhicārāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3226: viśeṣastu sāmānyāvyabhicārīti tasmin lakṣite tadantargataṃ sāmānyaṃ sukhameva lakṣitaṃ bhavet
GSP28mimslovu:3227: yadā hi vidhāyakavijñānādasannikṛṣṭer'the vijñānaṃ śāstramityuktaṃ tadārtād vidhāyakaviśeṣarahitācchabdamātrajñānācchābdamiti śakyamavagantumiti na pṛthagucyata iti ||11||
GSP28mimslovu:3235: ayaṃ cādhikārato viśeṣalābho jaimineraṣyanumataścodanāśabdamaviśeṣitaṃ dvitīye sūtre prayuñjānasyetyāha---yathā ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3236: evaṃ hi manyate--- yadyapi codanāśabda' pravartakavākyamātravacana',
GSP28mimslovu:3242: codanāyāmavatiṣṭhate,evamihāpi śāstralakṣame codanāprāmāṇyādhikārāt śabdavijñānārthajñānaśabdau viśiṣṭaśabdārthaparau,vidhāyake śabdaśabdo vidheye cārthaśabda iti ||13||
GSP28mimslovu:3247: yadi vidhāyakaśabdajanitaṃ vijñānaṃ śāstram, kimidānīmaṅgāni mīmāṃsā karmānuśāsanāni ca na sāstrāṇi, laukikāni ca gāmānayetyādivākyāni śāstrāṇi
GSP28mimslovu:3252: mīmāṃsādiṣu vedavat tato 'pi vā sātiśayaṃ śāstraśabdopacāramupalabhāmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:3253: api cāyaṃ śāstraśabdo rūḍho vā syād yaugiko vā, sarvathā, sarvathā ca vaidāṅgādiṣu vartitumarhati, asti hi teṣu yathāyathamarthānusāsanaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:3260: nanu vidhāyakaṃ śāstramiti śāstralakṣamam,na ca tāni kañcid vidadhati /
GSP28mimslovu:3265: ato yacchāstraṃ tatpravṛttinuvṛttyupadeśakameveti niyama', na punastadupadeśakaṃ śāstrameveti laukikī prasiddhiriha bhāṣyakāreṇānūditā,
GSP28mimslovu:3271: vivakṣādi ca dhūmādau nāstītyetena bhinnatā // Msv_5,5.16 //
GSP28mimslovu:3272: gocaraṃ puruṣaśreyovidhāyakaṃ loke śāstramiti prasiddhaṃ tacchāstram /
GSP28mimslovu:3278: pūrvapramāṇe cottaraṃ vākyārthajñānaṃ phalaṃ tatprāmāṇye ca hānādibuddhiriti viveka iti ||14||
GSP28mimslovu:3281: idaṃ ca pratijñāmātrameva teṣāmuktama, tadīyābhedahetūpanyāsastu paroktabhedahetunirāsāvasare kariṣyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3282: kiṃ punarabhedopanyāsanirāsayo' prayasyate, nanvayaṃ sāṅkhyādibhireva bhedavādibhirabhedo nirākṛta eva, ata āha--- bheda iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3286: evaṃ hi tairuktam--- śābde hi pūravasaṃskārayukto 'ntyo varṇo, vākyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:3287_0: ādyo 'pi vā varṇa', sarve vā pratyekaṃ, sahitā vā, teṣāmeva krama' padānāṃ vā vākyatvajātireva vāvayavī vā nirdhūtanikhilavarṇādivibhāga'
GSP28mimslovu:3287_1: sphoṭo vā padānyava vā saṃhatyārthamabhidadhati ete ca padeṣvapi vikalpā darśayitavyā' /
GSP28mimslovu:3289: sarvamidaṃ dhūmādau na dṛṣṭamiti tadvaidharmyāda(na) numānatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3292: dhūmādagnyanumānavadityukte, yadetad dhūmādivairadharmyeṇa pratyavasthānam,iyaṃ vaidharmyasamā nāma jāti', vikalpāsamā vā /
GSP28mimslovu:3295: vādinā hi pruyakte prayoge prasaṅgo jāyate, sa jāyata iti jātirityucyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3299: yatrodāharaṇasādharmyeṇa vādinā heturukta', tatra yadā prativādino
GSP28mimslovu:3302: prativādino vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ bhavati--- yathā kriyāvad dravyamavibhu daṣṭam, yathā loṣṭam,na tathātmā, tasmānniṣkriya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3305: yadā pritavādinā sādhya(vār)masyāpi vikalpa āpādyate, asau vikalpasamā nāma jātirucyate
GSP28mimslovu:3306: yathāsminneva prayoge prativādī vadati, kriyāhetuguṇayuktaṃ kiñcidavibhu dṛṣṭaṃ yathā loṣṭam, kiñcid vibhu yathātmā, evaṃ kiñcit kriyāvad
GSP28mimslovu:3308: evamihāpi pareṇābedasādhane ukte dhumādivaidharmyamātreṇa pratyavasthāne vaidharmyasamā nāma jātirāpādyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3313: anvayavyatirekajameva kiñcid vākyavikalpādimad dṛṣṭaṃ yathā śābdam,
GSP28mimslovu:3317: kathaṃ punariyaṃ jāti', evaṃ hi sādhanamidam--- śābdamanumānād bhinnaṃ tadvaidharmyātaṃ pratyakṣavaditi,ata āha---dhūmeti /
GSP28mimslovu:3319_0: kiñcid viśeṣaṇamātreṇa tu vaidharmyamaviśiṣṭamarthātmakānānumānānāmiti teṣāmapyanumānād bhedo bhavet na cāsāvāsti, na hi
GSP28mimslovu:3327: vailakṣaṇyamātreṇa tu bhedaṃ vadato vailakṣaṇyavacanasya jātataivāpadyetetyāha---trailakṣaṇyeti
GSP28mimslovu:3328: yadapi cadamaparaṃ śābdānumānayorvailakṣaṇyamuktam--- dhūmādayo hi sāvābhāvikenaiva pratibandhena
GSP28mimslovu:3329: janayatanti, śabdāttu yatheṣṭaviniyuktādevārthapratyayo dṛśyate, ato bheda iti, tatrāpyāha---yatheti
GSP28mimslovu:3330: ayamabhiprāya'--- atrāpi yadi kiñcidvaidharmyamātreṇa bheda ucyate, ato jātireva /
GSP28mimslovu:3334: atha svagocare yatheṣṭaviniyogena pratipādanaṃ heturucyate, ato liṅgamapi parārthaprayoge yameva prati prayujyate tameva pratipādayatīti sāmanam /
GSP28mimslovu:3336: yatraiva saṅketyate tameva gamayatīti, tato dṛṣṭāntābhāva', na hi śabdādanyat saṅketānuvidhānenārthaṃ bodhayati /
GSP28mimslovu:3338: anumānaṃ hi yatheṣṭaviniyogānanuvidhāyipratipādanam, na cedaṃ tathā, ato bhinnamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3341: na cāyaṃ heturanumānādabedena vyāpta' kvacidavagata', śabdātirekiṇa'
GSP28mimslovu:3347: evaṃ ca sati tenaiva vyabhicāra iti nānumānād vyāvṛttirheto' sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:3364: na hi yādṛśe sanniveśe vyāptiravagatā tādṛśasya vyabhicāro dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3373: idamaparaṃ bhedakāraṇaṃ, śabdāddhi puruṣāpekṣor'thaniścaya', na ca tathā
GSP28mimslovu:3378: yādṛśo hi saṅketo yadarthapratipādane puruṣai' kṛta', tameva parapuraṣāpekṣayā budhyante /
GSP28mimslovu:3381: padāni hi svamahimnaivārthaṃ pratipādayanti na puruṣāpekṣayā /
GSP28mimslovu:3393: ayamabhiprāya'--- arthapratipādane tāvadanapekṣameva padaṃ vaidikāni ca vākyāni /
GSP28mimslovu:3405: api ca paroktābhedahetunirāso 'pi tairna kṛta ityāha--- uktā ceti ||22
GSP28mimslovu:3420_0: tadayamanvayo bhavati--- yadyapyāptavādavisaṃvādaviśeṣāṇāṃ bhedānna sambandho 'vagantuṃ śakyate, tathāpi tayo' sāmānyapratītyānumānatā
GSP28mimslovu:3420_1: śakyate vaktum, sāmānyayorvyāptasambhavāditi nanvidamasti bhedakāraṇam, anumānaṃ sambandhāvadhāraṇādhīnam,
GSP28mimslovu:3422: ato bhidyate ityata āha--- na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3423: gavādayastāvat viditasambandhā evārthaṃ pratipādayantīti teṣāṃ durvāramanumānatvam, yadi tvapūrvādidṛṣṭāntena teṣāmapi bhedo 'bhidhīyate
GSP28mimslovu:3425: śaknoti hi vaktumitaro 'pi teṣāmanumānatvaṃ sambandhāvadhīnabodhakatvād dhūmādivaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3426: api cāpūrvaśabdā api nāśvādiśabdebyo viśiṣyante, padatvenābhedādityāha---
GSP28mimslovu:3429: yata' khalvetāni padāni, na ca padamajñātasambandhaṃ prakāśakamasti /
GSP28mimslovu:3437: ato yat parairuktaṃ śabdo nānumānaṃ sambandhānapekṣatvādakṣavaditi taddhetorasiddhyā dūṣitamityāha--- sambandheti ||25||
GSP28mimslovu:3450: ekānto nirṇaya', so 'sya kāryaṃ, tannāstītyanekānta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3452: yādṛśaṃ hi darpaṇe bimbamupalabhyate tādṛśameva mukhādi budhyate, ato
GSP28mimslovu:3455: nanu naidamanumānam, ādarśatejasā hi pratihatena nāyanena tejasā prakāśitaṃ pratyakṣameva mukhamavagamyata iti śabdādhikaraṇe vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3458: pratibimbena tādṛktve viditavyāptirbhavati, tadā mukhamapyādarśagataṃ bimbānurūpamanuminoti
GSP28mimslovu:3467: yadapīdamuktam--- śābde hi sakṛduktameva vākyaṃ sahasā nānārthān
GSP28mimslovu:3468: pratibhāsayati viruddhānaviruddhāṃśca, codanālakṣaṇor'tho dharma', śveto dhāvatīti ca yathā, naivamanumāne /
GSP28mimslovu:3471: prayogaśca bhavati--- śabdo 'numānād bhinna' ekadā nānārthapratibhāsādakṣavaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3479: prakāśayati, yathā dhūmādi,na ca tathā śabda',ato bhidyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3486: tathā viruddha'- nitya' śabda' kṛtakatvāditi, vivakṣānusāreṇa tāvannityatāṃ pratipādayati, vyāptibalena cānityatvamato 'naikāntiko
GSP28mimslovu:3488: nanu na viruddho 'naikamartha pratipādayati, vyāptibalena hi liṅgaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:3494: vivakṣitārthapratipādane hi śabdasya śaktiravagatā, ata' so
GSP28mimslovu:3497: bhūyasāṃ caikārthānāṃ vākyānāṃ nānena hetunā bheda'
GSP28mimslovu:3499: na kevalaṃ viruddhamanekaṃ śabdo na pratipādayati, kintu aviruddhamapi /
GSP28mimslovu:3503: nanvasti tāvadanekārthapratibhānaṃ śabdāta, pramāṇaṃ tvekatra bhavatu
GSP28mimslovu:3504: nāma, etāvatā ca siddhamanumānād vaidharmyamata āha---yastviti /
GSP28mimslovu:3509: atra prayukta ityevaṃ budhyante hi cirāt kvacit // Msv_5,5.34 //
GSP28mimslovu:3516: bhavati hi dūrād dhūmo 'yamāhosvid dhūlisantāna iti saṃśayānasyāgnivātāvartayoranavasthito vitarka iti ||32||
GSP28mimslovu:3517: tathā śabde dṛṣṭāntānabhidhānamapi dhūmādau vyabhicārānna bhedaheturityāha---dṛṣṭānteti
GSP28mimslovu:3519: nanvaprasiddhe tāvadasti dṛṣṭāntāpekṣā, śabde tu tadapi nāstītyata
GSP28mimslovu:3522: yatra hyaprasiddhapadārthagocara' saṃśayo bhavati, tatra yāvadayaṃ śabdo
GSP28mimslovu:3523: 'muṣminnarthe vṛddhairācarita iti cireṇa praṇidhāya na budhyate, na tāvat tamarthaṃ niścinuyāditi
GSP28mimslovu:3524: tadevaṃ tāvad bhedavādibhirna bhedahetava' samyaguktā iti darśitam ||34||
GSP28mimslovu:3525: bauddhoktābhedahetunirāso 'pi tairna kṛta ityāha--- paroktā iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3527: asyārtha'--- yathā dhūmādagnyanumānamanvayavyatirekajam, ekasya ca dhūmasya pratyakṣadarśanāt,
GSP28mimslovu:3532: sambandhapūrvakaṃ ca bhavati, evaṃ śabdādapi jñānaṃ jāyamānamevaṃ jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3533: pratyakṣācca tadanyat pramāṇaṃ, pratyakṣādṛṣṭaṃ cārthaṃ bodhayati,
GSP28mimslovu:3540: na ca katavācyamanvayavyatirekajatvāt sambandhapūrvakatvaṃ na bhidyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3542: pūrvaṃ hi sambandhaviśeṣajatvaṃ heturukta' idānīṃ tvavivakṣitaviśeṣaṃ sambandhasāmānyapūrvakatvamiti
GSP28mimslovu:3548: ayamabhiprāya'--- yadayadaparicchinne pavartate tat tato bhidyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3552: kiṃ puna' pratyakṣād bhedapratipādanena prayojanam, na hi tadabheda'
GSP28mimslovu:3558: evaṃ hi manyate--- vidyamānopalambhanaṃ pratyakṣamiti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:3559: idaṃ tu śābdaṃ trikālārthaviṣayamata' kathaṃ pratyakṣe 'ntarbhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:3561: prayogaśca bhavati--- śābdaṃ pratyakṣād bhinnaṃ tadaparicchinnaviṣayatvād anumānavaditi ||38||
GSP28mimslovu:3563: pratyaya' kinnimittor'the vaktṛbuddhe' kuto vasau // Msv_5,5.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:3566: evaṃ hi manyate--- yadyanumānāparicchinnaviṣatayā bhedo 'bhidhīyate, tarhi
GSP28mimslovu:3567: puṃvākyānāmanāgamatvam, pramāṇāntaraparicchinnaviṣayavāt, vedavākyānyeva tu mānāntarāviṣayārthāni bhidyante ityavyāpako heturiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3568: kiṃ punaridamaniṣṭamāpāditam, nanviṣyata eva puṃvacasāmanāgamatvam, āgamo hi śāstram,aprāpte śāstramarthavaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3571: ata eva śāstrameva vedavākyaṃ bhinnatayā pakṣīkṛtaṃ 'śāstramarthe
GSP28mimslovu:3577: kimasti tebhyor'thapratyayo na vā, na tāvannāsti,
GSP28mimslovu:3580: na ca śabdādanyannimittamasyopapadyata iti jātamasandagdhamabādhitaṃ ca jñānāntareṇa pramāṇameva puṃvacanajanitaṃ jñānamiti nāsyānāgamatvābyupagamo yukta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3582: ayamabhiprāya'--- visaṃvādabhūyiṣṭāni hi puṃvacanāni, tannaitāni śrutamātrāṇyevārthaṃ niścāyayanti
GSP28mimslovu:3583: na cāniścitor'tho jñāto bhavati, niścayasyaiva jñānatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3584: ata' praṅ(?) niścayotpatterjñānābhāva evanti kiṃ nimittaprayatnena /
GSP28mimslovu:3585: yadā tu vaktaivamavadhāritavyāptirbhavati--- 'na cāyamanavagataṃ bravītī'ti, tadā tadvākyādeva jñānakāryāt kāraṇabhūtaṃ jñāyamanumāya jñānasyārthāvyabhicāreṇārtho niścīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3590: na cāsyā' kiñcidavagame kāraṇastīti vakṣyāma iti ||39||
GSP28mimslovu:3591: na śabdārthasya sā liṅgaṃ na śabdo 'syā' kathañcana /
GSP28mimslovu:3592: viśeṣo gamyate tābhyāṃ na caitasyānumeyatā // Msv_5,5.40 //
GSP28mimslovu:3596: nanūktaṃ kāryāt śabdādanumāsyate, ata āha--- na śabda iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3597: yatā nobhayamubhayatra liṅgaṃ, tathā darśayati--- viśeṣa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3598_0: anumānaṃ hi vyāptibalena bhavati, iha ca vākyasāmānyaṃ jñānasāmānyena vyāptamavagatamiti tatastat sidhyed, jñānamātrāccārthamātram,
GSP28mimslovu:3600: nanu yatrāpto vākyaṃ prayuṅkte tadeva jñātvā prayuṅkta iti vijñānaviśeṣeṇaiva sambandho 'vagata'
GSP28mimslovu:3602: yadyevam, avagatastarhi prāgeva vākyādartha', na hyanyathā yatra prayuṅkta iti śakyate pratinirdeṣṭum
GSP28mimslovu:3603: na cārthoparāgamantareṇa jñānasya viśeṣa' sambhavati yo 'numīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3606: na cāniścitaṃ jñānaṃ, saṃśayātmano vijñānavidhāyā darśitatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3608: yā tu kvacid vyabhicārādaprāmāṇyāśaṅkā sā āptatvādinā nirākriyata ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:3609: yadi tveva jñānaviśeṣāvagatirucyate, ya evamavadhārito bhavati---
GSP28mimslovu:3612: kimidānīṃ viditapadapadārthasaṅgati' śrotā puṃvākyādarthaṃ na budhyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:3614: jātā tu buddhirasandigdhāviparyastā ca na vaidavākyajanitāyā dhiyo viśiṣyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:3615: śaṅkāmātraṃ tu kathañcid vede 'pi vākyatvādinā bhavatīti na tāvatā tadaprāmāṇyam /
GSP28mimslovu:3620: liṅgaṃ hi śabda evāsya dhūmo 'gneriva kalpate // Msv_5,5.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:3635: nanvarthātmanā tāvadalliṅgenānanumitapūrvamarthaṃ vedo bodhayatīti pramāṇāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3637: yadi tu tadeva nāstītyucyate, tat tarhi vacanīyam,
GSP28mimslovu:3641: ayaṃ hi teṣāmabhiprāya'--- codanāprāmāṇyaṃ hi pratijñātaṃ, taccānumānatve
GSP28mimslovu:3658: yadi paścānmānasāmānyādanumānatvaṃ tadastu, na ca tadabhyupagame doṣa
GSP28mimslovu:3664: puṃvākyānāmanena prakāreṇānumānatvāt prāmāṇyaṃ siddhyati na vedavacasāmiti
GSP28mimslovu:3672: nanu pramāṇāntarakasaṅgatārthāni vedaikadeśabhūtāni kṣepiṣṭhādivākyāni dṛṣṭvā itarāṇyapyagnihotrādivākyāni vedatvāt satyārthānyanumāsyante /
GSP28mimslovu:3677: samā loke ca vede ca siddhā vedapramāṇatā // Msv_5,5.51 //
GSP28mimslovu:3679: nāptasya sambhavo vede loke nāsmāt pramāṇatā // Msv_5,5.52 //
GSP28mimslovu:3680: purastād varṇitaṃ hyetat tasmāt śabdena yā mati' /
GSP28mimslovu:3681: tasyā' svata' pramāṇatvaṃ na cet syāddoṣadarśanam // Msv_5,5.53 //
GSP28mimslovu:3684: nanu nedaṃ vākyamasatyārtham, ādityaśabdo hi sārupyād gauṇo yūpe vartata
GSP28mimslovu:3685: iti tatsiddhisūtre vakṣyate, ata āha--- tadvaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3687: api ca prāk svamahimnā vedaprāmāṇyabalenāprāmāṇyānumānāni pratyuktāni /
GSP28mimslovu:3689: ato lakṣaṇabhedenaiva śabdasya pramāṇāntaratve iṣyamāṇe vedā' pramāṇaṃ bhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3694: loke 'pi nāptatvaṃ prāmāṇye kāraṇamityāha--- loka iti ||52||
GSP28mimslovu:3697: prāmāṇyaṃ tu sarvasaṃvidāṃ sahajameveti svata'prāmāṇyevāde varṇitamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3701: pade tāvatkṛto yatna' parairityatra varṇyate // Msv_5,5.54 //
GSP28mimslovu:3705: na tāvadanumānaṃ hi yāvat tadviṣayaṃ na tat // Msv_5,5.56 //
GSP28mimslovu:3708: evañjātīyakasya śabdasya cānumānena prāmāṇyameva samaṃ, na
GSP28mimslovu:3713: tathāpi parai' padānyudāhṛtya vicāra' kṛta iti tadbhedameva pratipādayāma'
GSP28mimslovu:3718: ākṛtyadhikaraṇe hi padasya sāmānyaviṣayatvaṃ sthāpayiṣyata iti ||55||
GSP28mimslovu:3723: nanvanumāne vyāptibalena dharmasāmānyamanumīyata ityata āha--- na tāvaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3724: yāvat tadanumānaṃ tadviṣayaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣayaṃ na bhavati tāvadanumānameva na bhavati, na dharmamā(traṃ?traviṣayaṃ) siddhatvādityuktamiti ||56||
GSP28mimslovu:3725: nanu padamapi viśiṣṭagocaraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā--- ko rājā yātīti pṛṣṭe para'
GSP28mimslovu:3727: tadā kevalādeva pāñcālarājapadāt kriyāviśiṣṭa' puruṣo 'vagamyate, ata
GSP28mimslovu:3731: yatrāpi te pratīyante tatra vyakterviśeṣaṇam // Msv_5,5.58 //
GSP28mimslovu:3733: vākyārthe 'pi padaṃ yatra gomadādi prayujyate // Msv_5,5.59 //
GSP28mimslovu:3735: tāvāneva hi tatrāptho ya' pūrvamavadhārita' // Msv_5,5.60 //
GSP28mimslovu:3736: kiñcit śābde sāmānyādatiriktamavagamyate sa vākyasyaiva viṣaya' /
GSP28mimslovu:3738: nanvastu śrutasyānuṣaṅga' , aśrute 'pi padāntare padādekasmād viśiṣṭabodho
GSP28mimslovu:3739: dṛṣṭa', yathā--- dvāramityukte vivriyatāmiti, atra kathamata āha---
GSP28mimslovu:3741: kārakaṃ hi kriyayā viditavyāptikam, vyāptisāmarthyādeva kriyāpadamanumāpayati /
GSP28mimslovu:3745: yatra hi saṅkhyādayo 'vagamyante tatra kathamata āha--- yatrāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:3747: ākṛtistu na tāvadekatvaṃ vyabhicarati, dvitvādayastvekatvānna sambhavantīti tadākṣiptāyā vyaktereva viśeṣaṇaṃ saṅkhyādaya iti ||58||
GSP28mimslovu:3748: tadevaṃ tāvadanurañjanena vyakterviśeṣaṇamityuktam, tādarthyena tu kriyāṃ
GSP28mimslovu:3751: yathā paśorekatve 'ruṇādiṣu ca vakṣyata ityāha--- padantareti /
GSP28mimslovu:3754: yattarhi vākyārthavṛttiviśiṣṭaviṣayaṃ gomadādipadaṃ tadanumānaṃ bhaviṣyatyata āha--- vākyārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3756: siddho hi dharmī kenacid dharmeṇāsiddhena viśiṣṭa' sādhyamāna' pakṣo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:3757: iha tu padoñcāraṇāt prāṅ na kiñcit pratipannam /
GSP28mimslovu:3758: uccarite tu pade viśiṣṭa' pratipanna eveti kiṃ sādhyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3763: atha śabdor'thavattvena pakṣa' kasmānna kalpyate // Msv_5,5.62 //
GSP28mimslovu:3765: pakṣe dhūmaviśeṣe ca sāmānyaṃ heturiṣyate // Msv_5,5.63 //
GSP28mimslovu:3768: gṛhītasambandhastu pratipadyamāno vyutpattikālāvagatānana kiñcidadhikaṃ pratyetīti kathamanumānaṃ bhavatīti ||60||
GSP28mimslovu:3773: idaṃ tu pācakādiśabdeṣu yuktaṃ vaktum, tatra hi (dhātunā) pāka' pratyayena cakartṛmātramupāttam
GSP28mimslovu:3775: gomadādau tu tadasyāstīti viśiṣṭa evārthe taddhita' smaryata iti kuto
GSP28mimslovu:3784: atrāpi śabdasyaiva pranthamāvagatasyārthaviśiṣṭatvena sādhyatvānna kramavyatikramo bhaviṣyatīti
GSP28mimslovu:3786: pratijñārtha' pakṣa' sa ca dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī, viśiṣṭāpekṣayā dharmyekadeśa ucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3788: śabdo hi dharmitayopātta' sa eva heturiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3789: nanu yadā dūrād dhūsyādhāraviśeṣo na lakṣyate tadā dhūmo 'gnimattayā
GSP28mimslovu:3796: kathaṃ vāsya viśiṣṭatvaṃ na tāvad deśakālata' // Msv_5,5.65 //
GSP28mimslovu:3799: dṛśyamāna' pakṣa' pūrvāvagata' sapakṣa' tadanugataṃ ca sāmānyaṃ heturiti pakṣasapakṣahetuvibhāgopapattiriti
GSP28mimslovu:3800: nanvihāpi śabdaviśeṣaṃ pakṣīkṛtya śabdatvaṃ hetuṃ vakṣyāma', ata āha---
GSP28mimslovu:3802: arthaviśeṣo hyanumitsita', na cāsya śabdatvaṃ gamakamanaikāntikatvāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3807: nanu vyañjakabhedabhinnaikaiva vyakti' pakṣīkariṣyate ityāha--- bhavediti
GSP28mimslovu:3809: naupādhiko bhedo vastu bhinatti, tatpratyayānapāyāditi bhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:3810: api ca viśiṣṭatā sambandhe sati bhavati, tadiha kīdṛśor'thaśabdayośabdayo'
GSP28mimslovu:3812: na tāvat śabdadeśer'tho dṛśyate,mukhe hi śabda' bhūmāvartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:3813: nāpi śabdakāle, kalau kṛtayugārthasyābhāvādityāha--- na tāvaditi ||65||
GSP28mimslovu:3814: arthārthapratītyā viśiṣṭa' śabda' sādhyate, asti hi sā śabdakāla iti tadetadāśaṅkate--- tatpratītiriti /
GSP28mimslovu:3816: pratītyā viśiṣṭe 'numīyamāne sā tāvat pūrvasiddhā grahītavyā /
GSP28mimslovu:3818: nanu sampratyupalabhyamānaṃ dutādiviśeṣaṃ pakṣīkṛtya tasya pratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭatā sādhyate sapakṣaṃ ca vyutpattikālā
GSP28mimslovu:3820: sāmānyasyaiva śaktve pakṣo hetustathaiva ca // Msv_5,5.67 //
GSP28mimslovu:3822: kathaṃ ca pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasyeha nirupyate // Msv_5,5.68 //
GSP28mimslovu:3824: rājā bhartā manuṣyasya tena rājña' sa ucyate // Msv_5,5.69 //
GSP28mimslovu:3825: vagataviśeṣam,ubhayānugataṃ gośabdasāmānyaṃ hetuṃ kariṣyāma', na pratijñārthaikadeśatā bhaviṣyatyata āha --- na pratyāyaneti ayamabhiprāya'
GSP28mimslovu:3833: yattu teṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ gośabda' sapratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭa' tatra ca pakṣe sa eva pakṣo hetuścetyuktamevetyāha sāmānyasyeti ||67||
GSP28mimslovu:3835: evaṃ tāvat śabdo na pakṣa ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:3841: kasyāñcit kriyāyāṃ kartṛtayā sambaddhaṃ kiñcit kasyacit sambandhī bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:3844: pratamaṃ hi bharaṇakriyāyāṃ kartṛkarmabhāvamāpannau rājapuruṣau svasvāmisambandhamanubhavata iti ||69||
GSP28mimslovu:3845: vṛkṣastiṣṭhati śākhāsu tā vā tatreti tasya tā' /
GSP28mimslovu:3846: deśe 'gnimati dhūmasya kartṛtvaṃ bhavanaṃ prati // Msv_5,5.70 //
GSP28mimslovu:3857: evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi kriyāgarbha evetyāha--- deśa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3858: agnimaddeśe bhavane kartā bhavan dhūmo 'gnimato deśasya saṃyogī bhavatīti||
GSP28mimslovu:3861: kiṇvaṃ hi surāyā bījaṃ surātmake pariṇāme kartṛbhavatsurāyā'
GSP28mimslovu:3864: senākāryaṃ pratipakṣajayamaṃśena kurvan hastī senāyā' sambandhitayocyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3866: na cānirūpitākāra' sambandho 'stīti śakyate vaktumityāha--- na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3867: na ca sambandhamantareṇa pakṣasya dharma iti vigrahagatā ṣaṣṭhī pakṣadharma iti ca tatpuruṣasamāso vā ghaṭata ityāha---na cāstīti /
GSP28mimslovu:3874: na taddeśādisadbhāvo nābhimukhyādi tasya vā // Msv_5,5.74 //
GSP28mimslovu:3876: tena tadviṣaya' śabda iti dharmatvakalpanā // Msv_5,5.75 //
GSP28mimslovu:3884: na kenāpi prakāreṇa viṣayaviṣayibhāvo ghaṭata ityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:3885: yathā na ghaṭate tadetadāha--- na taditi ||74||
GSP28mimslovu:3892: tatastavyatirekeṇa pakṣadharmatāyā evapānupapatteritaretarāśrayatvamato neyamapi kalpanā ghaṭata ityāha---gamakatvāditi ||77||
GSP28mimslovu:3894: anavagatavācyavācakasambandhā' svarūpātirekeṇa na śabdaṃ kasyacid dharmatayā jānanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3902: na ca dharmī gṛhīto 'tra yena taddharmatā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:3904: yaścātra kathyate dharmī prameyo 'sya sa eva na' /
GSP28mimslovu:3906: svarūpamātravijñānaṃ tu na dhūmādau pakṣadharmatāyāṃ hetu', api tu dharmisambandha' /
GSP28mimslovu:3908: nanvatrāpyarthena dharmiṇā pratamaṃ vyutpattikāle sambandho 'vagata eva,
GSP28mimslovu:3910: pūrvasambandhanirapekṣa evāyamavyutpannasambandhasyāpi pakṣadharmasambandho māsate, na cātra
GSP28mimslovu:3911: yata eva tannirapekṣo 'yaṃ pakṣadharmasambandha', ata eva taduttarasmāt
GSP28mimslovu:3912: sapakṣasattvalakṣaṇād bhidyate, anyathā tadabheda eva syādityāha--- teneti
GSP28mimslovu:3913: trīṇi hetorlakṣaṇāni pakṣadharmatā sapakṣe sattā vipakṣād vyāvṛtti' /
GSP28mimslovu:3919: arthādanyastāvad dharmī na pramīyata iti bhāva' ||82||
GSP28mimslovu:3920: yastvasāvartho dharmitayā kalpanīya', yaddharmatayāvagata' śabda' pakṣa
GSP28mimslovu:3921: prāk sa cet pakṣadharmatvād gṛhīta' kiṃ tata' param /
GSP28mimslovu:3923: anvayo na ca śabdas prameyena nirūpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3926: na tvevaṃ yatra śabdo 'sti tatrārtho 'stīti niścaya' // Msv_5,5.86 //
GSP28mimslovu:3933: dharmo bhavati, parastādapi sa tāvāneva pramātavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:3934: tad yadi pakṣadharmatvamavagantumasau prathamamevāvagamyate, tato gṛhīte tasmin kiṃ parabhāvinā pakṣadharmādijñānena ato nānumānatetyāha---yaścetidvayena ||83,84||
GSP28mimslovu:3949: śatakṛtva' prayukte 'pi na ca dṛṣṭārthadhī' kvacit // Msv_5,5.91 //
GSP28mimslovu:3967: yadi jñātasambandhasyānvaya', anya eva tarhi sambandha'
GSP28mimslovu:3983: yuktā na tu padajñānāt padārtho 'tra pramāyate // Msv_5,5.99 //
GSP28mimslovu:3987: na hyanavagater'the tajjñānena vinā śabdajñānaṃ bhavatīti vyatireka'
GSP28mimslovu:3991: śaktini (ṣkarṣe) yorvyāpāro vācyavācakarūpa' śabdārthayo' sambandha iti ||97||
GSP28mimslovu:3992: evaṃ ca trailakṣaṇyaparityāgenānanumānatvaṃ prasādhya prayogeṇa darśayati---tasmāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:4001: pratyakṣe ca parokṣe ca jñāte 'jñāte 'pi vā purā // Msv_5,5.100 //
GSP28mimslovu:4005: sambandho na ca tasyārtho yor'tha' sa tvakṣagocara' // Msv_5,5.102 //
GSP28mimslovu:4010: yathā na pramāṇaṃ tathā darśayati--- padamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4012: eṣvartheṣu prayuktasya yathā na prāmāṇyaṃ tathāha--- tatreti ||101||
GSP28mimslovu:4015: sambandhajñānameva vā tadā jāyata ityāha--- sambandheti /
GSP28mimslovu:4016: na ca sambandha eva padasya prameya iti vācyam,
GSP28mimslovu:4020: anubhūte tu parokṣe smṛtirityāha--- parokṣa iti ||103||
GSP28mimslovu:4021: nanu smṛtimeva janayat pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatyata āha--- pramita iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4022: pramitaviṣayā hi smṛti', sannikṛṣṭārthagocaraṃ ca pramāṇamiti sthitiriti /
GSP28mimslovu:4023: kathaṃ puna' pramitaviṣayaṃ na pramāṇamata āha--- paricchedeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4025: na ca smṛtyā kiñcit paricchidyate, pūrvavijñānamātropasthāpakatvāditi
GSP28mimslovu:4027: pratyabhijñānavat kasmāt smṛte 'pi na kalpyate // Msv_5,5.105 //
GSP28mimslovu:4029: smṛtyā tadanusāreṇa tadā sattve 'sya naiva dhī' // Msv_5,5.106 //
GSP28mimslovu:4031: yadādhikyaṃ bhavet kiñcit tatpadasya na gocara' // Msv_5,5.107 //
GSP28mimslovu:4035: yadyapi pūrvamasāvartho 'vagata', tathāpi tadānīṃ sattāṃ bodhayantī pratyabhijñānavat smṛti' pramāṇaṃ kimiti na bhavatīti ||105||
GSP28mimslovu:4037: utpadyate smṛtiranyadā, na tu pratyabhijñānavat tadanīṃ vastu' sattāṃ
GSP28mimslovu:4039: nanu pūrvasaṃskāramātrajā hi smṛti', idaṃ tu pratyutpannakāraṇakaṃ padāt padārthajñānaṃ grahaṇameva, kathaṃ smṛtirucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4041: mā bhūt smaraṇaṃ, grahamapīdamanadhikaviṣayamevādhikapratibhāsābhāvāt, ato na padaṃ smārakebhya' sadṛśādṛṣṭādibhyo viśiṣyata ityapramāṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4044: ata' kathamucyate nādhikyamavagatamyata ityata āha--- yadādhikyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4046: idaṃ cāsmābhi' sauhṛdamātreṇa śiṣyebhya' kathyate na padaṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4047: na tu tatpramāṇatve vākyārtho nāgamārtho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4048: tena hi pramāṇenāpi bhavatāvaśyaṃ padārthe bhavitavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:4055: sarveṣāṃ ca paroktānāṃ vākyād buddhāvasiddhatā // Msv_5,5.110 //
GSP28mimslovu:4060: evañca darśayitavyaṃ vākyārthabuddharanumānād bhinnā sambandhanubhavādṛte jāyamānatvād akṣabuddhivaditi
GSP28mimslovu:4063: ye ca parai' padārthabuddheranumānādabhedahetava uktā', te tāvad bahavo
GSP28mimslovu:4075: na ca padāt padārthajñāne vyāpti' kāraṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:4078: yata evaivaṃ vākyārthabuddha' sahārthairadṛṣṭeṣvapi vākyeṣu padārthamātravido jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4096: asyāyaṃ tātparyārtha'--- upāmānamapi na parīkṣaṇīyam, evaṃ lakṣamakatvenāvyabhicārāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:4098: dṛśyamānapratiyogisādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayāsannikṛṣṭer'the yāṃ buddhimutpādayati 'etatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'sā'viti, sopamānamiti, sopamānamiti ca yattadoradhyāhāra' /
GSP28mimslovu:4099: na ca vācyaṃ viṣayaviśeṣānupādānāt kathaṃ sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaviṣayā buddhiravagamyata iti, prasiddhapramāṇānuvādena hyatrāparīkṣā pratipādyate
GSP28mimslovu:4120: ato yathā naiyāyikoktamupamānaṃ pramāṇamāśrīyate, evaṃ taduktamevopamānalakṣaṇamāśrayitumucitam
GSP28mimslovu:4123: gavayāde' kañcidanabhijñaṃ prati sādhanaṃ prajñāpanaṃ yādṛśo gaustādṛśo
GSP28mimslovu:4124: gavaya ici vākyaṃ, tajjanitā vā buddhirupamānamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4133: evaṃ hi naiyāyikānāṃ śābdalakṣaṇam 'āptopadeśa' śabda' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4134: atrāpi cāptapuruṣapratyenaivāparidṛṣṭe gavayādau sādṛśyena sampratyayo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4136: ata āptasyaivedaṃ vacanamavyabhicārarīti matvā tadabalabhāvī niścayo
GSP28mimslovu:4140: dhyānādismṛtitulyatvāt sā pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // Msv_5,6.4 //
GSP28mimslovu:4145: nanu śābare 'pi hyadṛśadarśanāt sadṛśāntare jñānamupamānamiti varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:4147: yathā hi kiñcid dhyāyata' smaraṇaṃ bhavati, evaṃ sadṛśadarśino 'pi
GSP28mimslovu:4148: sadṛśāntare smaraṇam, ato na dhyānādijanmanā smṛtyā sahāsyā' kaścid
GSP28mimslovu:4153: nanu smṛtisambhinnamapi deśādibhedena jāyamānaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP28mimslovu:4154: evamihāpi gāṃ nagare dṛṣṭavato vane gavayadarśanastadbhānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavatyata āha---deśakālādīti
GSP28mimslovu:4155_0: na khalu deśādibheda' sanmātratayā prāmāṇye kāraṇam, api tarhi prameyatayā, na ceha deśāntarādiviśiṣṭo gau' pramīyate, api
GSP28mimslovu:4155_1: tu nagarāvagata' sampratyapi tatstha eva smaryata iti ||5 ||
GSP28mimslovu:4157: yena kilātideśavākyaṃ śrutaṃ yādṛśo gaustādṛśo gavaya iti, tasya śrutādideśavākyasya vanaṃ prāptasya yat svayamasau gosadṛśo gavaya iti
GSP28mimslovu:4160: nanu sādṛśyayukter'the na smṛtirnaindriyād gati' // Msv_5,6.7 //
GSP28mimslovu:4177: vā, yadi netyāha, tata' smaraṇādaviśiṣṭā saṅgatiriyamapramāṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:4181: yadi tarhi pratyakṣādeva labhyata iti na pramāṇāntarāvakāśa iti ||8 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:4183: pratyakṣeṇāvagantuṃ śakyata iti sāvakāśaṃ pramāṇāntaramityata āha---
GSP28mimslovu:4186: tathā ca sādṛśyaviśiṣṭo gavaya iti kathamapratyakṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:4187: pratijāti kṛtsnaparisamāptameva jātivat sādṛśyamityapratyakṣe 'pi gavi tatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayapratyakṣamupapadyata eveti bhāva' ||9||
GSP28mimslovu:4193: na nām, vastu tattāvat sarvathā tai' pratīyate // Msv_5,6.12 //
GSP28mimslovu:4200: gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayadarśanaṃ cedupamānamabhimataṃ tadāśrutatadvākyānāmapi nagare gāṃ dṛṣṭavatāṃ vane gavayaṃ paśyatāmastyeveti mandaṃ viśeṣaṇaphalamiti ||11||
GSP28mimslovu:4208: vivṛtaṃ ca---”yathā gauriva gavaya ityukte gavā samānārthamindriyasannikarṣādupalabhamāno 'sya gavayaśabda' saṃjñeti saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaṃ pratipadyata' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4220: etāvacca sambandhasya svarūpam, ata' sūktaṃ viśeṣaṇānarthakyamiti ||13||
GSP28mimslovu:4221: nanu jñātasyāpi sambandhasya pratyabhijñāne prāmāṇyamavihatamevāta āha---na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:4226: kimidānīmatīndriye naiva pratyabhijñānamasti, yadyevamanumānena kathaṃ pūrvānubhūtamagnyādi pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4227: āha ca--- 'gṛhīte 'pi deśādibhedabhinne puna' pramāpratyabhijñānumānātsāt pratyakṣavadavadhārite 'pī'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:4232: na brūma' parokṣaṃ na pratyabhijñāyata iti, yadetadayamasau gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭo gavaya itīndriyajamaparokṣāvabhāsaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:4234: gosādṛśyena vijñānatapūrvo gavaya eva tu|| iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4236: ata eva 'na cāsye'ti sambandhasya pratyabhijñānaviṣayatvaṃ nirākaroti /
GSP28mimslovu:4240: śrutaśabdollisvatamidaṃ gavayajñānamato na pratyakṣasya viṣaya isyupamānasya bhaviṣyatītyata āha---śabdeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4243: jātyādivat tadā tena sādṛśyaṃ kiṃ na mīyate // Msv_5,6.16 //
GSP28mimslovu:4246: nusāri jñānaṃ śabdaśaktiparāmarśajameveti pratyakṣameveti varṇitamityato naikatrāpi lakṣaṇe upamānasya prameyamadhikaṃ paśyāma iti vācyamasyāpūrvaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:4248: yadi tūcyate--- pratiyogisāpekṣaṃ sādṛśyagrahaṇam ato na pratyakṣam,
GSP28mimslovu:4249: arthendriyasāmarthyamātrajaṃ hi pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ, na tatpūrvamaparaṃ vānusandhatte /
GSP28mimslovu:4250: ata' pratyakṣe 'pi dharmiṇi parokṣameva sādṛśyamiti na tadviśiṣṭasya pratyakṣatvamiti sāvakāśamupamānamityata āha---vyavasāyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4253: ato jātyādivatsādṛśyamapi teṣāṃ kiṃ na pratyakṣema pramīyata iti ||16||
GSP28mimslovu:4256: evaṃ tāvat sādṛśyasya vastvantaratvamaṅgīkṛtya tatpratyakṣatayopamānasya viṣayābhāvenāprāmāṇyamuktam
GSP28mimslovu:4260: ayaṃ ca teṣāmabhiprāya'--- sādṛśyaṃ hi na tāvadāśrayebhyo bhinnamupalambhāt /
GSP28mimslovu:4263: na tāvat kārtsnyena vṛttamanyatrāpi tathaiva vartata iti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:4267: na hi navasu dravyeṣu caturviśatyāṃ guṇeṣu pañcasu vā karmasu sādṛśyamantargataṃ paśyāma'
GSP28mimslovu:4268: na ca sāmānyameva sādṛśyaṃ, taddhi tadbuddhau karaṇaṃ, tadvadbuddhivedyaṃ ca sādṛśyaṃ, tatsādṛśye ca gotvādāvapi tathātvaprasanaṅga' /
GSP28mimslovu:4274: bhūya' svapyekatra samāhṛteṣu pratiyogya(nyatarā?) napekṣeṣu sādṛsyabuddherupajananāt /
GSP28mimslovu:4275: santi khalu tānyekatra samāhṛtāni vastūni, na ca sādṛśyabuddhyā gṛhyante,
GSP28mimslovu:4291: kintu tattvāntaramevedaṃ dravyajātiguṇakarmabhyo vyatiriktaṃ guṇabhedo vā
GSP28mimslovu:4294: evaṃ copapanno bhavati sadṛśasambhāvanameva tatra vidhyartha'
GSP28mimslovu:4298: yadi cāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyamiṣyante tatasteṣāmihābhāvāt sādṛśyamapi du'
GSP28mimslovu:4302: tattvāntare hi sādṛśye gāmanapekṣyāpi gavayaṃ sadṛśamiti jānīyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:4303: tatra hi tanniravaśeṣameva sādṛśyaṃ parisamāptamiti kimanyadapekṣate /
GSP28mimslovu:4304: kathamanapekṣite gavi tatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'vagamyata iti cet kasatsya gavā
GSP28mimslovu:4306: samavāya iti cet, so 'pi tarhi gavayavad gosadṛśatayā jñātavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:4307: api ca samavetaṃ nāma tatsādṛśyaṃ gavayagatasādṛśyagrahaṇe 'pi
GSP28mimslovu:4313: tathedaṃ gavi gavayasādṛśyamiti na tadapekṣāheturupalabhyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4319_0: yadi matam, abhivyañjakāni tasyāvayavasāmānyānīti, tāni tarhi gavayavartīni tasyābhivyañjakāni, santi ca tāni gave(?vi) iti
GSP28mimslovu:4319_1: kiṃ gogatadvedanena, ato gavyavagate 'navagateṣu cāvayavasāmānyeṣu gosādṛśyajñānaṃ jāyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:4320: jātyorhi tatsādṛśyam, avagate ca te iti kimanyadapekṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4321: yañcedamavayavasāmānyānāṃ bāhulye sadṛśatvam, idaṃ ca na syādarthāntaratve sādṛśyasya sarvatra tāvattvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:4330: ata' kalpanāmātrakalpitaṃ dvicandrālātacakrādivad bhrāntikaraṇaṃ sādṛśyaṃ na prāmāṇikamiti
GSP28mimslovu:4331: prameyābhāvādapi nopamānāṅgamanyad vā sadṛśye pramāṇamityāpekṣa iti ||17||
GSP28mimslovu:4337: sādṛśyaṃ, pramāṇabalena yathā tadupapadyate tathā kalpanīyam /
GSP28mimslovu:4341: asyārtha'--- bhūyobhiravayavasāmānyairyo jātyantarasya yoga' tat sādṛśyam /
GSP28mimslovu:4345: etena yaduktaṃ citrādau kathaṃ sādṛśyamiti tat parihṛtam /
GSP28mimslovu:4353: ato 'sya guṇasya sato gumakarmaṇoranupapanna eva samavāya' /
GSP28mimslovu:4354: atha dravyasamavetameva guṇakarmaṇī api sadṛśatayā bodhayati,
GSP28mimslovu:4361: na ca gandhādisadṛśaṃ dravyamiti ato 'vayavasāmānyameva sādṛśyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4362: nanvekatraiva bhūyasāmavayavasāmānyānāmupalambhāt sādṛśyabodhaprasaktirityuktam, parihṛtamidaṃ jātyantarasyeti vadatā /
GSP28mimslovu:4363: jātyantarasamavāyināṃ jātyantare samavāyāt sādṛśyam, na svarūpamātram, na ca bhūyastvam /
GSP28mimslovu:4374: ata ekaikatrāpi svarūpamātreṇa sāmānyāni gamyanta eva /
GSP28mimslovu:4379: tu tāni sādṛśyam, samavāyātmā ca nāpratisaṃhite jātyantare 'bhivyakto
GSP28mimslovu:4382: na hi devadattasya pitṛtvaṃ putrāpekṣā pratīyata iti, tadavastu /
GSP28mimslovu:4387: yadi cāvayavasāmānyaṃ sādṛśyaṃ, na tadiha sambhavati, svayamevāvayavatvāt,
GSP28mimslovu:4392: tañcāvayavānāmapi cakṣurādīnāṃ svāvayavasāmānyabhūmnā sambhavatyeveti yukto 'ṅganādīnāṃ sadṛśāvayavabodha ityāha ||19||
GSP28mimslovu:4393: astu tāvadavayaveṣvavāntarāvayavasāmānyayogāt sādṛśyam, vināpi tu tāni
GSP28mimslovu:4397: yadeva tu kiñcid guṇādisāmānyaṃ sadṛśadhiyamupajanayati tadeva sādṛśyamato nātraikarūpyameva
GSP28mimslovu:4399: tad yathā--- jātisādṛśyam 'agnirvai brāhmaṇa' iti, agnisadṛśa ityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:4407: guṇasāmānyaṃ tu citrādau suprakāśameva loke, vede ca 'ādityo yūpa' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4409: na dharmā eva sādṛśyaṃ bhūyastā vā tadāśrayā /
GSP28mimslovu:4414: evaṃ hyāha---”yathā vai śyeno nipatyādatte, evamayaṃ dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:4416: śaktisādṛśyaṃ tu bhīmo malla iti loke, vede ca somapūtīkayo' /
GSP28mimslovu:4420: uktaṃ ca---”somasya yoṃ'śa' parāpatat sa pūtīko 'bhavad” iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4421: svadharmasādṛśyaṃ kecit triśikhā' kecit pañcaśikhā iti loke
GSP28mimslovu:4422: triśikhādīnāmanyonyasādṛśyaṃ, vede ca vasiṣṭhātryādīnāṃ narāśaṃso dvitīya'
GSP28mimslovu:4424: dharmaniyama eva hi tatra sādṛśyam, prakṛtivikṛtikarmaṇośca dharmasāmānyameva sādṛśyamityuktameva
GSP28mimslovu:4425: ete ca jātyādaya ekaikaśo dviśastriśa' samastaśaśca samānā bhavanta'
GSP28mimslovu:4427: nanu yatra sādṛśyaṃ samavaiti tatsadṛśabuddhyā gṛhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4428: yadi cāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyaṃ, tāni tarhyavayaveṣu samavayantīti teṣveva sadṛśadhiyaṃ janayeyu'
GSP28mimslovu:4429: atha teṣāṃ bhūyasastā, sā cāvayavasāmānyeṣviti tānyeva sadṛśāni syu' /
GSP28mimslovu:4430: kathaṃ jātyantare sadṛśabuddhirata āha---na dharmā iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4432: ata eva hetorna dhmākhyāvayavasāmānyāni tadabhūyastā vā sādṛśyaṃ, teṣu
GSP28mimslovu:4434: yadeva hi teṣāṃ bhūyastayā yuktaṃ jātyantaraṃ gavayādi vyaktyantaraṃ vāgneyasauryādi, tadeva sadṛśabuddhyā gṛhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4437: piṇḍitāni tu jātyantarasamavāyopahitāni sādṛśyam, ayaṃ ca bhūyo
GSP28mimslovu:4445: tena sarvaṃ na sāmānyaṃ nityatvena prakalpyate // Msv_5,6.24 //
GSP28mimslovu:4447: jātyantarasyeti yāvacchrutagrāhiṇa' paricodanamidam--- yadi jātyantarasya bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogata' sādṛśyaṃ kataṃ yamayorvyaktisādṛśyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4450: yatraivaṃ sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyate jātau vyaktau vā, tatraiva tadāśrayaṇīyam /
GSP28mimslovu:4455: yadi tāvadalpavṛttisvabhāvaṃ vyaktyoreva yuktam, atha bahuvṛttisvabhāvaṃ tato jātyoreva
GSP28mimslovu:4458: nanu sāmānyāni sādṛśyaṃ, tāni ca vyaktināśena naśyeyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:4460: etāni tāvannāśīni bhavantu , sāmānyāntarāṇi gotvādīni nityānyeveti na kaścillokavirodha iti ||23||
GSP28mimslovu:4468: tāni vyastāni santyevaṃ pratyakṣe 'pi kvacit kvacit // Msv_5,6.26 //
GSP28mimslovu:4472: tata' paraṃ tu sāmānyaṃ bhavet sādṛśyavarjitam // Msv_5,6.28 //
GSP28mimslovu:4477: bhūyastayā teṣāṃ sāhaśyamatiriktaṃ bhavati, na tvekaikaśo na santīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4479: api tu pratyakṣe 'pi kvacidarthe tānyupalabhyanta evetyāha---tānīti ||26||
GSP28mimslovu:4480: nanvakṣyādīnāṃ svāvayavasāmānyabhūmnā sābaśyamuktaṃ, tadavayavānāṃ tu kathaṃ sāhaśyaṃ bhaviṣyatyata āha---anyatheti /
GSP28mimslovu:4484: yattu kalpite ksmiṃścidupapadyate anyathā nopapadyate tadupapattiranyakalpamanayāvasīyate
GSP28mimslovu:4488: yathā cānumāne niścitarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakam, evamihāpi kenacitpramāṇenāvagataṃ pramāṇāntareṇotthāpitavitarkamam
GSP28mimslovu:4489: na cātrānyataratrāpi prāmāṇye saṃśaya', kintu niścitaprāmāṇyoreva dvayo'
GSP28mimslovu:4499: sāhitye tu pramāṇaṃ ca tayoranyanna vidyate // Msv_5,7.31 //
GSP28mimslovu:4501: tathā na kalpyate taccet sāhityaṃ na pratīyate // Msv_5,7.32 //
GSP28mimslovu:4506: aprāmāṇyakāraṇāni ca saṃśayaviparyayāvajñānaṃ vā, taccārthāpattāvapi nāstīti kathamapramāṇatā
GSP28mimslovu:4508: na sambandha' prāmāṇye kāraṇam, api tu bādhaviraha' /
GSP28mimslovu:4509: sa cehāpyaviśiṣṭa iti na kaścid doṣor'thāpattāvasmākaṃ pratibhātīti ||29||
GSP28mimslovu:4510: nanu gṛhābhāvo nāntareṇa bahirbhāvamupapadyate ato nāntarīyaka',
GSP28mimslovu:4515: nāntarīyakadarśanamanumānamabhipretam, na ceha nāntareṇa bahirbhāvaṃ gṛhābhāvo bhavatīti prāgavagatam, tadaiva hyarthāpattyā bahirbhāvaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:4517: ata' sā svarūpasatyapi na pūrvamavagateti na jñānotpattau kāraṇamiti
GSP28mimslovu:4519: na tāvadanniyamena sarvaireva dvayo' sāhityamavagatam, aviditasāhityasya tāvat siddhaṃ pramāṇāntaramityabhiprāya'
GSP28mimslovu:4520: yenāpi tayo' sāhityamavagataṃ tasyāpi nāgṛhītayostayo' sāhityagraha' sambhavati, na ca
GSP28mimslovu:4526: yadaikasminnayaṃ deśe na tadānyatra vidyate // Msv_5,7.34 //
GSP28mimslovu:4532_0: evaṃ cākalpymāne 'nyatarasya sambnadhino 'gṛhītatvāt sāhityapratītireva na syāt, ata' sāhityārthamarthāpattirarthanīyeti
GSP28mimslovu:4534: nanu ca nāvaśyamarthāpattyaivānyatara' sambandhī grahītavya', śakyate hi gṛhadvārāvasthitenābhāvapratyakṣābhyāmubhayaṃ viditvā sambandho
GSP28mimslovu:4538: ayamabhiprāya'--- sidhyatyevaṃ gṛhābhāvād bahirbhāvānumānam, na punarevameva sarveṣāmavagati', agṛhītasambandhānāmapi pratītibhāvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:4539: eṣo 'pi ca prakāro naikatra bhāvena sarvatrābhāvāvagame sambhavati, na hi jagadabhāvenaikatra bhāvo 'nvita' śakyo 'vagantum /
GSP28mimslovu:4541: nanvevaṃ tadāvagataṃ yadāyamekatra bhavati tadā paratra tatsamīpe na bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4546: nanvanupalabdhirabhāvāvagame kāraṇam, yathā caikatra san devadatto deśāntare
GSP28mimslovu:4548: taddeśāgamanāt sā hi dūrastheṣvasti satsvapi // Msv_5,7.37 //
GSP28mimslovu:4549: gatvā gatvā tu tān deśān yadyartho nopalabhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4552: taddeśāgamanāt spaṣṭo vyatireko na sidhyati // Msv_5,7.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:4554: evamekatra san sarvatra nopalabhyata iti sarvatraiva nāstīti śakyamavagantum /
GSP28mimslovu:4555: na hi darśanavadadarśanamapi prayatnamapekṣate, darśanaṃ hi kāryaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:4557: sambhavati, darśanābhāvastu na kiñcidapekṣata iti codayati---nanvatreti /
GSP28mimslovu:4562: kimiti na pratīyate ata āha--- taddeśeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4563: upalabdhiyogyasya hyanupalabdhirabhāvaṃ vyavasthāpayati, dūrastheṣu tvayogyatvādeva satsvapyanupalabdhi' sambhavatīti nābhāvaniścaya iti
GSP28mimslovu:4564: yaditu sarvagrāmanagarasaritkāntārādideśā' prāptā' bhaveyu', evaṃ caitrasya teṣvabhāva' śakyāvagama', na cedaṃ śakyakaraṇamityabhiprāyeṇāha---gatvā gatveti ||38||
GSP28mimslovu:4566: ayamabhiprāya'--- na tāvad vipakṣādavyāvṛtto heturgamaka', na ca sarve
GSP28mimslovu:4571: agnyādyabhāve ye vyatirekiṇo dhūmādayasteṣāmagnyādyabhāvadeśāgamanād vyatireko na sidhyatīti
GSP28mimslovu:4579: vyatirakepradhānavādino hi bauddhasyāsati vipakṣād vyatirekagrahaṇe na heturgamako bhavati, vastvantarābhāvo hi tasya prameya', agnyādervastuno /
GSP28mimslovu:4581: sa hi sarvānagnivyatirekamantareṇa na sambhavati, mama tu sahacāriṇo
GSP28mimslovu:4583: sa ca vipakṣādarśanamātreṇa dvitraireva darśanai' sidhyatīti ||40
GSP28mimslovu:4588: evaṃ tarhīhāpi caitrābhāvasya jagadavartina ekadeśabhāvena sambandha upapadyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:4589: atrāpi hyekatra caitre bhavati katipayeṣu tadabhāvo dṛṣṭa eva, tāvatā ca sarvatrābhāvo 'vumāsyata ityāha--- nanvevamiti ||41||
GSP28mimslovu:4591: ayamabhiprāya'--- na hi no vyaktiviṣayamanumānam, api tarhyākṛtiviṣayam,
GSP28mimslovu:4595: avagate hi sāhitye bhavati śaṅkā--- kimayamaupādhika' saṃsargo dhūmasyāgninā saha āhosvit sahaja eveti, tatrāsakṛddarśane
GSP28mimslovu:4599: naca deśādibhede vyabhicārā śaṅkā, sakṛddarśanāvadhāritasāhacaryayorhi dvayorapyagnestāvad vyabhicāro dṛṣṭo
GSP28mimslovu:4607: dvitrādidarśanenaiva,tad yadidhūmo 'pyagniṃ vyabhicaret, asyāpi hi dvitricaturaireva darśanairvyabhicāro dṛśyeta, na ca dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4612: sa hi prathamamanvicchato vipakṣadeśānāmanantatvād durlabho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4613: svabhāvaniyame tu jñāte svabhāvasyāvyabhicārāt sulabho vyatireka' /
GSP28mimslovu:4614: na hi svābhāvikamuṣṇatvamantareṇa kvacit kadācidagnirbhavatīti kaścidāśaṅkate /
GSP28mimslovu:4618: eko hyatra sarvatrābhāva' sahabhāvayanantadeśavartī, na tvagnidhūmākṛtivat parimitadeśa', ato 'tra durgrahaṃ sāhityamiti ||43||
GSP28mimslovu:4627: tathātu taṃ gṛhītvāsāhityagrahaṇapura' saraṃ yadyanumānamiṣyate tadarthāpattipūrvakam, etāvatā ca siddhamarthāpatte'
GSP28mimslovu:4629: tasyānyathā na siddhi' syādityanyeṣvasya nāstitā // Msv_5,7.46 //
GSP28mimslovu:4633: yastu vadati--- svātmanastāvadekatra sata' sarvatrābhāvena sambandho dṛṣṭa' ato 'nyasyāpyanuminotīti
GSP28mimslovu:4634: sa vaktavya' svātmana eva sarvatrāsattā kathamavagamyate, yadyabhāvena,
GSP28mimslovu:4635: kasyeti vaktavyam, na tāvatpratyakṣasya nivṛttyā dūradeśeṣvabhāva' śakyate
GSP28mimslovu:4638: atha tatra sato dūrasthatvameva na syāt, ata' sahaiva deśāntare svaśarīramupalabdhiyogyaṃ bhavati, yogyatvāccopalabhyet, yo hi yatra
GSP28mimslovu:4639: bhavati tasya sahaivādhāreṇātmopalabdhiyogyo bhavati, na ceha tathā, ato na deśāntareṣavastīti
GSP28mimslovu:4642: tatra ca viruddhāvyabhicāritoktaiva--- deśāntarāṇi vimatipadāni caitravanti caitravaddeśasamīpavyatiriktadeśatvāccaitravaddeśavaditi
GSP28mimslovu:4643: yatra ca pratihetunā sandeha' kriyate tatra balavatānyena sarvatrābhāvena samartham /
GSP28mimslovu:4644: sā hyevaṃ pravartate, yadetadekatra kārtsnyena caitrasyopalambhanaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:4645: tannopapadyate, yadi deśāntare caitro bhavet, dvedhā hi bhāvā' prādeśikā
GSP28mimslovu:4650: prasiddham, tayā cātmākāśādaya iti vibhava ityucyante /
GSP28mimslovu:4651: na tāvadākāśavaccaitra', ekatra parisamāpto hi parimaṇḍala' so 'vagamyate
GSP28mimslovu:4652: na ca yathāvayavī svāvayaveṣu vartate tathā deśāntare vartitumarhati /
GSP28mimslovu:4653: yadi hi tasyānyatra bhāgā' bhaveyu' iha kṛtsno nopalabhyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:4662: dṛṣṭvā sambandhitāṃ caiṣā śaktirgamyeta nānyathā // Msv_5,7.48 //
GSP28mimslovu:4664: arthāpatte' pramāṇatvaṃ trailakṣaṇyād vinā bhavet // Msv_5,7.49 //
GSP28mimslovu:4665: ato 'syana kathañcidekatra sato 'nyatra sattvamupapadyata ityanyatrābhāvamantarbhāvya kṛtsnabodha' samarthyate, kā
GSP28mimslovu:4666: punaratrānupapatti', nātra kṛtsnabodhasya kenacit pratighāto daśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4667: bhāvānumānenaiva kevalaṃ tu durbale pratighātahetau tadabādhenaivārthāpattirātmānaṃ labhate
GSP28mimslovu:4677: bhāṣyodāhṛtatvāccābhāvapūrvikāyā eva prathamamanumānād bhedo varṇita iti
GSP28mimslovu:4679: evaṃ hi manyante--- dvividhamanumānaṃ dṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayamadṛṣṭasvalakṣamaviṣayaṃ ca saṃyogavibhāgādibhya iva kriyādyanumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:4680: kāryaṃ hi kāraṇena sāmānyato jñātasambandhamiti tatastatpratītiranumānabhevedamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4682: yena hyekadā bījādaṅkuro dṛṣṭa' so 'nyadā tathāvidhādeva
GSP28mimslovu:4683_0: punaranupalabhamāna' svabhāvānumānena janayitavyo 'nenāṅkura ityanumimāna evātrā śaṅkate kathamaṅkuro na jāyata iti, tata'
GSP28mimslovu:4683_1: kalpayati--- asti kaścid bījasamavāyī śaktibhedo yadvaśāt prāk kāryamāsīdadya ca nāstīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4685: api ca sambandhagrahaṇādhīnameva sarvamanumānaṃ na tadagṛhītayo'
GSP28mimslovu:4690: pīno divā na bhuṅkte cetyevamādivaca' śrutau // Msv_5,7.51 //
GSP28mimslovu:4693: pramāṇāntareṇa śakyate 'nubhavitum, ata eva ca na tadvato 'pi grahaṇaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:4699: satyam, kintu śaktikakalpanayā vinā kāraṇākhyaiva na nivartate /
GSP28mimslovu:4700: aṅkuro hi bījabhāvabhāvī vyabhicaritabhāvāntaraśca bījakāraṇaka ityavagata' satyapi tu bīje 'jāyamānastadapi vyabhicaratīti
GSP28mimslovu:4702: kḷptāyāṃ ca śaktau kāraṇasambandhinyāmarthāpattyā yadi sambandho
GSP28mimslovu:4707: jayo hi parājayena viditavyāptiriti tamekatra ghātake nakule dṛṣṭvā pratipakṣasya parājayo 'vagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4715: so 'vaidika' prasajyeta yadyeṣā bhidyate tata' // Msv_5,7.53 //
GSP28mimslovu:4719: na hyanekārthatā yuktā vākye vācakatā tathā // Msv_5,7.55 //
GSP28mimslovu:4723: na bhedo yena tadvākyaṃ tasya syāt pratipādakam // Msv_5,7.57 //
GSP28mimslovu:4733: nanu rātryādivākyārtho yadi divāvākyenānabhihita' padārthānvayarūpeṇaiva svārthavad gamayiṣyate
GSP28mimslovu:4735: na hi divāvākye rātryādipadārthā' santi, kutastatra teṣāmanvaya iti ||56||
GSP28mimslovu:4736: nanu divādipadārthānvayādeva rātryādivākyārtha' pratyeṣyate, ata āha---na
GSP28mimslovu:4741: pramāṇaṃ tasya vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣādiṣu yad bhavet // Msv_5,7.59 //
GSP28mimslovu:4743: nānumānaṃ na cedaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ tena saha kvacit // Msv_5,7.60 //
GSP28mimslovu:4750: evaṃ tāvanna mūlāgamasyāyamartha', yena tu vākyāntareṇa
GSP28mimslovu:4753: tatra pratyakṣaṃ tāvanna tatsiddhau pramāṇamityāha---na hīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4756: aviditasambandhe tu divāvākye liṅga iṣyamāṇe 'vyavasthetyāha---yadi tviti
GSP28mimslovu:4757: yadi tūcyate sambandhamevadivāvākyasya rātrivākyenagṛhītvā tatastadanumāsyata iti, sidhyatyevam, na tuśrutārthāpattivedyāni sarvāṇi
GSP28mimslovu:4769: nāgṛhīte hi taddharmo gṛhīte nānumeyatā // Msv_5,7.67 //
GSP28mimslovu:4771: kenaciddhi sāmānyātmanā jñātasambandhena viśiṣṭaṃ kiñcidanumīyate na vastusattāmātram /
GSP28mimslovu:4772: na ca viśiṣṭa', ajñātasambandhatvāt iha tu tadubhayaṃ viparītamiti ||63||
GSP28mimslovu:4774: svatantro 'sambaddha' kenacidagnyādineva svatantreṇa kenacid viśeṣito dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭo nāstītyāha--- pūrvasiddha iti ||64||
GSP28mimslovu:4775: atha śrutameva vākyaṃ dharmitayopādāyāśrutavākyaviśiṣṭatā sādhyate tatastadaprasiddheraprasiddhaviśeṣaṇa' pakṣa ityāha--- atheti ||65||
GSP28mimslovu:4776: api ca śrute vākye 'śrutavākyaviśiṣṭe sādhyamāne na tāvat
GSP28mimslovu:4777: kiñcilliṅgamupalabhyate, na cāliṅgakanumānaṃ bhavati, tad yadi tadeva
GSP28mimslovu:4778: punarliṅgamiṣyate tata' pratijñārthaikadeśitvam, yathā pade pakṣīkṛter'thaviśiṣṭe sādhyamāne 'bhihitamityāha---kiñceti ||66||
GSP28mimslovu:4779: dharmadharmibhāvo 'pi divāvākyarātrivākyadayo' śabdārthayoriva nirākārya ityāha--- tadvadeveti
GSP28mimslovu:4780: yathā tatrārthe dharmiṇyapratipanne na padaṃ taddharma ityuktam, evamihāpi nāpratipanne rātrivākye taddhadharmatayā divā
GSP28mimslovu:4784: anumāviṣayotthaṃ tu dharmatvaṃ niṣphalaṃ bhavet // Msv_5,7.69 //
GSP28mimslovu:4788: atha tu pakṣadharmatāpratipattyarthaṃ tat prathamamavagatamityucyate tato
GSP28mimslovu:4792: api ca tatraiva pade varṇitam--- na kriyākārakasambandhādṛte sambandho
GSP28mimslovu:4794: ato yathā padasya na kaścit kriyānivandhanor'thasambandho 'stīti na taddharma ityuktam, evaṃ divāvākyasyāpi rātrivākyadharmata nirākāryetyāha---kriyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4795: na cātra viṣayaviṣayibhāvarūpāpi dvayārvākyayo' śabdārthayoriva sambandho bhavati ucyate hi śabdenārtha', na tu vākyaṃ vākyāntarasya
GSP28mimslovu:4798: iha tu vākyasyāvācakatvāt tadviṣayatvameva pratyetuṃ na śakyate iti viśeṣa' ||68||
GSP28mimslovu:4799_0: yadi tūcyate pratīyate tāvad divāvākyād rātrivākyam, atastasyāpi tadvācakatvamityasti viṣayaviṣayilakṣaṇa' sambandha iti,
GSP28mimslovu:4799_1: tatraikaṃ vākyamanekārthamabhyupagataṃ bhavet, svārthaṃ hi tatpratipādayati
GSP28mimslovu:4805: evaṃ tāvad divāvākyamaliṅgamityuktam, tadgatapadārthānāmapyevameva liṅgatā nirākāryetyāha---padārthairiti
GSP28mimslovu:4807: na tu vākyāntareṇaiṣāṃ vinā kiñcinna sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:4808: na cāpyanya' prakāro 'sti tena vākyena saṅgatau // Msv_5,7.71 //
GSP28mimslovu:4810: prasaṅgāt tatra dūre 'pi nāsambandhāt pramucyate // Msv_5,7.72 //
GSP28mimslovu:4812: anvayavyatirekau ca pratiṣedhyau pade yathā // Msv_5,7.73 //
GSP28mimslovu:4813: yathā vākyārthaṃ gamayanti, evaṃ rātrivākyamapi kiṃ na gamayanti, ata
GSP28mimslovu:4815: kriyāsāmānyaṃ kārakasāmānyaṃ vā pratipannamalabdhetaretaravyatiṣaṅgamanyathā na sidhyatīti taṃ viśeṣaṃ gamayati, yaścāsau viśeṣa' sa eva tu vākyārtha ityucyate iti ||70||
GSP28mimslovu:4816: na caiṣa prakāro rātrivākyapratipādane sambhavatītyāha---na tviti /
GSP28mimslovu:4817: yadyapi divāvākyaṃ na rātrivākyasya vācakam, tathāpi kalpayiṣyāma',
GSP28mimslovu:4821: atra tāvadevaṃ vākyāntarakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇameva nāstīti tadanādṛtya
GSP28mimslovu:4822: tāvadanavasthāmāpādayati, yadapi kalpitaṃ vākyaṃ tadapi na rātrivākaymavagamayituṃ śaktam
GSP28mimslovu:4823: na ca tadasambaddhameva tasya gamakamiti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:4825: evaṃ yadeva kiñcid vākyaṃ kalpayitumiṣyate tadeva nāsambaddhaṃ gamakamityanavasthāpata iti
GSP28mimslovu:4826: atha tvantimamasambaddhameva gamakamiti kalpyate, tad varaṃ prathamasyaiva
GSP28mimslovu:4830: anvayavyatirekayorapi padavat pratiṣedho darśayitavya ityāha--- anvayeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4835: arthe 'pi caivameva syāt tasmāt pūrveṣvasambhava' // Msv_5,7.75 //
GSP28mimslovu:4837: tadātmalābha eva syād vinā netyetadiṣyate // Msv_5,7.76 //
GSP28mimslovu:4838: etadarthād vinā nāyamityartha' kiṃ na kalpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4841: na ca jñānānvayo 'satyapi rātrivākyajñāne vyutpannasya divāvākyajñānād,
GSP28mimslovu:4843: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamairna rātrivākyaṃ pratīyata ityuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:4844: upamānamapi tatra na pramāṇamiti darśayati---śrutavākyeti tvamantena /
GSP28mimslovu:4845: divāvākyavacca tadarthenāpi na rātrivākyamupamīyata ityāha--- arthasyeti
GSP28mimslovu:4846: yathā ca rātrivākyasya divāvākyatatadarthābhyāmupamānaṃ nirastamevaṃ rātrivākyārthasyāpi tābhyāṃ nirasanīyamityāha--- upamānatveti syādantena /
GSP28mimslovu:4850: divābhojanam, ata' parasparapratighātād divāvākyasya svārthapratipādanamevānupapadyamānaṃ rātrivākyamanupraveśayati, ata'
GSP28mimslovu:4854: ayamabhiprāya'--- pīntavaṃ hi bhojanapratiṣedho vā paraspareṇa pratihanyate tayoścārthakalpanayaivātmalābha'
GSP28mimslovu:4857: labdhaprayojane vākye paraṃ nāgamikaṃ ca na' // Msv_5,7.78 //
GSP28mimslovu:4860: api ca, yathā parairabhidhīyamāno 'pi padārthānupapattyā gamyamāno vākyārtha āgamārtho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4864: savikalpako hi śrutārthāpattibodha' savikalpajñānāni ca śabdapura' sarāṇi
GSP28mimslovu:4868: śabdapura' saramevāgni' pratīyate, tatastayorapi śabdaparyavasāyitaiva bhavet atastatra smṛtistha eva śabdo 'pratyāyaka', tadihāpi samānam /
GSP28mimslovu:4869: yathā hi karmendriyamarthenaiva sannikṛṣṭamiti tameva prakāśayati liṅgaṃ cārthena sambaddhamiti ta gamayati, na śabdam,
GSP28mimslovu:4874: na hi pacatītyukte odanapratyakṣeṇākāṅkṣā nivartate, kiṃ tarhi odanamiti
GSP28mimslovu:4875: padena, evaṃ vākyamapyanupapadyamānatayāvagataṃ vākyāntaramevākāṅkṣati, na tu tamarthaṃ svarūpeṇa
GSP28mimslovu:4876: ata eva nirvāpamantre 'tideśād vikṛtiṃ gate prākṛtadevatāyā abhāvāt tatpadanivṛttau tasya sthāne sūryāyeti padamūhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4878: hṛdayasyāgne 'vadyati atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasa ityatrāpadyatipadānuṣaṅga'
GSP28mimslovu:4879: na cārtha evānuṣajyate 'anuṣaṅgo vākyasamāpti' sarveṣu pekṣyate śabdollekhenāpi gṛhyamāṇa', kinnvartharūpeṇaiva, tamarthaṃ vikalpayani śabdantvastu nāma sanmātratayā /
GSP28mimslovu:4880: yadi tu tatrāpi śabdo 'pekṣyate tiraścāmarthavikalpo na syāt, sa ca nāsti
GSP28mimslovu:4887: śrutārthāpattibodhastu tiraścāṃ nāstyeva, śabdavyutpattijo hyasau, na ca teṣāmasāvastīti pratyakṣe 'pi varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:4891: anumānādiṣu tu saṃskārodabodhenāvarjanīyatayāstu nāma śabdasmṛti', na tu śabdāpekṣā /
GSP28mimslovu:4894: ata evāgṛhītasambandhasyārthamaviduṣa' śrute 'pyupapādake vākye nānupapannavākyārthajñāne 'nupapatti' śāmyati,
GSP28mimslovu:4897: yāvaddhayakṛtārtha' śabdastāvad bodho 'vagamyate, sa tadartho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4902: na hi prayojanatvāvagatārthānupapattyā yadavagamyate nāsādyata iti yuktaṃ vākyārthasya pūrvāvagatasyāgamārthātvam
GSP28mimslovu:4904: śrutāgamārthatve yadi pramādāt tannāśo bhavati tato yajurvedādivihitanāśanimittaṃ prāyaścitam, itarathā tvavijñātanāśanimittamiti yadyavijñāto bhūrbhuva' sva' svāheti
GSP28mimslovu:4906: śrutārthāpattivedya eva hi vedo 'vijñāta ityucyate, sa hyṛgādīnāṃ nānyatamatvena jñāyata iti ||78||
GSP28mimslovu:4908: na tāvad divāvākyarātrivākyayo' sambandho 'sti, sannapi vā na vidita', na cāviditasambandhānyadarśa
GSP28mimslovu:4910: pratyakṣasya pramāṇatvaṃ kathaṃ vā saṅgatervinā // Msv_5,7.80 //
GSP28mimslovu:4912: na hi pratyakṣavelāyāṃ sarveṇāsau nirūpyate // Msv_5,7.81 //
GSP28mimslovu:4914: na syādeva pramāṇāṅgamasatā tulya eva sa' // Msv_5,7.82 //
GSP28mimslovu:4915: aprāpyakāriṇī yeṣāṃ cakṣu' śrotre ca te yathā /
GSP28mimslovu:4917: tasmādasattve sattve vā sambandhasya yadeva na' /
GSP28mimslovu:4918: jāyetābhaṅguraṃ jñāna tasyaiva syāt pramāṇatā // Msv_5,7.84 //
GSP28mimslovu:4927: nanvindriyārtasannikarṣajameva pratyakṣamato nākāraṇaṃ prāmāṇye sambandha iti codayati---astīticedantena
GSP28mimslovu:4930: nirūpito hi sambandha' pramāṇotpattau kāraṇamanumāne, na ceha tatheti
GSP28mimslovu:4933: ato yathā te pratyakṣajñānasya pramāṇatāmicchanti, evamihāpi bhaviṣyatītyata āha---aprāpyeti
GSP28mimslovu:4938: bhedābhede visaṃvāda' kṛtastatra ca nirṇaya' // Msv_5,7.85 //
GSP28mimslovu:4939: ṛte yatra ca sambandhād buddhareva na jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4940: tatra kiṃ kriyatāṃ so 'pi prāmāṇye naiva kāraṇam // Msv_5,7.86 //
GSP28mimslovu:4941: smṛtyā śrutiryā parikalpyate 'smin liṅgādibhiryā viniyojikā ca /
GSP28mimslovu:4942: phalādibhiryat paripūraṇaṃ ca sambandhadṛk tatra na kācidasti //
GSP28mimslovu:4944: na hi tayā pravartamānānāṃ pravṛtti' pratihanyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4946: anumānād bhedābhedayorasti vivāda', tatra cāsmābhi' kṛto nirṇaya ityāha---na cāpīti ||85||
GSP28mimslovu:4948: tatra hi buddhirevāsati sambandhajñāne na jāyata iti tadutpattau kāraṇamāśrīyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:4951: bhūyān khalu vedabhāga' śrutārthāpattipramāṇaka' sa tāmantareṇa na
GSP28mimslovu:4952: sidhyeta, yathaiva hi pāṭhenābhivyaktā śrutirātmānaṃ labhate, evaṃ śrutārthāpattipramāṇakā hi /
GSP28mimslovu:4955: tenaiva caikāṃ na samāmananti sahasrabhāgaṃ tu samāmaneyu' ||' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4958: tathā liṅgādibhi' svaviniyojikā śrutirupakalpyate---- yathā tāvat prakaraṇāmnāte mantre
GSP28mimslovu:4962: evaṃsvabhāvāpyanumānaśabdaṃ labheta cedasti yathepsitaṃ na' // Msv_5,7.88
GSP28mimslovu:4965: yathā barhirmantre 'nena lunīyāditi so 'yaṃ laiṅgiko viniyoga' /
GSP28mimslovu:4966: vākyena tu yathā --- tasminneva mantre dāmītyetat padaṃ lavane śaktamiti
GSP28mimslovu:4967: tadeva liṅge viniyujyate, padāntarāṇi tu tatsamabhivyāhārātmanā vākyenaiva
GSP28mimslovu:4968: prakaraṇavinoyagastu kadarśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇānmātānāṃ samidādīnām, te hi prayojanākāṅkṣā', kratuścopakārasākāṅkṣa', tadevamubhayākāṅkṣāyāmebhi'
GSP28mimslovu:4972: aśrutaphaletikartavyatākeṣu ca karmasu viśvajitsauryādiṣu pūraṇasamarthā śruti' kalpyate 'viśvajitā yajeta svargakāma'iti, sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvaped
GSP28mimslovu:4976: na hyatrānupapadyamānasya kalpanīyena sambandha' kenacid dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:4981: yadi tu lakṣaṇato bhinnāpi paścādanumānasāmānyādanumānaśabdena vaktumiṣyate tadastu, siddhaṃ na' pramāṇāntaramityāha--- evamiti||
GSP28mimslovu:4988: nahi pramāṇābhāvena pramāṇaṃ lakṣyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:4990: evaṃ tarhi sarveṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ samānamidam, sarvāṇyapi hi pramāṇānītaretarābhāvarūpāṇi śakyante pramāṇābhāva iti vaditum /
GSP28mimslovu:4991: na ca sarvapramāṇasādhāraṇaṃ kiñcidekaṃ lakṣaṇamasti, yadabhāvena ṣaṣṭhaṃ lakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4992: api ca--- pramāṇaṃ nāma kasyacitprameyasya vyavasthāpakaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4993: tadanena kiṃ vyavasthāpyata iti na vidma' /
GSP28mimslovu:5000: kasya ca pramāṇasya prameyamidam, yadi pramāṇābhāvasya /
GSP28mimslovu:5009: tadidaṃ nāstīti vijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ ghaṭādyabhāva' prameyamiti manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:5012: yadi tu nābhāvastattvāntaramiṣyate, kastarhi kṣīre dadhyabhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:5014: ataścaiṣa daghni kṣīrābhāva', ya' kimālambanamiti vaktavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:5018: ka' tarhi tattvāntaramiti siddha' prameyabheda', tadbhedācca pramāṇabheda'
GSP28mimslovu:5019: na hi tat rūpāṇāṃ bhāvenaiva sannikarṣa', nābhāvena /
GSP28mimslovu:5021: svarūpamātradṛṣṭe gṛhādau deśāntaragamane kasyacidabhāvaṃ pratyanuyuktena tadaiva tadabhāvo 'vasīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5032: asti ca mīmāṃsakānāṃ prasiddhi'--- ṣaṣṭhaṃ kiledaṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5036: granthato hi pramāṇābhāva evāvasīyate na pramāṇam, nāstītyapyukte prameyābhāvameva laukikā' pratibudhyante na prameya kiñcit /
GSP28mimslovu:5037: ato na tāvat granthānuguṇaṃ pramāṇāntaram, na ca yuktyā
GSP28mimslovu:5038: saṅgacchate,siddhasya hi jñānasya pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ veti vicāraṇā yuktā /
GSP28mimslovu:5042: yadā ghaṭādisahitaṃ tadupalabhyate tadā ghaṭo 'stīti vyavahāra' pravartate
GSP28mimslovu:5044: na ca vācyaṃ satsvapi sūkṣmeṣu bhāveṣu tanmātrabodho dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:5047: dvedhā hi tanmātrabodha', dṛśye pratiyoginyadṛśye vā /
GSP28mimslovu:5048: tatra yā dṛśye pratiyogini tanmātrabuddhi' saiva ghaṭādernāstitvam /
GSP28mimslovu:5050: ato yeyaṃ sarvavādisiddhā tanmātrabuddhi' saiva nāstīti vyapadiśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5053: ato yatraiva prāk saṃsṛṣṭabuddharāsīt tatraiva vilakṣaṇakāraṇopanipāte tanmātrabuddhireva jāyate na punarghaṭādyabhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:5055: anyathā hi nābhāvo gṛhītuṃ śakyate, pramāṇābhāvo hi tatra pramāṇam, na cāgṛhītenaṃ sa pratipādayituṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5060: yadi ca sanmātramevādarśanaṃ niścāyayati, tato nivṛtte 'pyadarśane prāk devadatto
GSP28mimslovu:5064: yo yatra na dṛṣṭastasmin punadṛśyamāna evāsatyapyadarśane pracīnābhāvajñānaṃ tadasatyadarśane na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5069: svaprakāśā hi sā phalabhūtā na prakāśāntaramapekṣate /
GSP28mimslovu:5072: na ca nāstīti jñānaṃ pramāṇam, bhramavaditi na vidma' kimatra lakṣyate iti
GSP28mimslovu:5073: atrāha--- kimatra na jñāyate,yathoktaṃ bhavatā granthatastāvat pramāṇābhāva evāvasīyate, kecitkilābhāvaṃ nāma pramāṇamātiṣṭhante,
GSP28mimslovu:5082: yadi granthānuguṇyenāyamartho vyākhyāsyate tato vispaṣṭa' pradeśāntare
GSP28mimslovu:5083: bhāṣyavirodha', evaṃ hi pramāṇagatā saṃkhyā vyavahāraṃ bhinattīti
GSP28mimslovu:5091: na pramāṇamātravivakṣayā pramāṇaśabda' api tu kimuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:5093: asti ca pañcānāṃ bhāvopadhānamekam, sarvāṇi hi bhāvapramāṇāni, ato bhāvapramāṇā
GSP28mimslovu:5096: sa copariṣṭhād dvedhā vyākariṣyate--- ātmano 'pariṇāmo vā nāstīti vā
GSP28mimslovu:5102: asati hi tasmin pādavihārādivyavahāra' kaṇṭakādyabhāvāvadhāraṇa pura'
