GSP28mimslovu:5104: yadi bhūtalamātramatropalabhyate na kaṇṭakādiviveka', satsvapi teṣūpalabhyata iti nāstīti dhiyā gṛhyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:5107: yattūktaṃ tanmātradhīreva ghaṭo nāstīti vyapadiśyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5108: tatra na vidma' kiṃ mātraśabdena vyavacchidyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5111: asti tarhi vyāvṛttirviṣaya', itarathā sadātva eva vyāvartayatīti vyavahāro bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:5115: buddhireva viṣaya' na tato 'nya iti cet /
GSP28mimslovu:5117: api ca yadyatra pratiṣidhyate tattatra nāstītyucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5118: na ceha ghaṭo nāstīti buddhi' pratiṣidhyate tattatra nāstītyucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5119: na ceha ghaṭo nāstīti buddhi' pratiṣidhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5120: buddhigocare hi nāstīti śapabde buddherevābhāva' syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5123: api caivaṃ sūkṣmasya vastuna' sadasadbhāvau prati jijñāsā na syāt,
GSP28mimslovu:5124: yadyabhāvo nāma na kaścidasti, tarhi vastunyupalabdhe ko 'yamapara'
GSP28mimslovu:5125: saṃśaya' sūkṣmeṣu keśakāṭādiṣu, tanmātropalambho hi bhāvāntarāṇāmabhāva',
GSP28mimslovu:5126: sa ca jñāta evāsaṃśayitavyaśca, saṃvida' svaprakāśatvāt kimaparamanviṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5127: dṛśye pratiyogini tanmātrabodho 'bhāvo nādṛśya iti cet, kiṃ
GSP28mimslovu:5129: yadi tattvāntaramabhāvo bhavet, tadā tadavadhāraṇe dṛśyādarśanamupayujyate
GSP28mimslovu:5130: ātmendriyamanor'thasannikarṣo hi jñānajananakāraṇam, tad yadā satsvapyaviguṇeṣvindriyādiṣu jijñāsito 'pyartha' prayatnenānviṣṭo na dṛśyate tadā tadabhāvādadarśanamiti kalpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5133: yaccoktam--- yadabhāvasya kāraṇaṃ tattanmātradhima eva kalpanālāghavādastviti /
GSP28mimslovu:5135: na hi kalpanālāghavaṃ bhavatīti pramāṇāvagatamupekṣituṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:5136: na ca yadabhāvasya kāraṇaṃ tattanmātradhiya iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5139: bhūtalādivasturūpaprakāśo hīndriyādikāraṇaka', nāsau ghaṭāderutsāraṇaṃ praharamaṃ vāpekṣate
GSP28mimslovu:5142: na hyagṛhīte vastuni nirāśrayo 'bhāva' prakāśate, kvaciddhi
GSP28mimslovu:5148: api ca yogyapramāṇānutpattirabhāvaṃ niścāyayati, na ca suṣuptasya
GSP28mimslovu:5149: pramāṇayogyor'tha', yo na prakāśata iti kathamabhāvaniścayo jāyate, ato nādarśanamagṛhītamiti suṣuptasyābhāvo na prākaśate, kintu yogyādarśanametanna bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5153: tatra hi samānopalambhayogyeṣu bahuṣu smaryamāṇeṣu yadeko na smaryate,
GSP28mimslovu:5154: tena smṛtinivṛttyā phalata' pratyakṣanivṛttyā tadabāva' pratīyate smṛtyeva bhāvāntarāṇām
GSP28mimslovu:5158: ato nāstīti jñānaṃ pramāṇam, abhāvaśca prāgabhāvādibhedabhinna'
GSP28mimslovu:5161: yatra pañca pramāṇāni sambhavatpratipattīni yathāyathaṃ paṭādervastuna'
GSP28mimslovu:5162: sattāṃ bodhayituṃ na jāyante, tasmin viṣaye 'bhāvasya pramāṇatā
GSP28mimslovu:5163: sambhavati, tadanena pramāṇaśabdo 'dhikārāt pramāṇapañcake prayukta iti
GSP28mimslovu:5165: vasturūpe na jāyata iti ca svatantrābhāvamātrajñānaṃ na pramāṇamiti darśayati /
GSP28mimslovu:5168: tādṛśenaiva hi laukikā nāstīti budhyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5169: bhāṣyasyāpyayamartha'--abhāvo 'pi na laukikā nāstīti budhyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5174: kṣīre dadhyādi yannāsti prāgabhāva' sa ucyate // Msv_5,8.2 //
GSP28mimslovu:5179: kṣīre dadhi bhavedevaṃ dadhni kṣīraṃ ghaṭe paṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:5180: śaśe śṛṅgaṃ pṛthivyādau caitanyaṃ mūrtarātmani // Msv_5,8.5 //
GSP28mimslovu:5186: pramāṇamityuktam,kiṃ punastatrānena pramīyate, abhāvastāvat svapramāṇaireva yathāsvamavagamyate, ata āha---vastvaśaṅkaraiti ||1 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:5188: yo 'yaṃ kāryakāraṇādinā parasparavivekaścaturdhā darśita' sa vastvaṅkara ityākhyāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5193: asati tvabhāvaprāmāṇye sarva' sarveṇa saṅkīryata ityāha--- kṣīra iti dvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:5195: yathā kṣīre dadhi evaṃ dadhni kṣīramityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:5201: apsu gandho rasaścagnau vāyau rūpeṇa tau saha /
GSP28mimslovu:5202: vyomni saṃsparśitā te ca na decasya pramāṇatā // Msv_5,8.6 //
GSP28mimslovu:5206: kāryādīnāmabhāva' ko yo bhāva' kāraṇādinā // Msv_5,8.8 //
GSP28mimslovu:5210: yo 'yaṃ kāraṇādivibhāgena laukikānāṃ vyavahāro dṛśyate, sarvasaṅkare na syāt, kṣīramānayeti niyukto yat kṣīramevānayati na dadhi, dadhyānayane
GSP28mimslovu:5212: nanu nābhāvo nāma tattvāntaramupalabhyate, bhūtalaṃ hi svapramāṇādavagacchāma', ghaṭaṃ cāsati pramāṇe na paśyāma', na tu ghaṭābhāvo nāmāpara' kaścit buddhau bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5213: ghaṭo nāstītyapi ghaṭo na pramīyata ityartha', na tu ghaṭābāva' pramīyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5214: ata' sarvopākhyāvirahalakṣaṇa evābhāvo na kiñcit tattvāntaramata āha---na
GSP28mimslovu:5219: ghaṭo nāstītyapi nāyamartha' ghaṭo na pramīyate iti, sannapi hi ghaṭo na pramīyata ityucyate
GSP28mimslovu:5220: ata eva ghaṭo 'sti na veti pṛṣṭo 'nirṇītābāvo nāstīti vyapadiśati, kintu anupalabdhimātram
GSP28mimslovu:5222: yaścāyaṃ caturdhā bhedo varṇita' so 'pi sarvopākhyāvirahalakṣaṇe 'bhāve na sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:5223: prayogaśca bhavati--- vastu abhāvi'(?), caturdhā bhedād, dravyādivaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:5224: yadapyāhu'--- nābhāvo nāma kiñcit tattvam, pratyarthaniyatena hyātmanā nīlādaya' parasparaṃ bhidyante, naivamabhāvasya bhāvāt kiñcid bhedakam /
GSP28mimslovu:5225: ato na vyāvṛttamupalabhāmaha iti kathaṃ tattvāntaramavasthāpamayāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:5226: tadvyavahārastu nāstīti vikalpaśabdaprayogātmā bhāvāśra eva kathañcidupapādanīya', na
GSP28mimslovu:5229: api ca, aviṣayo nāstīti vikalpa' kathaṃ saṃvedyata iti vaktavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:5230: śabdasaṃspṛṣṭaṃ hi rūpaṃ vikalpasya viṣaya', na ceha tadasti /
GSP28mimslovu:5232: ata evātmani nirvakalpatvāt kalpanā svasaṃvitti pratyakṣāmāha /
GSP28mimslovu:5235: yadi mataṃ--- jātyādivadabhāvavikalpā api samāropitaviṣayā eva,
GSP28mimslovu:5242: vikalpāstukṣaṇikā' svaviṣaye niyatā nānyonyasya viṣayamabhiniviśanta iti kathaṃ pratisāndadhīran
GSP28mimslovu:5245: ata eva kiṃ punastattvamityapekṣite satastu sadbhāvo 'satasatvasadbhāva
GSP28mimslovu:5247: api ca--- asatyabhāve kasya hetorāhatasya ghaṭasyānupalambha',
GSP28mimslovu:5251: na hyapracyutaprācyārthakriyārūpasyānupalambhe ghaṭasya kiñcitkāraṇamadhunā paśyāmo yadyasya vināśo nāma kimapi tattvāntaraṃ nāśrīyata iti siddhaṃ tattvāntaramiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5255: sattā hi vastutvam, na cāsāvabhāve vastutvavāda' na mukhyatayā /
GSP28mimslovu:5261: tasmād gavādivad vastu prameyatvācca gamyate // Msv_5,8.9 //
GSP28mimslovu:5267: kimidānīṃ bhāvābhāvayorabheda eva, neti vadāma', bhedo 'pi
GSP28mimslovu:5269: ka' punaranayo' sambandha', saṃyoga' samavāyo vā, na tāvatsaṃyoga',
GSP28mimslovu:5276: yattvanāhatamanapasāraṃ ca bhāvāntaramabhāvarūpeṇāvagamyate tat kathamasad bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:5277: ata' svahetoreva jāyamāno nityo vā sarvo 'saṅkīrṇasvabhāva eva jāyata iti
GSP28mimslovu:5281: abhāva iti sāmānyātmanā prāgabhāvādibedena ca vyāvṛttyātmanā gṛhyamāṇo
GSP28mimslovu:5286: ekaśabdavācyaṃ sāmānyarūpaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ gavādi, nānāśabdavācyaṃ ca viśeṣarūpaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:5289: asati tu viveke ekaśabdanibandhanabhrama evāyam--- abhāva'
GSP28mimslovu:5292: sati hi bādhake bhrāntirupacāro vā kalpyate, na ceha tatheti bhāva iti ||10||
GSP28mimslovu:5296: vastuni jñāyate kaiścidrūpaṃ kiñcit kadācana // Msv_5,8.12 //
GSP28mimslovu:5299: evaṃ tāvat 'vāstītyasyārthasyāsannikṛṣṭasya' iti yadutaktaṃ bhāṣye tad vivṛtam /
GSP28mimslovu:5301: anutpattireva keti cedata āha--- sātmana iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5303: tad yadā ātmā bhūtalādau na ghaṭādijñānātmanā piraṇamati sā tasya
GSP28mimslovu:5308: nanu yadi dvyātmakaṃ vastu, tarhi sakṛdeva tathā pratibhātagiti kiṃ pramāṇāntareṇāta āha--- svarūpeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5310: tadasminneva dvirūpe kiñcideva kadācit pratīyate na tu sarvātmakameva gṛhītavyamiti niyama iti ||12||
GSP28mimslovu:5311: kiṃ puna' kāraṇaṃ dvyātmakasyaikameva rūpaṃ gṛhyate nāparaṃ kiñcidata
GSP28mimslovu:5313: udbhūtaṃ hi gṛhyate nānudabhūtam, agneriva rātrau rūpaṃ na sparśa',
GSP28mimslovu:5315: ato yadeva sadasatorudbhūtaṃ bhavati tenaiva buddhivyapadeśau bhavata' /
GSP28mimslovu:5316: cetyate 'nubhava iti kimidam, na hyanubhavaścetyate, sa eva cetanā,
GSP28mimslovu:5323: ayameveti yo hyeṣa bhāve bhavati nirṇaya' /
GSP28mimslovu:5338: na hyapratisaṃhite bhāvāntarābāve saṅkīrṇasvabhāvo na niścetuṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5340: kiñcicchabdena bhāvasyābhāvānugamaśūnyamapi jñānamastyeva, na tvevabhāvasyeti darśayati ||15,16||
GSP28mimslovu:5344: kathaṃ punaridamavagamyate, visphāritākṣasya hi sahasā neha ghaṭo 'sti,
GSP28mimslovu:5347: na hyapratyakṣa eva viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭa' pratyakṣo bhavati, daṇḍa iva daṇḍī /
GSP28mimslovu:5348: na ca nāstyeva viśiṣṭā dhīriti vaktavyam, anāśrayābhāvasaṃvittyabhāvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5349: api cātmā bhāvasyābhāva', sa kathaṃ svatantro 'nubhūyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5350: na hi rūpādayo bhāvadharmā' svatantrā evāvasīyante /
GSP28mimslovu:5351: svatantrābhāvavādastu svātantryameva, sadasadātmake vastunīti hi darśayati
GSP28mimslovu:5352: bhāvāṃśo 'bhāvāṃśa iti ca vispaṣṭaṃ tadabhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ grahaṇamityāha /
GSP28mimslovu:5353: kiñcāsya svātantrye pramāṇam, na hyaṃ kadācidapi tathāvasīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5355: na tāvat pūrva' kalpa',tadavagame pramāṇāntarābhāvāt nityāsaṃvittisaṅgāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5357: pratiyogisaṃyogparatiṣedhātmai va hyabhāva', sa cādhāratantra eveti
GSP28mimslovu:5360: tadasyābhāva' pramāṇamindriyaṃ vā, yadyabhāva' sa tarhi bhāvamapi
GSP28mimslovu:5363: ata' satyupalabhyamāne tadaiva yannopalabhyate tannāstīti sata eva
GSP28mimslovu:5369: yogyatā hi kāryadarśanasamadhigamyā, sā cendriyāṇāṃ bhāvātmakagrahaṇa
GSP28mimslovu:5372: atra tu yogyatāsahitā prāptirindriyārthayo' sambandha ityabhiprāya' /
GSP28mimslovu:5379: na hi smṛtyupasthāpitanāmaviśiṣṭo ḍittho na pratyakṣo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5380: nāma cāpratyakṣaṃ smaryamāṇatvāt, tasyāgṛhīte hi viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭo nāvagamyate nāpratyakṣe
GSP28mimslovu:5382: daṇḍinyapi śābde tāvad daṇḍapadopanītaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭa eva pratyayārtho na daṇḍo 'pi /
GSP28mimslovu:5383: pratyakṣaṃ tu yogyatayobhayatra pravartatāṃ nāma, na caivamubhayatrākṣāṇāṃ yogyatā /
GSP28mimslovu:5387: dharmayorbheda iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede 'pi na' sthite /
GSP28mimslovu:5398: ayamevābhāvasya pratītiprakāra', yatpramāṇāntaraprāpitāśrayaṃ viśinaṣṭīti na kiñcidanupapamannam
GSP28mimslovu:5405: atra ca yogyatāyā uddhāṭanenaivottaraṃ deyam, tadupekṣyaiva
GSP28mimslovu:5408: yadi bhāvābhāvayorekāntaramabheda eva syāt tato bhāvendriyasannikarṣe tadabhinnasyābhāvasyāpi syāt, na tvevamasti /
GSP28mimslovu:5416: na hyekameva tattvamudbhūtamabhibhūtaṃ ceti pratīyata iti ||20||
GSP28mimslovu:5425: ayaṃ ca grāhakabhedanibandhano bhedo rūpādīnāmiti kaiścidiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5427: evaṃ hi kecid vadanti--- yathā hyekameva mukhaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:5428: maratakapadmarāgādyupādhibhedād bhinnamiva pratibhāti, yathā caika eva
GSP28mimslovu:5429: puruṣo 'pekṣābhedāt bhinnamiva pratibhāti, evamihāpi bhāvābhāvayoraupādhiko bhedo bhaviṣyatīti
GSP28mimslovu:5433: grāhakabhedanibandhano bheda', kintu buddhibhedanibandhana eva, mukhaṃ hi pramāṇāntarādekarūpamavagataṃ tadupādhibhedād bhidyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5434: na tvekatve rūpādīnāṃ bhedaheturbhāvābhāvayorapi samāna evetyabhiprāyeṇāha---buddhimātreti
GSP28mimslovu:5435: ka' punarayaṃ bhāvābhāvātmako dharmī, yaddharmau bhāvābhāvau, naikaṃ rūpādisamudāyād bhinnamupalabhyate, vṛttyādivikalpākṣamatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5436: ato deśādyabhinnānāṃ rūpādīnāṃ samudāyo dharmī, na tattvāntaramata āha---
GSP28mimslovu:5438: nātra vana iva bādhikā buddhirastīti bhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:5442: yadi tadvadapekṣātra na syād bhedo 'tra naiva hi /
GSP28mimslovu:5450: na hi rūpādaya' sadādirūpeṇa na bhidyanta iti svarūpāpekṣayāpi teṣāṃ
GSP28mimslovu:5451: bheda' śakyate vārayitum, tayā vā bheda iti na sadādyātmanābheda'
GSP28mimslovu:5453: evamabhāvo 'pi bhāvadharmatayā tato bhinno 'pi svarūpāpekṣayābhinna iṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5456: svarūpāpekṣayā rūpādivad bhedānāśrayaṇe bhāvābhāvayoranyataratra na buddhe' sadasadrūpatā bhavedityāha---yaditi ||25||
GSP28mimslovu:5459: etena, yadāhu'--- na bhāvād bhedakamabhāvasya rūpamupalabhāmaha iti,
GSP28mimslovu:5463: yanna sambadhyate ghaṭādi tannāstīti pratīyata iti ||26||
GSP28mimslovu:5464: nanvindriyavyāpāranantarameveha ghaṭo nāstīti jñānamutpadyate , tat kuto 'yaṃ viveko nendriyeṇābhāvabudghirjanyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5465: na hyasati tadvyāpāre bhāvabuddhivadabhāvabuddhirapi jāyamānā dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5466: yadyapi bhāvādabhāvo bhidyate, tathāpi tasya rūpādivatsaṃyuktasamavāyena
GSP28mimslovu:5472_0: ayamabhiprāya'--- nānāśrayo 'bhāva' śakyate grahītumityāśrayagrahaṇārthamevātrendriyāpekṣā nābhāvagrahaṇāya, yathā nāsmṛte
GSP28mimslovu:5475: api tu yogyatāsahitā prāptiriti pratyakṣe varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:5483: kevalātmamana' sannikarṣādeva bāhyendriyānapekṣaṃ pramāṇābhāvenābhāvajñānaṃ janyata ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5488: yo hi gṛhasvarūpemevāvadhārya kvacidgata' pṛcchyate--- tatra caitro 'sti
GSP28mimslovu:5489: na veti, tadāsau pṛṣṭastatra nāstītāṃ tadaiva pratipadyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5490: yadi tvindriyādhīnamabāvajñānaṃ bhavet nā sati tadvyāpāre jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5495: na ca tāvātāṃ smaraṇaṃ samprati viśeṣeṇa smaryata iti, tadayuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5496: na hyabhāvatvaṃ nāma sāmānyanyato 'vagato viśeṣeṇa smaryata iti, yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5499: tastadānīmeva pratiyogismaraṇapura' saramindriyānapekṣamabhāvajñānaṃ jāyata iti manoharamidam
GSP28mimslovu:5504: bhāvāṃśo nanu liṅgaṃ syāt tadānīṃ nājighṛṇāt // Msv_5,8.29 //
GSP28mimslovu:5506: tasmin pratīyamāne tu nābhāve jāyate mati' // Msv_5,8.30 //
GSP28mimslovu:5509: kvacid bhāve 'pi sadbhāvo jñāto yasya kadācana /
GSP28mimslovu:5515: dvāvatra bhāvau pratiṣedhya' pratiṣedhādhāraśca, tatra na tāvat
GSP28mimslovu:5516: pratiṣedhyo liṅgam, avagataṃ hi liṅgaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5517: na ca tadā ghaṭo gṛhyate, na hi tasmin gṛhyamāṇe tadabhāvo grahītuṃ
GSP28mimslovu:5521: astu tarhi pratiṣedhādhārabhāvo liṅgamata āha---na caiṣaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5523: yathārthe pakṣīkṛte padamataddharmatayā na heturityuktam, evameṣo 'pi
GSP28mimslovu:5527: tat kathaṃ tataste pratyeṣyanta ityāha--- saheti ||31||
GSP28mimslovu:5528: astu tāvadabhāvānvaya' kvacid bhūtalādau bhāve, sadbhāvo 'pi yasya
GSP28mimslovu:5529: ghaṭāde' kadācit jñāta' tasyāpi tatrābhāvo 'vagamyata ityāha---kvaciditi ||32||
GSP28mimslovu:5540: na kevalaṃ yadyatra kadācid dṛṣṭaṃ tanmātrasya tatrābhāvo 'vagamyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5541: yasyāpi tu yatrābhāvo na dṛṣṭapūrvastasyāpi tatrābhāvo 'vagamyata
GSP28mimslovu:5545: na caivamastīti vyatirekeṇa darśayati---gṛhīte 'pi ca bhāvāṃśe naicābhāve
GSP28mimslovu:5551: tadihābhāvākhye sambandhini grahītavye kiṃ pramāṇamiti vaktavyamityāha---
GSP28mimslovu:5553: na tāvalliṅgagaviditasambandhaṃ tadavadhāraṇe pramāṇam, itaretarāśrayaṃ hi tathā syādityabhiprāyeṇāha---tadānīmiti
GSP28mimslovu:5559: dvedhā hi hetavo bauddhairvibhajyante--- kāryaṃ svabhāva iti,
GSP28mimslovu:5560: anupalabdhiścekajñānasaṃsargiṇorekopalabdhireva, tasyāśca svarūpaṃ jñeyarūpaṃ ca prakāśate iti jñānajñeyasvabhāvā /
GSP28mimslovu:5562: tasyāśca svasādhyena nāstīti vikalpaśabdātmakavyavahāreṇa tadyogyatayā vā tādātmyameva pratibandha'
GSP28mimslovu:5563: na hyasau nāstīti vyavahāraṃ vyabhicarati śiṃśapeva vṛkṣatām /
GSP28mimslovu:5565: viviktadeśopalabdhāvapi ghaṭāya ghaṭate taṃ prati nāstīti vyavahāraṃ tadyogyatāṃ vānumāpayati
GSP28mimslovu:5566: evaṃ ca ghaṭādyabhāvānupalabdhiprayoga'--- yad dṛśyaṃ hi sadyatra nopalabhyate tattatra nāsti
GSP28mimslovu:5567: nopalabhyate copalabhyamāne deśe dṛśyo ghaṭa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5569: ya evānupalabdhyānumātumiṣyate ghaṭābhāvo nāstīti vyavahārastadyogyatā vā naikenāpi viśeṣeṇānupalabdhe' sambandho 'vagata', kathaṃ tato viśeṣānumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:5571: vyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathaṃ viśeṣeṇa ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahārayet /
GSP28mimslovu:5572: ghaṭānupalabdhirasau, ato ghaṭābhāvaṃ tadvyavahāraṃ vā prasādhayatīti cet
GSP28mimslovu:5575: tacca sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭamiti kathamekenaiva vyapadiśyate ced ghaṭābhāvo nāma kaścit_ /
GSP28mimslovu:5576: kasmācca satyapi ghaṭe ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahāro na pravartate /
GSP28mimslovu:5580: viviktopalabdhirhi ghaṭānupalabdhi', nāsau ghaṭe satīti cet, ko vivekārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5583: sādha eva, yadasati ghaṭe nāstīti vyavahāro na satīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5584: yaccedaṃ ghaṭābhāvamatilaṅghya nāstīti vyavahārānumānamavasthitaṃ tadapi kena viśeṣeṇeti na vidma' /
GSP28mimslovu:5586: yogyatā tadanatirekiṇī tasmin buddhe buddhaiveti na kiñcidanumeyaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:5590: vyabhicārādā viśeṣāstu pratīyeran kathaṃ tayā // Msv_5,8.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:5593: sa cānyena grahītavyo nāgṛhīte hi liṅgatā /
GSP28mimslovu:5596: kvāpyasya syāt pramāṇatvaṃ liṅgatvena vinā dhruvam // Msv_5,8.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:5599: abhāvasāmānyena tvanupabdhe' sambandha' sidhyatyeva, na tvabhāvasāmānye pramāṇamupajāyata ityāha--- sāmānyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5602: api ca--- nānavagatarūpaṃ liṅgamanumāne liṅgaṃ bhavati, tadiyaṃ pratyakṣādyanutpattirabhāvatvādapareṇa liṅgenāvagantavyā /
GSP28mimslovu:5603: evaṃ hi vadanti,yāvān kaścit pratiṣedha' sa sarvo 'palabdhereveti /
GSP28mimslovu:5604: evaṃ ca tatra tatra sadṛśāparāparaliṅgānusāreṇānavasthāpāta ityāha--- na ceti dvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:5612: yadi tu nāstīti buddhireva liṅgamityucyate tanna /
GSP28mimslovu:5613: phalaṃ hi sā, pratyakṣādyanutpādasya kathaṃ talliṅgam, tatsiddhyarthameva hi liṅgamiṣyate
GSP28mimslovu:5622: yadi sā phalaṃ kiṃ tarhi pramāṇata āha--- tasyaiveti /
GSP28mimslovu:5623: yasyaiva sā phalaṃ tadeva pratyakṣādyanutpatte' phalānantaryātpramāṇamiti
GSP28mimslovu:5627: na cānutpattirutpatte' prāgabhāvo buddhe' kenacijjanyate, prāgeva trilakṣaṇena hetuneti /
GSP28mimslovu:5632: atra codayati--- (mānamiti) pramāṇatā hi bhāvātmanā vyāptā
GSP28mimslovu:5636: sa ca prāmāṇye kāraṇaṃ na bhāvasvarūpatā /
GSP28mimslovu:5637: sā tu prāmāṇyaṃ pratyaprayojikaiva kathañcitteṣu saṅgatā, ato nābhāvatvenāprāmāṇyaṃ bhavati
GSP28mimslovu:5640: yathā bhāvātmake meye 'bhāva' pramāṇaṃ nānurūpaṃ tathā tadabhāve bhāva ityāha--- bhāvātmaka iti ||46||
GSP28mimslovu:5641: bhāvātmakasya mānatvaṃ na ca rājājñayā sthitam /
GSP28mimslovu:5646: tathā sati ca pūrvokto vyavahāro na sidhyati // Msv_5,8.49 //
GSP28mimslovu:5648: yatrābhāvo 'sti tenāsyā' sambandho naiva vidyate // Msv_5,8.50 //
GSP28mimslovu:5649: yo na sannihitastatra tasya dharmo bhavediyam /
GSP28mimslovu:5650: na ca tasya prameyatvaṃ dharmadharmitvavarjanāt // Msv_5,8.51 //
GSP28mimslovu:5651: na bhāvatmakameva pramāṇamiti rājājñā, yadeva tu paricchedaphalaṃ tadeva tu pramāṇam, tacca pratyakṣādyajanmano 'pi
GSP28mimslovu:5655: tathā ca sati bauddhānāmapi liṅga prameyatve na syātām, te 'pi hi nāvastuno dṛṣṭe ityāha-- yadīti sārdhena /
GSP28mimslovu:5657: na ca syād vyavahāro 'yamiti kāraṇādivibhāgenokto vyavahāra ityartha'
GSP28mimslovu:5661: nanvabhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ bhūtalaṃ sādhayiṣyāma', tacca pūrvavagatamiti taddharmo
GSP28mimslovu:5663: na hi bhūtale pratyakṣānutpatti', jñāyamānatvāt tasyeti ||50||
GSP28mimslovu:5664: ghaṭasya tarhi dharmo bhaviṣyati tadgocare pratyakṣādīnāmanutpatterata
GSP28mimslovu:5667: yatra pratyakṣādīni notpadyante taddharmatā kathañcid bhavedapi, na tvasāviha pramīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5671: tajjñānād viṣaytavaṃ ca jñāne meyaṃ na vidyate // Msv_5,8.52 //
GSP28mimslovu:5673: nāgṛhīte hi dharmatvaṃ gṛhīte siddhasādhanam // Msv_5,8.53 //
GSP28mimslovu:5677: prameyatvād yathā bhāvastasmād bhāvātmakāt pṛthak // Msv_5,8.55 //
GSP28mimslovu:5678: karmāṇi sarvāṇi phalai' samastai' sarvairyathāvacca yadaṅgakāraṇḍai' /
GSP28mimslovu:5679: na saṅgatānīha parasparaṃ hi nāṅgaṃ tadetatprabhavaṃ kratūnām //
GSP28mimslovu:5681: nāpi tadviśiṣṭaṃ bhūtalādi, tadānīṃ tasya tatrābhāvāditi ||51||
GSP28mimslovu:5682: abhāvasya tu sādharmo bhaviṣyati tadviṣayatvāt tasyā' /
GSP28mimslovu:5683: abhāve hi prameye sā liṅgaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:5684: kintu nāsrañcetito bhāvo viṣayo bhaviṣyati, jñāte ca prameyābhāva
GSP28mimslovu:5686: anyastu na kaścidabhāvenānutpatte' sambandhaprakāro vidyate, yena taddharmatāmanugamyānumānaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha---saṃyogaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5689: atha tadvadabhāvo 'pi prāk pratīyata ityucyate, siddhaṃ tarhi sādhyata iti
GSP28mimslovu:5690: evaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ prasādhitaṃ bhedaṃ prayogeṇa darśayati---abhāvaśabdeti ||54||
GSP28mimslovu:5697: tato 'dhikaṃ yad dvayamiṣṭamanyairbhedo na tasyetyapi siddhametat //
GSP28mimslovu:5698: iha bhavati śatādau sambhavādyā sahasrānmatiraviyutabāvāt sānumānādabhinnā
GSP28mimslovu:5699: jagati bahu na tathyaṃ nityamaitihyamuktaṃ bhavati tu yadi satyaṃ nāgamād bhidyate tat // ṇyādṛte sidhyatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5703: nanu ca vyāsamatānusāriṇopamānātiriktaṃ pramāṇadvayamupavarṇitam, ṛṣiṇā ca sambhavaitihyayorapi pramāṇatvamāśritam, tatparityāge kāraṇaṃ vaktavyamata
GSP28mimslovu:5707: āgamaśca mīmāṃsātantram, ato yuktyāgamābhyāmiha śābare bhāṣye pramāṇaṣaṭkameva pravivicya tarkitam /
GSP28mimslovu:5710: yā tāvat sahasrācchate mati' sambhavākhyaṃ pramāṇamiṣyate sānumānānna
GSP28mimslovu:5715: nidhiprāptyasurakanyāvaśīkaraṇādi, draupadīpañcabhartṛketyādi , yadi tat satyaṃ tadāgamād (na) bhidyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5726: śabdastu na pramāṇam, kuta'? animittaṃ vidyamānopalambhanatvāt' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5728: dharmeṇa śabdo 'pi na pramāṇam, viśeṣeṇa tvātmabhāvinā dharmeṇāpramāṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:5729: tathā hi citrayā paśavo bhāvyanta iti citrayā yajetetyasyāratha' /
GSP28mimslovu:5733: kimuktaṃ bhavati--- upalambhanāni hi cakṣurādīni paśūnāṃ vidyante /
GSP28mimslovu:5739: asyārtha' paralokaphalā hi tatra svargakāmo yajetetyevamādicodanā vedabāhyaboddhādiparamatenākṣiptā'
GSP28mimslovu:5741: nanūbhayīmapi codanāmākṣeptuṃ śakyata eva vākyatvādayo hetava' /
GSP28mimslovu:5742: ta eva tatra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'yat kiñcana laukikaṃ vanacam' iti
GSP28mimslovu:5744: vārtikakṛtāpi---'yadi vā puruṣādhīnaprāmāṇyā' sarvacodanā' iti vivṛtā' /
GSP28mimslovu:5746: yadapi cedanīmaihikākṣepa ityuktaṃ tadayuktam, ihāpi ca---'evaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:5747: dṛṣṭāpacārasya vedasya svargādyapi phalaṃ nāstīti manyāmaha' iti
GSP28mimslovu:5765: tathāpyarthasāmarthyātadavagamyate, kathamaparathā'yadāsau vidyamānāsīt tadā palaṃ na dattavatī, kālāntare punarasatī kathaṃ dāsyati' iti na ca
GSP28mimslovu:5767: mābhūdanantaram, amī puna' paśava' sambhavanti yajamānasyātraiveti svahetusamanantaramanupalabhyamānā
GSP28mimslovu:5769: ayameva tu śabdaśaktiparāmarśo vārtikakṛtā tārkikaprakriyāmanuvidadhānena 'na vā paśuphale'tyādinā sādhanaprayogairupadarśita' /
GSP28mimslovu:5775: karmānantaramupalabhyatāmaihikaphalaṃ tu paśvādi kiṃ nopalabhyate, na
GSP28mimslovu:5776: cedamupalabhyate, tanna nūnaṃ tat phalamiti aihikaphalakarmacodanāvyabhicāreṇānyāsāmapi paralokaphalānāṃ
GSP28mimslovu:5778: pūrvaṃ tu tā' parata' prāmāṇyamāśritya paroktairaiva vākyatvādibhirhetubhirākṣiptā' /
GSP28mimslovu:5783: idānīṃ tu sūtrakāreṇa svayamevocyata iti tenedameva sarvacodanākṣepakṣetramityuktamiti ||1||
GSP28mimslovu:5784: atra parihāre pūrvokta evākṣepaheturiti, tamupanyasyati--- citreti phalānītyantena /
GSP28mimslovu:5787: nadītīre phalānīti tatrādṛsyāni tāni cet // Msv_5,9.3 //
GSP28mimslovu:5788: na vā paśuphalā citrā svakāle tadadānata' /
GSP28mimslovu:5789: snānabhujyādivat te 'pi tatsādhyā na bhavanti vā // Msv_5,9.4 //
GSP28mimslovu:5802: prāyeṇa caitrañjātīyakaṃ vipralipsureva prayuṅkta iti vipralipsorityuktamiti ||2,3||
GSP28mimslovu:5803: idānīmaihikākṣepa ityuktaṃ vivṛṇoti--- na veti vadantena /
GSP28mimslovu:5804: citreṣṭirdharmiṇī, na paśuphaleti sādhyam, svakāle paśvadānāt,
GSP28mimslovu:5807: te paśavo na citrāsādhyā' , citrotpattāvasadbhāvāt svargatṛptisukhādivat /
GSP28mimslovu:5809: etau ca prayogau 'neṣṭi' paśuphalā,karmakāle ca karmaphalena bhavitavyam'
GSP28mimslovu:5811: atrānantaraṃ 'yatkālaṃ hi mardanaṃ tatkālameva mardanasukham' iti
GSP28mimslovu:5814_0: citrā na paśuphalā paśavo na tatsādhyā ityubhayatrāpi prayoge vaidharmyeṇa sukhamardane bhavetām, īdṛśī cātra vaidharmyaracanā,
GSP28mimslovu:5815: yacca yatsādhyaṃ tat tadutpattau bhavatyeva sukhamiva mardanotpattāviti
GSP28mimslovu:5817: na ca kiñcidiha visaṃvāda', na hi kṛte karmaṇi tāvatyeva phalena
GSP28mimslovu:5833: nanvevamapi sāmarthyalabhyamānantaryamanantaraphalānupalambhanena bādhyatām, aviśeṣapravṛttā tu codanā kataṃ bādhyate ata āha--- śabdeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5834: na hi sāmarthyaṃ nāma pṛthak pramāṇam, api tarhi sarvākhyātānāmarthaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:5836: ata' sruvāvadānamivāpyadravyeṣvarthādanantarameva phalaṃ niścīyata iti tadbodhe 'pi śābdabodho bhavatyeveti ||6||
GSP28mimslovu:5838: yadi hyatra phalaṃ dāsyatīti ḷṅśroṣyat tadā tatsāmarthyena kalpanā kācidapyabhaviṣyat /
GSP28mimslovu:5839: adya punarasyedaṃ karmaṇa' phalamiti paryavasite vacasi
GSP28mimslovu:5840: sarvakarmaṇāmanantaraphalopalambhād vaidikasyāpi citrādeścodyamānasyāpi karmaṇastatsvābhāvyādānantaryaṃ viśeṣaṇatayāvatiṣṭhata iti ||7||
GSP28mimslovu:5842: 'sa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamāno 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokaṃ yātī'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:5851: śarīdād yadi cānya' syānnāsau yajñāyudhī bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:5852: na cāsya yajamānatvaṃ sadbhāvo 'pi ca durlabha' // Msv_5,9.10 //
GSP28mimslovu:5853: su tvanantaraphalānupalambhamātraṃ na tu viruddhopalambha' kaścidastīti syādapi kālāntare phalakalpanā, bhasmībhūtaṃ tu śarīraṃ kālāntare 'pi
GSP28mimslovu:5854: svargaṃ lokaṃ yāsyatīti na sambhavatīti pūrvasmād viśeṣa' ||8||
GSP28mimslovu:5856: majjantyalābūni, grāvāṇa' plavanta iti yathā ' iti bhāṣyam, tad vyācaṣṭeyajñeti vākyamantena
GSP28mimslovu:5857: yajñāyudhavaco dharmī, mṛṣeti sādhyo dharma', pratyakṣavirodhāt,
GSP28mimslovu:5858: yatpratyakṣaviruddhaṃ tanmithyā, yathā grāvāṇa' plavanta iti śilā vākyaṃ sādharmyeṇa yatheti darśayitavyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5861: pūrvaṃ tu mardanasukhayorvaidharmye dṛṣṭāntaratayopanyāsācchilāvākyamapi vaidharmyeṇa bhāṣyakṛtoktamiti bhrāntimapanetuṃ sādharmyavaidharmyaviveko vārtikakṛtā darśita' ||9||
GSP28mimslovu:5862: nanu pratyakṣavirodhāditi hetusiddha eva, asti hi paralokaphalabhoktā
GSP28mimslovu:5863: cetana' karmaṇāṃ kartā, sa svargaṃ lokaṃ yāsyatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5866: yadi hi śarīrādanyaścetano bhavet, bhavedapi na tasya yajñāyudhairasti kaścit sambandhaprakāra', śarīrasyaiva tu srukkapālādiyajñāyudhai'
GSP28mimslovu:5867: sambandha', yadyajñāyudhī yajamāna iti tadabhiprāyeṇa matvarthasaṃyogo ghaṭate /
GSP28mimslovu:5868: api ca 'sa eṣa' ityaparokṣapratinirdeśa', so 'pi śarīrasyaiva pratyakṣatvādupapanno nātmana'
GSP28mimslovu:5870: kiñca yajamānaśabdo hyātmanyasamañjasa', yāgasya hi kartā yajamāna
GSP28mimslovu:5875: viśeṣo 'syeti bhedena nopāttaṃ syādidaṃ tata' // Msv_5,9.11 //
GSP28mimslovu:5878: phalaṃ ca na bhavedevaṃ bhasmībhāvād vidhāvapi /
GSP28mimslovu:5879: tatsāmarthyena yānyapi kalpanā tāṃ niṣedhati // Msv_5,9.13 //
GSP28mimslovu:5881: abhyupagamya cātmana' sadbhāvamidamasmābhiruktam, paramārthena tu dehendriyavyatiriktātmasadbhāvo 'pi pramāṇābhāvād durlabha ityāha---
GSP28mimslovu:5883: prapañcayiṣyate caitadātmavāda itīha na pratanyata iti ||10||
GSP28mimslovu:5884: aparaṃ ca--- 'na caiṣa yātīti vidhiśabda''iti bhāṣyam /
GSP28mimslovu:5886: asyārtha'--- yadi hyatra yajñāyudhivākye vidhiśabdo bhavet, tadā citrādīnāmanantaraphalādarśanād bhedena virodhopanyāsārthaṃ yajñāyudhivākyopādānaṃ nopapadyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5888: vidhiśabde ko viśeṣa', ata āha--- vidhīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5889: vidhiśabde hi kālaviśeṣānupādānād vidhisāmarthyādeva kālāntarabhāvitāṃ phalasya parikalpya syādapi citrādicodanāsvivābhāvavirodhaparihāra' /
GSP28mimslovu:5890: iha tu yātīti vartamānāpadeśānna pratyakṣavirodha' śakyate parihartumityadarśanād viśeṣa iti
GSP28mimslovu:5891: citrādivākyābhiprāyeṇa cedamasmābhiruktam--- vidhiśabde bhaviṣyattvaṃ phalasya parikalpya virodha' śakyate parihartumiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5892: iha tu pratyakṣeṇa bhasmībhāvopalambhānna kālālantaraphalabhāvitayā svargagamanaṃ phalamiti śakyate kalpayitum /
GSP28mimslovu:5895: takiṃ tarhi vidhiśabdatānirākaraṇasya phalamata āha--- tatsāmarthyeneti /
GSP28mimslovu:5898: mantreṣu ceti te sarve pakṣīkāryā' prayatnata' // Msv_5,9.14 //
GSP28mimslovu:5902: manupapadyamāna' kalpayedapi kāyakaraṇasaṅghātātiriktamātmānam, tasya ca svargalokagamanamupacaryetāpi śarīre, tasya vā pratyakṣatvamātmani
GSP28mimslovu:5906: sa ca sarva evātra prayatnato mukhyatayā mithyātvena aihikākṣepe pakṣīkārya', tanmithyātvena cānuṣaṅgikaṃ peraṣāṃ mithyātvaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:5910: yadā hi citrādivākyādiṣvaprāmāṇyaṃ samarthitaṃ bhavati, tadā vedavākyaikadeśatayāgnihotrādivākyeṣvapi mṛṣārthatā śakyate 'numātum, ata'
GSP28mimslovu:5919: yattu tamadūṣayitvaivānyaducyate tadasaṅgatamevāta āha--- svapakṣa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5920_0: ayamabhiprāya'--- yāvaddhi sambandhautpattikatvenānapekṣālakṣaṇaṃ codanāyā' svata' prāmāṇyaṃ na pratipādyate tāvad dūṣite
GSP28mimslovu:5920_1: 'pi sādhane na 'canodanālakṣaṇo dharma' iti pratijñā sidhyati bhūyāṃścānena krameṇārtho vaktumabhipreta' śabdārthasambandhanirūpaṇādi' /
GSP28mimslovu:5923: na cedamākṣepeṇa na saṅgacchate, dvedhāpi pratyavasthānadarśanāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5927: na cātra parasādhanadūṣaṇaṃ na kariṣyate 'tatra hetorasiddhatvam' iti citrāparihāre vakṣyate
GSP28mimslovu:5928: anena tu krameṇa tat kartavyamiti tāvadityuktamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5929: tacca svapakṣasādhanaṃ tārkikāṇāṃ cittamanurañja yituṃ prayogadvāreṇāha---amṛṣeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5930: vaidikavaco dharmī, svārthe satyamiti sādhyo (?) dharma', svārthe
GSP28mimslovu:5931: vaktranapekṣatvāt, yat svārthe vaktāraṃ nāpekṣate tat satyam, yathā padāt padārthagatā buddhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:5932: padaṃ hi svabhāvādeva svārthena sambaddhaṃ tatpratipādanāya vaktāraṃ nāpekṣata iti sambandhaparihāre vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5936: na hi svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryādityādyarthe svargakāmo yajeteti vākyaṃ samyagiṣyate, ṣaṣṭhādyasiddhāntavirodhāt
GSP28mimslovu:5937: yāgena svargaṃ kuryāditi hi tatra sthāsyati /
GSP28mimslovu:5945: vyaktaye vaktrapekṣā, svārthe tu pratyāyayitavye na vaktāramapekṣante,
GSP28mimslovu:5952: vaidikavākyakṛta' pratyaya' samyagiti sādhyam, nityavākyodbhavatvāt, yathā tadvākyasvarūpaviṣayā buddhi' /
GSP28mimslovu:5955: atraiva sādhye pūrvoktā'--- 'nānyatvāt' iti bhāṣyavyākhyānāvasara uktā'---
GSP28mimslovu:5957: deśādibhede 'pi deśādibhede 'pi bādhavarjanāt iti hetavo darśayitavyā
GSP28mimslovu:5959: atra bhāṣyam--- 'syādetat, naiva śabdasyārthena sambandha', kuto 'sya
GSP28mimslovu:5962_0: asyārtha'--- śabdārthasambandhānāṃ nityatvamāśrityānapekṣatvāditi sūtrakāreṇa yo hetu' svata' prāmāṇyasidhyarthamukta', tena
GSP28mimslovu:5963: evaṃ ca tadā vārtikakāreṇa vṛttikāramatenātraiva svata' prāmāṇyaṃ vyutpādyamiti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:5964: tathā ca 'sūtrakāreṇa cocyata' iti punaruktiparihāre parata'
GSP28mimslovu:5966: ihāpi ca bhāṣyakāreṇa 'brūta' ityucyate--- avabodhayati budhyamānasya nimittaṃ bhavati, ityādi codanāsūtroktameva svata' prāmāṇyakāraṇamuktamiti
GSP28mimslovu:5968: naiva vāstyatra sambandha' kṛtako veti vakṣyate ||5||
GSP28mimslovu:5972: codanāmithyārthanirāsārthaṃ hi sambamandhasadbhāvo nityatā ca heturukta' /
GSP28mimslovu:5975: kṛtakatvaṃ tu 'yadi prathamamaśruto na pratyāyayati, kṛtakastarhi'
GSP28mimslovu:5978: na cāsati sambandhe paroktārthapratītirutpadyata iti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:5980: anādṛtapratibandhastu yatkiñcid vidvān sa sarvaṃ jānīyādityatiprasajyata iti ||4,5||
GSP28mimslovu:5981: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvādaya' sambandhā' śabdasyānupapannā ityuktvā saṃśleṣasambandhabhāva eva darśita', tadetadvārtikakāro
GSP28mimslovu:5984: śabdārthayoratyantāsambhāv itā eva, kāryakāraṇabhāvastu boddhagandhivaiyākaraṇairabhyupagata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:5987: abhidhānābhidheyau tu jñānākārau tathāpi na''|| iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5989: evaṃ hi manyante--- na tāvad varṇā' śabda', pratyekamavacākatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5991_0: ata eva gośabdatvādijātyasambhavāt bhūtādiviśeṣāṇāṃ ca pratiprayogamanyatvenāvācakatvād varṇabuddhismṛtisaṃskārāṇāṃ cākṣaravat
GSP28mimslovu:6000: sa cāyamevambhūtor'tha' śabdena janyata eveti kāryakāraṇabhāvameva
GSP28mimslovu:6003: dṛṣṭā hi khalu mṛtsalilapracchannā api vrīhayo 'ṅkurādikāryamārabhamāṇā
GSP28mimslovu:6005: kathaṃ tu saṃśleṣa' pariśiṣyata iti, pratīterabhyupagamācca /
GSP28mimslovu:6006: gaurayamiti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdopaśliṣṭamarthamavayanto laukikā dṛśyante /
GSP28mimslovu:6009: laukikāśca prāyeṇa saṃśleṣameva saṃbandhaṃ manyante iti sa eva sambandha'
GSP28mimslovu:6010: prasakko nirākārya ityāha--- tasminniti prāhāyena bhavati sa taddeśa eva
GSP28mimslovu:6011: dṛśyate rañjuriva ghaṭe, tadanantaradeśe vā pradeśinīvamadhyamāyā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6017: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'syāccedarthena sambandha' kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhyasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām', ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:6019: asyārtha'--- atra bhāṣyakāreṇa śabdārthayo' sambnadhasiddhyarthaṃ taddeśānantarādṛṣṭeriti heturantarṇīta', taṃ ca gaurayamiti
GSP28mimslovu:6020: sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītibhramād yo nāmāsiddhaṃ manyate, sa evaṃ pratībodhyate--- yadi śabdārthayorupaśleṣa pitāputrādisambandhairanaikānta' prasajyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6024: lakṣaṇa' sambandho bhavet, artho 'pi śabdadeśa eva syāt, mukhaṃ ca tasya
GSP28mimslovu:6025: deśa iti kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām, na ca te
GSP28mimslovu:6034: sambandho 'bhipreta', tad yadi saṃśleṣalakṣaṇasambandhābhāva' sādhyate, tadā siddhasādhyatādoṣa'
GSP28mimslovu:6037: yadi tu vācyavācakasambandhamevābhipretya na śabdār'thena saṅgata iti sādhyate tato laukikavirodha ityāha---vācyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:6040: ayamabhiprāya'--- caturvidho hi puruṣa', pratipanno 'pratipanna' sandigdho viparyastaśceti
GSP28mimslovu:6041: tatra pratipanna' pratipādayitā, itare sāpekṣā' pratipādyā',
GSP28mimslovu:6042: tatpratipādanārthā ca pratijñā, tadya eva teṣāmanyatama' para'
GSP28mimslovu:6045: prayuñjānairāśrita' śabādarthayorvācyavācakalakṣaṇasambandha iti tanninirākaraṇe svavāgvirodha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6051: śabdānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā kartṛtvaṃ vā nirūpita' /
GSP28mimslovu:6054: asyārtha'--- ekasyāmabhidhānakriyāyāṃ śabda' karaṇaṃ kartā vā, vivakṣāta'
GSP28mimslovu:6058: nirūpita'--- sambandha iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6060: vaktropādīyamānāvaruṇaikahānīvadvivakṣitasāhityau śabdārtho yanniyamyete so 'nayo' sambandha ityāha--- pratipattāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:6062: upādeyasya hi viśeṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitaṃ bhavati śorivaikatvaṃ--- paśunā yajeteti /
GSP28mimslovu:6074: pākādau yadaudanādisthālyādi...(kriyā) vyavahāradarśanāt anabhihitamapyarthaṃ jānāti tadā sthālyādīnāṃ vivakṣitaṃ sāhityaṃ manyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6080_0: evaṃ ca viditvā svayamapi parārthaprayoge sahitau śabdārthau hṛdayamāveśitāvupādāya śabdaṃ coccārya parapratipattiṃ bhāvayatīti
GSP28mimslovu:6080_1: sūktaṃ sāhityavivakṣā varṇasāhityavivakṣāvaditi ||12-13 niyamyete tadekasyāṃ sambandha' sor'thaśabdayo' /
GSP28mimslovu:6084: nanvevaṃ vadatā śabdārthayo' kriyāsambandha eva darśita', na parasparam,
GSP28mimslovu:6086: vakṣyati hi--- 'guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvādasambandha' samatvāt' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6088: kriyākārakasambandhapūrvakatvāt sarvasambandhānāṃ kriyākārakasambandha eva darśita iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6089: astu tāvat, taduttarakālabhāvī tu ko 'nayo' sambandha iti vācyameva /
GSP28mimslovu:6092: tathāpi pratipattyabhidhānayoryā kācit kriyā gṛhyate, tasyāṃ ca kriyākārakasambandhottarakālabhāvī
GSP28mimslovu:6096: sambandha ityuktam, 'pratipattāvupādānāt' iti kriyānumānāṅgatvameva parasparaniyamātmako sambandha ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:6111: na ca guṇena svamahimnā āśrayabhūtadravyamātramupādīyamānamapi kraye
GSP28mimslovu:6113: dravye (guṇamātrā) vacchedāt tad guṇamātramupādīyamānamapi krayakriyā na pratīcchati svakīyāruṇimaguṇāvarodhāt
GSP28mimslovu:6116: śabdārthayo' kriyākārakasambandhottarakālabhāvī yo 'yamupākāryopakārakabhāva', sa eva sambandha'
GSP28mimslovu:6118: śrūyatām--- artho hi na pratipādakamantareṇa pratipādyo bhavati, śabdo na pratipādyamanteraṇa pratipādaka' /
GSP28mimslovu:6122: sambandhābhidhānam, na tu niyama eva sambandha' /
GSP28mimslovu:6125: na tu śaktireva sambandha', tadatra pratyāsatterabhedopacāreṇa śakti'
GSP28mimslovu:6126: sambandha', niyama' sambandha', kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā sambandha
GSP28mimslovu:6131: na ca sadānīṃ tau na sta', nityatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6136: saṃjñeti gamakatvaṃ cenna tadaṅgamiyaṃ bhavet // Msv_5,9.16 //
GSP28mimslovu:6139: anuccarite 'pi hi śabde 'sti pratipādakaśakti',arthe ca pratipādyaśakti'
GSP28mimslovu:6141: nanvemapi karahastādibhiranekai' śabdairekatrārthe pratipādye anekārthavacane caikasmin gavādiśabde kathamavyabhicāra' śakyate 'vagantum
GSP28mimslovu:6142_0: ata' prakaraṇādīnāmapi padārthāvadhāraṇāpoyatvād vṛddhavyavahāre hi bālena kevalapadāprayogādāvāpoddhārabhedenaitadavadhāritam---
GSP28mimslovu:6142_1: yadā yadarthavivakṣayā śabda' prayujyate sa tasyārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6146: tadevamarthaprakaraṇādibhedabhinnamanyayānyayā ca śaktyopahitamanyadanyacca padamanyasyānyasya vācakamiti na padavyabhicāra'
GSP28mimslovu:6147: artho 'pi codbhūtatatpadābhidhānayogyāvasthābhedabhinno hastādiranyo 'nyaśac karādipadānāṃ vācya iti na padaṃ vyabhicarati /
GSP28mimslovu:6152_0: nanvevamekriyānimittako niyama' śabdārthayo' sambandha ityucyamāne 'numānāṅgamavinābhāva evāśrito bhavet, atastadabalena
GSP28mimslovu:6162: sānaṅgaṃ tadvadeva syānneyaṃ dhūmādibhi' samā // Msv_5,9.18 //
GSP28mimslovu:6164: gamakatvena pūrvaṃ ca tatra notpadyate mati' // Msv_5,9.19 //
GSP28mimslovu:6166: yadaiva ceha sambandhaṃ vṛddhebhya' pratipādyate // Msv_5,9.20 //
GSP28mimslovu:6178: yathaivāvinanābhāva eva dhūmādau pratītyaṅgaṃ na taduttarakālabhāvi
GSP28mimslovu:6184: api ca dhūme prathamaṃ gamakatvaṃ nāvagamyata ityāha -- gamakatveneti
GSP28mimslovu:6186: gamakatvenaiva śabde prathamaṃ vyutpattirityuktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti---kathayantītitrayeṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:6187: ayamartha'--- tredhā hi śabde vyutpatti', vṛddhopadeśāt tadavyavahārāt padāntarasamabhivyāhārādvā
GSP28mimslovu:6189: tathāha--- vṛddhopadeśe tāvadayamasya vācya' ayamasya vācaka
GSP28mimslovu:6193: itthaṃ vācakatā siddhā saṅkīrṇāpi tata' param // Msv_5,9.24 //
GSP28mimslovu:6199: yatrāpi kvaciduccaritād vākyāt prayojyavṛddhasyārthāviṣayāṃ kriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā ceṣṭānumānena gavādyarthaboddhṛtvamupakalpyate tatrāpi yasmādata'
GSP28mimslovu:6202: prasiddhapadāntarasamabhivyāhāre 'pi iha sahakāratarau madhuraṃ piko rautītyevamādau viditasahākarādādyartho 'viditapikādyarthaśca yo 'yaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:6203: sahakāratarau rauti tasya pikaśabdo gamaka iti gamakatvamevāvagacchatīti siddhaṃ sarvatra gamakatvaṃ na vyutpattiriti ||21-23 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:6212: na ca tān pratyavacākā' śabdā iti yuktaṃ vaktum /
GSP28mimslovu:6220: ayamabhiprāya'--- laukikā hi hānopādānādivyavahāramātrārthina', na ca teṣāṃ vyavahāra' śabdauccāraṇakṣaṇopajātasaṅkīrṇārthabodhasādhya eveti,
GSP28mimslovu:6222: tena tarhi kimarthaṃ vivañcate ata āha--balābalādīti /
GSP28mimslovu:6223: śāstrasthā hyanirūpitaśaktayo na śāstrārthamanuṣṭhātuṃ śaknuvantīti teṣāṃ hānopādānopayogī śabdaśaktiviveka iti te viviñcata iti ||26 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:6228: vyāvṛttibuddherapi hetutvāt viśeṣasaṃjñāmapi labhanta iti, tāni
GSP28mimslovu:6229: sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdenāpadiśanti, tatra ca sāmānyaviśeṣā' sāmānyaśabdasya svārthena kakṣyayāntaritā bhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:6231: sāmānyaviśeṣā', teṣu cāsau lakṣaṇābalena pravartamāno durbalo jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6232: svarthe tu śrutyā vartate iti sa tatra balavān /
GSP28mimslovu:6233: kā punariyaṃ lakṣaṇā nāma--- abhidheyavinābhāvena pratīti' /
GSP28mimslovu:6236: kriyā kiyadvābhidheyāvinābhāvena lakṣyate kiyat svamahimnā śabdenocyata iti śāstrasthānāmanuṣṭhānaviśeṣārthaṃ viveko yukta' /
GSP28mimslovu:6237: sā ca lakṣaṇā prāyeṇa nityasambandhād bhavatīti nityasambandhādityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:6243_0: ṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti brāhmaṇasāmānyasthā brāhmaṇaśrutirlakṣamayā tadviśeṣaṃ kauṇḍinyamavatarantī durbalā
GSP28mimslovu:6247: sāmānyaśabdenātra viśeṣān viśiṃṣanna sāmānyatiriktā' kecana viśeṣā vidyanta iti darśayati
GSP28mimslovu:6248: asati hi keṣāñcid darśanaṃ-- nityadravyavṛttayo 'ntyā viśeṣā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6249: te ca vyāvṛttibuddhereva hetutvād viśeṣā eveti /
GSP28mimslovu:6250: paramāṇukārayamakaṃ hi kāṇādā dvyaṇukādikrameṇa jagato nirmāṇamātiṣṭhante
GSP28mimslovu:6252: ata' santi kecanāṇusamavāyino viśeṣā nāma ye tānitaretarato
GSP28mimslovu:6258: pṛthivī abādibhyo dravyāntarebhya', vṛkṣatvena vṛkṣā' pārthivāntarebhya',
GSP28mimslovu:6259: śiṃśapātvena śiṃśapā vṛkṣāntarebhya ityevamaṇūn yāvadiya viśeṣakathā vartayitavyā /
GSP28mimslovu:6263: pṛthaktvākhyo vā guṇasteṣāmanyonyasya viśeṣakatvād viśeṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:6266: akṣaṇe vā tadānantyam, ato manda evāyaṃ viśeṣāntarābhyupagama' /
GSP28mimslovu:6267: yoginastu tān paśyantīti śraddhadhānā budhyante vayamaśraddhadhānā'
GSP28mimslovu:6268: sma',ye yuktiṃ prārthayāmaha iti sūktaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣeṣviti ||27-28 1/2||
GSP28mimslovu:6279_0: tatra sāmānye gavādau gośabdasya bahulaṃ prayogāt tadviśeṣeṣu ca śābaleyādiṣu asatsvapi bāhuleyādiṣu proya(gā?ga)darśanāt
GSP28mimslovu:6279_1: parasāmānye ca sattādau satyapi bhāvāntare 'prayogāt sāsnādibhi'
GSP28mimslovu:6280: sahaikāvayavirūpārthasamnabdhigotvamātrasya gośabdo vācaka ityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jñānaṃ janyate sāsnādyekārthasambandhīti cāvinābhāvinā cihnena gotvamupalakṣayatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:6281: ata' siddhaṃ gamyagamakabhāva eva śabdārthayo' sambandha'
GSP28mimslovu:6284: nanu--- saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandho bhāṣyakāreṇokta', na ca gamakaṃ saṃjñeti laukikā manyante, na hyagnerdhūma' saṃjñetyucyate, ata āha---
GSP28mimslovu:6286: ayamabhiprāya'--- asyārthaṃsyāyaṃ gamaka iti jñāte nāvyāpriyamāṇasyāvagatau kāraṇatvamupapadyata iti tadvyāpāro 'vasīyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6290: avinābhāvitā tu sambandhaniyama', na sambandha ityāha--- sambandheti /
GSP28mimslovu:6301: devadattādayo hi yadṛcchāśabdā yatraiva saṅketyate tameva pratīpādayanti /
GSP28mimslovu:6303: tadayaṃ prayogārtha'--- gavādiśabdo dharmī, nābhidhāśakta iti sādhyam,
GSP28mimslovu:6305: yadupāyāntarāpekṣaṃ tanna svarūpata' śaktam, devadattādipadamiva saṅketagrahaṇāpekṣamiti ||33||
GSP28mimslovu:6306_0: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'yadi pratyāyaka' śabda' prathamaśruta' kiṃ na pratyāyayati' iti paricodya 'sarvatra no darśanaṃ pramāṇam'
GSP28mimslovu:6306_1: ityādinā darśanabalena gṛhītaśaktika' pratyāyayatīti parihāra ukta',
GSP28mimslovu:6311: syādetat--- prakāśakā' pradīpādayo 'viditasambandhā api svārthaṃ prakāśayanto dṛśyante, tadvidharmā ca śabda', ato na prakāśaka iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6317: api ca vrīhyādayo 'gṛgītasvarūpā api kāryamārabhanta eveti śabde
GSP28mimslovu:6321: kena vedamājñāpitaṃ jñāpakena svarūpagrahaṇamapekṣitavyaṃ na sambandhagrahaṇamiti, darśanabaleneti cet, samānamidaṃ sambandhagrahaṇāpe
GSP28mimslovu:6324: na hi tatkāṇaṃ loke vede vā kiñcidīdṛśam /
GSP28mimslovu:6327: bāhyāntaravibhāgena kvacit syād vā vivakṣayā // Msv_5,9.38 //
GSP28mimslovu:6329: kiṃ cakṣuṣā mamaitena dṛṣṭaṃ dīpena yanmayā // Msv_5,9.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:6336: nanu ca sambandhagrahaṇāt prāgapyabhidhāne śabda' śakto na vā /
GSP28mimslovu:6338: na cet sambandhagrahaṇameva hi sadāgamanyāyena kāraṇamāpadyeta,ata
GSP28mimslovu:6343: yadi hyanugrāhakāpekṣā svaśaktiṃ vihanyāt sarvameva laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ karaṇaṃ karaṇatāṃ jahyāt
GSP28mimslovu:6345: kiñca--- astu tāvaditikartavyatāpekṣā karaṇabhāvaṃ na vihantīti, pratyuta tayāpi naiva karaṇatvaṃ nāsti, pratikaraṇasvarūpaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:6347_0: nanvevamubhayasamavadhānamevāntareṇa kāryāniṣpatte' kathaṃ karaṇetikartavyatāvibhāgo darśayitavya', ata āha--- bāhyāntareti
GSP28mimslovu:6347_1: bāhyamapi kvacid vivakṣāta' kārakapravṛtte' karaṇatayā vivakṣyata ityāha---
GSP28mimslovu:6354: gauravāt karaṇatvena mataṃ cet kena vāryate // Msv_5,9.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:6358: jñānotpattāvantaraṅgamapi cakṣurna karaṇatayā manyate, kintu kitaścittāratamyaviśeṣād bāhyameva pradīpaṃ karaṇatayā vivakṣatīti ||39||
GSP28mimslovu:6360: nityavṛttau nityaṃ tu kāryasiddhau āntarasya takṣuṣa' karaṇatvamavagamyata
GSP28mimslovu:6365: kathaṃ tadapekṣayā cakṣuṣa' karaṇatvaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---śarīreti /
GSP28mimslovu:6366: ayamabhiprāya'-- nāsattiviśeṣa eva karaṇatve kāraṇam, api tarhi bāhyapradīpādyapekṣayāsatti', ābhyantarātmamana' saṃyogāpekṣayā
GSP28mimslovu:6367_0: tvasādhāraṇyam, ātmamana' saṃyogo hi rasādijñānasādhāraṇo nāvyabhicāritayā rūpadarśanakāraṇamiti śakyate 'vagantumṣa cakṣuṣa'
GSP28mimslovu:6369: anena yattadāgamanyāyena sambandhagrahaṇameva kāraṇamāpadyetetyuktaṃ tadapi vivakṣāviśeṣavaśenāstviti darśitamiti ||42||
GSP28mimslovu:6370: aparamapi--- 'yathā cakṣurdraṣṭṭana bāhyena prakāśena vinā' ityādi
GSP28mimslovu:6376: ya' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' sa ceṣṭaśced dhruvaṃ kṛta' // Msv_5,9.45 //
GSP28mimslovu:6378: samaṃ nāstyanayo' kiñcit tenāsaṅgatatā svata' // Msv_5,9.46 //
GSP28mimslovu:6381: yadṛcchāśabdānāmapi jñānasāmarthyaṃ vidyamānameva niyogenābhivyajyata ityadhyāsavāde varṇitam
GSP28mimslovu:6382: atra ca yathā cakṣuriti bhāṣye cakṣuṣa'
GSP28mimslovu:6388: evaṃ cātra prayoga'--- ya' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' sa kṛtaka',
GSP28mimslovu:6392: ayamartha'--- yathā rajjusarpādiṣu bhinnadeśakālādhiṣṭhāneṣu kiñcid deśādi samaṃ nāsti, evaṃ tayo' śabdārthayo' /
